item.title: Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates his twins' first birthday with girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez as they take a dip in the pool for sweet family selfie
item.description: Cristiano Ronaldo enjoyed some family time with girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez and his four children on Tuesday, as they celebrated his twins first birthday with a dip in the pool.
item.content:encoded:
He's getting ready to head to Russia for next week's FIFA World Cup.

But Cristiano Ronaldo enjoyed some family time with girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez and his four children on Tuesday, as they celebrated his twins' first birthday with a dip in the pool.

Taking to Instagram the 33-year-old Real Madrid and Portugal forward shared an adorable selfie of him and Georgina along with his seven-year-old son Cristiano Jr and twins Eva and Mateo, while the couple's seven-month-old daughter Alana slept soundly on the pool's edge.

In the snap Ronaldo can be seen beaming with delight while little Eva and Mateo floated in blue and pink rubber rings, writing in the translated caption: 'My babies Eva and Mateo are celebrating their first birthday today! Congratulations, my dear children!'

The sporting superstar and his girlfriend - who have been dating for just over a year and a half - welcomed their first child together in November just five months after he welcomed his twins via. surrogate. 

Georgina has sparked engagement rumours on more than one occasion after sporting several different rings, but nothing has ever been confirmed. 

Ronaldo was enjoying some much-needed relaxation in between winning the Champions League for the fifth time with La Liga club Real Madrid, and joining his Portuguese team-mates at the World Cup. 

Expectations are high for Portugal and Ronaldo going into the global tournament, following their Euro 2016 victory and ongoing rumours that this could be his final World Cup.

While he did not appear in the first two of Portugal's warm-up matches before heading to Russia, Ronaldo is expected to play against Algeria on Thursday, before the 23-man squad jet to Sochi for their first group match against Spain next Friday (June 15). 

Ronaldo also took to social media on Tuesday to share a snap with some of his Portugal team-mates after they reunited for training, with the caption translated to say: 'Glad to get back to my selection and have training and of course this is the winning team.'

The star was also seen meeting with the country's Prime Minister Antonio Costa, as fans from all over the country prepare to cheer the team on in the tournament.

After their Titans-esque clash with Spain, Portugal will then face Group B rivals Morocco and Iran, in a bid to make it through to the knockout stages.
item.dc:abstract: He's getting ready to head to Russia for next week's FIFA World Cup. But Cristiano Ronaldo enjoyed some family time with girlfriend Georgina Rodriguez and his four children on Tuesday, as they celebrated his twins first birthday with a dip in the pool. item.mi:shortTitle: Cristiano Ronaldo celebrates his twins' first birthday

item.title: Ashley James slips her slender frame into vibrant coral swimsuit as she tops up her tan by the pool in Ibiza
item.description: The 31-year-old showed off her enviably slender frame in a vibrant coral one-piece, as she soaked up the sunshine by her hotel pool.
item.content:encoded:
She enjoyed a blink-and-you'll-miss-it appearance on E4's Made In Chelsea back in 2012. 

But Ashley James ensured she was the centre of attention on Wednesday, by slipping into her swimwear for a day of tanning in Ibiza.

The 31-year-old showed off her enviably slender frame in a vibrant coral one-piece, as she soaked up the sunshine by her hotel pool.

The reality star set pulses racing in the neon one-piece, which perfectly complemented her sun-kissed complexion. 

The swimsuit was adorned with chic ruched detailing across the front, to draw attention to her slim figure as she relaxed by the pool.

Upping the sex appeal, the swimsuit plunged into a deep V at the neck to tease at her cleavage, before cutting off high at her thigh to leave her long legs on show.  

Leaving her hair in loose waves and opting for minimal make-up, Ashley proved her naturally striking features and radiant complexion to all, as she topped up her tan at her hotel.  

The blonde was the picture of confidence in the swimsuit, after bravely overcoming body dysmorphia.

Speaking to MailOnline about the condition - defined by the anxiety caused by a distorted image of the self - Ashley said last month: 'I'm definitely more confident in terms of like, I literally used to look at my body with disgust.

'I'd see myself bigger than I was and I've definitely got through the worse. But of course, I have days where I feel insecure about things or I look at my body and see flaws.

'I have learned to embrace it, I think being more open and authentic and honest on social media helps that journey.

'I'd definitely being lying if I said that I didn't like have days where I felt insecure about things.' 

Ashley is no doubt enjoying a relaxing holiday with friends in Ibiza, after a busy few weeks.

The former MIC star performed an energetic DJ set at the Mightly Hoopla festival on Sunday, alongside the likes of Mel C and Lily Allen. 

She also made a surprise appearance at the British Soap Awards 2018 the previous evening, despite not appearing in any televised dramas.

item.title: Kim Kardashian West says she's planning 'an intimate little dinner at home' for Kanye West's 41st birthday
item.description: The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has revealed she's decided to keep things low-key for the rapper's 41st birthday on Friday and just wants to put together a small meal.
item.content:encoded:
Kim Kardashian West is planning 'an intimate little dinner' for Kanye West's birthday.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has revealed she's decided to keep things low-key for the rapper's 41st birthday on Friday and just wants to put together a small meal with their close friends and family at their house in Hidden Hills, California.

Speaking to E! News, the 37-year-old beauty said: 'I'm planning a dinner for him at our house. Just an intimate little dinner with friends.'

And the Bound 2 hitmaker certainly deserves to be waited on hand and foot on his special day as he's been busy working in the studio over the past few months on his recently-released seven-track album Ye.

Kim also left him to clear up the mess after their daughter North's unicorn-themed birthday party at the weekend and wanted him to be there when she opened her gifts.

She explained: 'He's at home babysitting. He was going to come, and he wanted to come, but I'm staying a few extra days in New York. 

'And so I said, "You know our daughter had her birthday party last night. She needs to wake up and open her presents, so you're going to have to take that shift." 

'So he did that!'

Kim's low-key approach to Kanye's birthday will no doubt come as a surprise to fans as she stocked a plane with Japanese snacks and magazines for his 40th birthday last year and made him guess where they were going.

Taking to her Twitter account earlier this year, the reality star uploaded a photograph of Kanye beaming at the camera with his stash of Japanese candy sat in front of him.

She accompanied it with the caption: 'Throwback to that time I surprised Kanye with a trip to Japan for his birthday! 

'He had to guess where we were going based on the snacks and magazines I had the plane stocked with! He was happy!'
item.dc:abstract: Kim Kardashian West is planning 'an intimate little dinner' for Kanye West's birthday. The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star has revealed she's decided to keep things low-key for the rapper's 41st birthday on Friday and just wants to put together a small meal with their close friends and family at their house in Hidden Hills, California. Speaking to E! News, the 37-year-old beauty said: 'I'm planning a dinner for him at our house. Just an intimate little dinner with friends.'

item.title: David Beckham looks dapper in a navy suit as he attends football summit in China... where he is BLINDFOLDED for sporty challenge
item.description: David Beckham proved he is still an influential figure in the football world, as he took part in the G-EXPO Global Top Summit in Bengu, China, to discuss the commercial football sector.
item.content:encoded:
He played in his last professional football game five years ago, ending his illustrious career with a brief stint on the Paris Saint-Germain squad.

But David Beckham, 43, took part in the G-EXPO Global Top Summit in Bengu, China, on Wednesday, where he was led on stage wearing a blindfold.

Talking about the commercial football sector, the sportsman made the crowd laugh as he struggled to find his way around.

Led out by the summit's two hosts, the footballer wore a bedazzled sleeping mask before trying to kick a ball that was placed in front of him.

It didn't take long before David successfully completed the challenge and kicked the football across the stage, much to the delight of the attendees.

David looked sharp in his fitted navy blue suit, which he paired with a crisp white shirt, striped tie, and black brogues.

The former Manchester United player looked dapper as he sported his short brunette locks and a close-cropped beard.

David attended the event alongside Former Milan coach Carlo Ancelotti, 58, as they gathered together at the event with other players, coaches and industry insiders ahead of the month-long World Cup in Russia, which begins next week.

After talking animatedly on stage, the footballer then watched the convention from a front-row seat where he was given an earpiece so that the talks could be translated for him in real-time.

Before the summit began, David was surrounded by football fans as they tried to get a photo of him when he walked past them while he made his way to the venue.

His outing came ahead of his wife Victoria Beckham posting a snap of their daughter Harper, six, larking about on the school run on Monday morning, wearing a mask featuring her footballer father's face.

Writing alongside the tongue-in-cheek shot of her little girl wearing her school summer dress, the fashion designer, 44, wrote: 'Look who we found walking to school today! @davidbeckham.'

It seems that the Beckhams were in high spirits on the first day back at school after half-term, with Victoria also posting a video of her and Harper skipping along the pavement.

The pair looked delighted as they held hands, and wore matching trainers as they enjoyed their morning together. 

Victoria wore black leggings, coupled with a comfortable sweatshirt, while Harper looked adorable in her purple school summer dress.

Victoria has revealed to the Evening Standard that she teaches her four children with husband David - Brooklyn, 19, Romeo, 15, Cruz, 13, and Harper the importance of having a good work ethic.

She told the publication: 'It’s never been an option not to work hard. They see mummy go to work, they see daddy go to work, and they go to school and they have to work.

'But at the same time they’re happy children. I believe that children should be children, and have fun.

'I like to push them because I want them to achieve as much as they can, but I don’t want to push them so much that it makes them overly stressed.'
item.dc:abstract: It's been five years since his last game as a professional football player, ending his illustrious career with a brief stint on the Paris Saint-Germain squad. But David Beckham's retirement from the sport doesn't mean he can't still be an influential figure in the football world, as he took part in the G-EXPO Global Top Summit in Bengu, China, on Wednesday. Joining the event so that he could discuss, and give his opinion on, the commercial football sector, the 43-year-old sportsman was in high spirits as he took the stage and made the crowd laugh when he was blindfolded.
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Davison
item.mi:shortTitle: David Beckham looks dapper in a navy suit at Football summit in China

item.title: Logie Awards 2018: All you need to know
item.description: The 2018 Logie Awards will be coming up soon. Here's all you need to know about what they are, when and where they are, who's hosting, who the nominees are and who won last year.
item.content:encoded:
Australian television’s biggest night is coming up soon.

The 2018 Logie Awards are slated to be held soon, featuring some of the country’s most popular actors and TV programs up for nominations this year.

Here’s all you need to know about what the Logie Awards are, when and where they are, who’s hosting, who the nominees are and who won in 2017.

What are the Logie Awards?

The Logie Awards are an annual awards program that recognizes excellence in Australian television.

First known as the TV Week Awards, the Logie Awards were first presented back in 1959 and are sponsored by the magazine TV Week. The highest honor at the show is the Golden Logie, a prestigious award presented to Most Popular Personality on Australian Television.

When are the Logie Awards 2018?

The 2018 Logie Awards will be held on Sunday, July 1.

Where are the Logie Awards 2018?

The 2018 Logie Awards will be at The Star Gold Coast hotel and casino in Gold Coast, Queensland. 

This year marks the first time that the awards will be presented in the city.

Who is hosting the Logie Awards 2018?

As with in years past, there will be no official host for the 2018 Logie Awards, just a series of award presenters. The last host of the awards show was Shane Bourne in 2011.

Who are the Logie Awards 2018 nominees?

The nominees for the upcoming 2018 Logie Awards are as follows:

TV WEEK GOLD LOGIE – MOST POPULAR PERSONALITY ON AUSTRALIAN TELEVISION

Amanda Keller (The Living Room, Network Ten) 

Andrew Winter (Love It Or List It Australia/Selling Houses Australia, Foxtel – Lifestyle)

Grant Denyer (Family Feud/All Star Family Feud, Network Ten) 

Jessica Marais (Love Child, Nine Network; The Wrong Girl, Network Ten) 

Rodger Corser (Doctor Doctor, Nine Network) 

Tracy Grimshaw (A Current Affair, Nine Network)

And finally... the nominees for the TV WEEK Gold Logie Award for the Most Popular Personality on Australian Television Tracy Grimshaw, Andrew Winter, Grant Denyer, Amanda Keller, Rodger Corser and Jessica Marais 🙌🏻🙌🏻🙌🏻 #tvweeklogies Find our more at the link in our bio!

A post shared by TV Week Magazine (@tvweekmag) on May 26, 2018 at 10:23pm PDT

MOST OUTSTANDING NEWS COVERAGE OR PUBLIC AFFAIRS REPORT

2017 Logie Awards winners

Samuel Johnson won the coveted Best Personality on Australia Television award for his role on Molly while also picking up the Best Actor accolade. 

Jessica Marais took home the Best Actress award while Damon Herriman and Debra Lawrance took home the awards for Most Outstanding Supporting Actor and Most Outstanding Supporting Actress respectively.

Molly won the award for Best Drama program while The Block was awarded the Best Reality Program accolade. 

For Best Sports Program, The NRL Footy Show on the Nine Network was victorious.

item.title: 'I'm single!' Love Island's Cassidy McGill is abandoned AGAIN after shock recoupling ... as intruder Jaxon Human reveals he's going on the show to be her 'knight in shining armour'
item.description: She was ditched by ex-lover Grant Crapp for Tayla Damir.
item.content:encoded:
She was tragically rejected by Grant Crapp for Tayla Damir last week.

And on Love Island on Wednesday night, blonde bombshell Cassidy McGill was left alone again when Francoise decided to partner up with Elias during a shock recoupling ceremony. 

'I'm single!' Cassidy signed after Francoise snagged her man.

Scroll down for video 

Francoise didn't seem to care, however, declaring that she wanted to spend time with Elias as he was the only person in the villa to whom she felt attracted. 

'I want to get to know him a little bit more,' she beamed as Elias gleefully wrapped his arm around her shoulder. 

While losing Elias to Francoise may have been another stab in the heart for Cassidy, the blonde beauty may be in for brighter days, thanks to intruder Jaxon Human. 

In a preview for his arrival on Thursday night's episode, stripper Jaxon Human admitted that he is keen to win over Cassidy.  

'I'm a bad boy with a really good heart,' Jaxon said in the promo while showing off his tattoos and bulging muscles. 

'Cassidy, I'm your knight in shining armour.'

'I've flown all the way from Melbourne to Spain to see you. So Cassidy, you need to be ready,' Jaxon said. 

In the clip, Jaxon revealed that he is a tennis coach by day, and a stripper by night. 

Love Island Australia continues on Thursday at 8.30pm on Nine Go.

item.title: Kat Von D shows hint of her baby bump while wearing red dress and holding hands with husband Leafar
item.description: The 36-year-old makeup mogul draped her pregnant figure in a billowing crimson dress while holding the hand of her rockstar partner ahead of their 'meditative honeymoon.'
item.content:encoded:
Her Heaven and Hell inspired wedding was the talk of the town last weekend.

But Kat Von D and husband Leafar Seyer appeared to still be reveling in the incredible black-and-red-themed nuptials as they picked up a few snacks on Tuesday afternoon in Los Angeles.

The 36-year-old makeup mogul draped her pregnant figure in a billowing crimson dress while holding the hand of her rockstar partner ahead of their 'meditative honeymoon.'

Scroll down for video 

Kat - whose real name is Katherine von Drachenberg - looked ravishing wearing a scarlet-colored sheer gown with a thick hem along her ankles. 

She appeared to wear a matching sports bra underneath, with peeks of her pregnant tummy showing through the dress which she paired with red nylons and buckled flats. 

Sticking with her devilish theme, the tattoo artist donned a pair of over-sized cardinal-hued sunglasses with a lipstick to match.

Leafar - whose real name is Rafael Reyes - rocked a black, short-sleeved shirt tucked into a pair of likely vegan leather trousers.

Kat shared on Instagram that the happy couple 'are off to a secret undisclosed destination for our meditative honeymoon' just days after their elaborate wedding at the Beverly Hills Hotel.

Though Kat and her husband Leafar tied the knot in February, they celebrated their union with a striking, vegan wedding ceremony complete with massive flower arrangements and an entirely red ballroom.

Kat united with her newly-minted husband, who is the lead signer of the Cholo-goth band Prayers, to exchange their vows in the center of the room, standing atop a red platform shaped like a heart.

It was an awe-inspiring scene, as the couple were drenched in red lighting with flowers and candles hanging from the ceiling while people in red morph suits danced around them.

The tattoo artist and musician appear to have started their relationship around 2015, around when they were first spotted appearing on each other's social media.

Kat was previously wed to fellow tattooist Oliver Peck, from 2004 to 2007 and has also been engaged twice previously, first to West Coast Choppers CEO and reality persona Jesse James in 2011 and later to DJ Deadmau5 in 2012.

Von D first made her mark as a figure on the reality series Miami Ink in 2005, later earning her own spin-off about her studio High Voltage Tattoo in Hollywood.

And in 2008 the star launched her beloved beauty line, earning $12million in it's first year and solidifying its place as a makeup must.

item.title: Amy Childs showcases her 'darling bump' in a summer maxi as she notices herself 'getting big' at 28 weeks
item.description: Amy Childs had really noticed her baby bump 'pop' on Wednesday morning when she posed in front of the mirror in a red maxi dress to celebrate her 28th week of pregnancy.
item.content:encoded:
She's 28 weeks into her second pregnancy, after welcoming daughter Polly last April.

And Amy Childs had really noticed her baby bump 'pop' on Wednesday morning when she posed in front of the mirror in a red maxi dress.

'Hello darling bump, where have you come from all of a sudden?' she asked, as she snapped a selfie for her 566k followers.

The mum-of-one looked summery in an ankle-grazing dress and sunglasses before heading out for a lunch date with a friend.

Amy flattered her stomach in the garment, which featured an empire line design and a plunging neckline.

She rested one hand underneath her bump to outline the shape as she commented 'You have certainly got big' in an additional InstaStories fashion post.

Amy announced her second pregnancy in March, but it appears she already has her sights set on her post-baby career.

It was reported on Sunday that Amy had landed a job as a TV chef on a new ITV2 six-part series.

According to the Sunday People, the former TOWIE star is said to be joining nutritionist and author Annabel Karmel, 61, to show viewers how to make family friendly meals.

The publication has revealed: 'Amy will be showing viewers, with Annabel’s expert help, how to cook easy meals that are healthy for everyone and low in sugar.'

As well as delivering advice on schooling for children, Amy will also be reportedly meeting experts across the UK to discuss issues affecting new parents as well.

It was revealed: 'In one episode she meets a 90-year-old midwife who will help dispel myths around parenting and some conflicting messages parents get.'  

MailOnline has contacted representatives for Amy for further comment.

Despite her second pregnancy being unplanned, the former TOWIE star revealed she was excited to become a mother for the second time.

She told OK! magazine: 'Me and my partner are over the moon about having a baby, but he’s not in the least bit interested in being in the public eye, which is so nice and refreshing. 

'I just wanted me and my partner to really enjoy it because it's a very precious time. We're extremely happy and can't wait to welcome a brother or sister for Polly.'

The reality star has not revealed who the father of her second child is, but she was pictured in the Caribbean packing on the PDA with a mystery man in February.

The Sun have previously reported the father of Amy's new baby is a 'high-flying' businessman who 'wants to stay out of the spotlight', with the couple dating for the past eight months.
item.dc:abstract: Amy Childs had really noticed her bump 'pop' on Wednesday morning when she posed in front of the mirror in a red maxi dress. 'Hello darling bump, where have you come from all of a sudden?' she asked, as she snapped a selfie for her 566k followers.

item.title: Hunky Chris Hemsworth is mobbed by excitable female fans who grapple to get a selfie with him as he attends TAG Heuer party in Sydney
item.description: Chris Hemsworth, 34, was batting the fans away - as is the norm - at the Australian launch of TAG Heuer's Museum In Motion party at Sydney's Museum of Contemporary Art on Wednesday.
item.content:encoded:
He's considered a global heartthrob among girls and guys alike.

And Avengers hunk Chris Hemsworth, 34, was batting the fans away - as is the norm - at the Australian launch of TAG Heuer's Museum In Motion party at Sydney's Museum of Contemporary Art on Wednesday.

It was a bevvy of tittering ladies this time, all of whom were desperately clambering around him so they could snap a selfie with the Ghostbusters actor.

Looking handsome in skinny jeans and a relaxed blazer at the red carpet bash, dad-if-three Chris happily obliged, smiling gracefully while he was mobbed by adoring fans.

Chris completed his dapper look with a pair of heavy-duty black leather boots and a white T-shirt.

Letting his monochrome ensemble do the talking, he accessorised simply with a pendant necklace. 

Boasting a tan from his recent family vacation to Stradbroke Island, Chris wore his hair slicked back and sported a tiny hint of stubble. 

Chris jetted off to Stradbroke Island, Queensland, with his Spanish actress wife Elsa Pataky and their twins, Tristan and Sasha, both four.

Elsa shared several sweet snaps from the idyllic getaway, including a selfie with Chris and a sweet shot of their twins starring out at the ocean. 

The actress captioned the image: 'Two old souls Checking the surf and pondering life's great questions. #brothers'. 

Elsa recently revealed that shortly after she and Chris met in 2010, the A-list couple made a pact to never live in the other's home turf. 

Speaking to Yahoo Be, the Spanish star revealed: 'We always said when we met, I'd never make you live in Spain, and he would never make me live in Australia because our families are so far away from us.'

After the birth of the twins, the Avengers actor persuaded to Elsa to change her mind by moving to Byron Bay.

Looking handsome in skinny jeans and a relaxed blazer at the red carpet bash, dad-if-three Chris happily obliged, smiling gracefully while he was mobbed by adoring fans.

item.title: Whitney Houston's bible is being sold for $95,000 after the star left it behind at an old property
item.description: She passed away in 2012 after drowning in the bath. And now a former landlord of the late Whitney Houston is selling her bible for $95,000. The I Have Nothing songstress left the holy
item.content:encoded:
She passed away in 2012 after drowning in a bathtub.

And now a former landlord of the late Whitney Houston is selling her bible for $95,000. 

The I Have Nothing songstress left the holy book behind when she moved out of her luxury Newport Beach rental in 2011, and now the former property owner is putting the item on the market. 

Scroll down for video  

The property man revealed in a letter that he found the bible in a box with some clothes and CDs by the bin after Whitney moved out. 

He revealed that he did try to contact the singer's agent at the time regarding the left items, but was told: 'Keep it if you want.'

The man - whose identity is not known - 'threw everything away except the bible because he though it was interesting' and sold the home in 2012. 

And although $95,000 seems like a hefty price, the former home owner believes he will fetch the figure as Whitney's handwriting is all over the pages. 

Pictures obtained show the I Will Always Love You singer document important dates such as her marriage to Robert B. Brown in 1992 and the birth of their now late daughter Bobbi Kristina Brown on March 4, 1993.

The item will be sold through Moments In Time. 

Whitney passed away in February 2012 after accidentally drowning in a bath at the Beverly Hilton Hotel. 

The official coroner's report stated that they found cocaine, marijuana and prescription medication in her system. 

The popular singer's daughter Bobbi passed away in July 2015. 

She was too found in bath of her Georgia home and died from lobar pneumonia after being placed in a coma for nearly six months.
item.dc:abstract: She passed away in 2012 after drowning in the bath. And now a former landlord of the late Whitney Houston is selling her bible for $95,000. The I Have Nothing songstress left the holy book behind when she moved out of her luxury Newport Beach rental in 2011, and now the former property owner is putting the item on the market.
item.dc:creator: Heidi Parker

item.title: Emma Stone looks chic in plunging ivory blazer and high-waisted trousers at fashion awards in Paris
item.description: Emma Stone oozed Parisian chic as she stepped out in the French capital for the LVMH Prize 2018 Edition at Fondation Louis Vuitton on Wednesday,
item.content:encoded:
She is an Oscar-winning actress who has appeared on many a best-dressed list.

And Emma Stone oozed Parisian chic as she stepped out in the French capital for the  LVMH Prize 2018 Edition at Fondation Louis Vuitton on Wednesday,

The La La Land star, 29, flaunted her braless cleavage in a plunging white blazer with statement shoulder pads as she posed up at the art museum and cultural centre.

She paired the daring blazer with high waisted black trousers which cinched in at her tiny waist with a custom leather Louis Vuitton belt.

Adding to the androgynous look, the flame-haired beauty's trousers also featured kooky leather braces and she added height with patent black stilettos.

The Spider-Man actress accessorised with a vintage-inspired handbag and diamond earrings.

Her caramel flecked scarlet tresses were pulled back into a chic updo, with wavy strands framing her face while her stunning features were accentuated with gold eyeshadow, feline flicks of liner and scarlet lipstick. 

The star was in Paris to present  the LVMH Prize  which was created to honour and support young fashion designers around the world. 

Young fashion designer winners are awarded a grant of 300,000 euros and personalized technical and financial support from the group for a year afterwards. 

Emma has recently sparked romance rumours with Justin Theroux, 46. who has recently split from actress wife Jennifer Aniston, 49, with the pair spotted together on numerous occasions.

The pair star together in new Netflix Manic which Emma was seen shooting in New York City last month.

According to Netflix, the series will see Emma and Jonah Hill star in the 'remake of a Norwegian dark-comedy about an institutionalized man who lives a fantasy life in his dreams.' 

Sonoya Mizuno, Sally Field and Justin Theroux will also make regular appearances.  

Emma was named as Forbes 2017 highest paid actress after racking up $26 million.
item.dc:abstract: Emma Stone oozed Parisian chic as she stepped out in the French capital for the LVMH Prize 2018 Edition at Fondation Louis Vuitton on Wednesday, The La La Land star, 29, flaunted her braless cleavage in a plunging white blazer with statement shoulder pads as she posed up at the art museum and cultural centre.

item.title: Scout Willis snacks on a peach after grocery shopping in ripped T-shirt and cut-off sweatpants
item.description: The daughter of Demi Moore and Bruce Willis - turning 27 next month - will reportedly celebrate two years of sobriety next week
item.content:encoded:
Scout Willis was spotted snacking on a peach after grocery shopping at Lassens Natural Foods & Vitamins in Los Angeles on Tuesday.

The daughter of Demi Moore and Bruce Willis - turning 27 next month - looked like she rolled out of bed in her ripped blue T-shirt, cut-off sweatpants, and scuffed combat boots.

The Idaho-born millennial flipped her long red-tinged locks and went make-up free for her errand.

Scroll down for video  

Scout - named after the To Kill A Mockingbird character - also toted two reusable grocery bags since California has banned most plastic bags.

June 16 should mark Willis' second year of sobriety if she stayed on the straight and narrow in 2017.

'I'm not always good at celebrating myself, and reallllllllly shy about doing it publicly, but honestly I am so f***ing proud of myself for this one,' the Brown University grad wrote last year.

'June 17 marked one year of being fully present with ma self, no filters, no chemical relaxation, no short cuts. I am meeting the best version of myself every day.'  

The aerial silks enthusiast is primarily known as a singer-guitarist, but has yet to release a debut studio album aside from her 2012 EP as the duo Gus & Scout.

Missing from Scout's side on Tuesday was her bleach-haired boyfriend, Jake Miller, with whom she recently attended the local Renaissance Faire on April 29.

Back in March, Willis' 55-year-old mother said everything she does is really for her daughters Scout, Tallulah, 24; Rumer, 29.

'I hope through my actions and how I live, one creates a clearer path for them,' the two-time Golden Globe nominee and Thorn founder told ET.  

'And that it inspires them to be the beautiful, powerful, young women that they are.'

The nepotistically-privileged socialite's 63-year-old father keeps busy with his action film career and raising two daughers - Mabel Ray, 6; and Evelyn Penn, 4 - with his second wife Emma Heming.

Scout acted in her father's 2001 film Bandits, 1999 film Breakfast of Champions, as well as her mother's 1995 film The Scarlet Letter.

Back in 2013, Willis made headlines by roaming around Manhattan topless as a protest against censorship on Instagram, dubbing her movement: 'Free the Nipple.'

The daughter of Demi Moore and Bruce Willis - turning 27 next month - looked like she rolled out of bed in her ripped blue T-shirt, cut-off sweatpants, and scuffed combat boots.

item.title: Brody Jenner's new wife Kaitlynn Carter shares bikini photo from wedding weekend in Indonesia
item.description: Kaitlynn Carter has shared a bikini image from her wedding weekend to Brody Jenner in Indonesia. The beauty looked toned and tanned as she relaxed by the pool.
item.content:encoded:
Kaitlynn Carter has shared a bikini image from her wedding weekend to Brody Jenner in Indonesia.

The 29-year-old beauty looked toned and tanned as she relaxed by the pool. She explained she had to wear the suit all week so she would not get bikini tan lines before her wedding.

The leggy wonder also shared an image with an elephant explaining she chose the park that treated the animals the best and didn't want to be shamed for her choice.

For the caption on her swimsuit shot she said: 'Wore this swimsuit top for a week so I wouldn’t have tan lines for my reception dress.'

And for the shot with the elephant the beauty wrote: 'Look at that fuzzy little head! ❤️UPDATE: it seems as though people have had different experiences than I had at this elephant park. I guess everything is not always as it seems. we specifically asked around for which was the best one because we’d heard some were really bad and this was where we were directed. 

'I love animals, and for me this was such a memorable moment in my visit to Indonesia, but certainly elephants should never be chained up or inhumanely treated, so if that is the reality here, I feel sad about it. I also feel very sad that elephants in the wild have their tusks ripped out and are left for dead by poachers. it’s a crazy world we live in and I just want every creature to be safe and happy. that’s all!'

She also bought turtles with Brody and released them into the wild.    

And on Wednesday she also shared a clip with her pals: 'We had all our friends meet up in Bali for a welcome party the night before we flew everyone to Sumba for the wedding weekend! had the most beautiful live guitar performance as we watched the sun go down over the waves.' 

On Tuesday - just three days after saying 'I do' on the island of Nihi Sumba in Indonesia - the son of Caitlyn Jenner and Linda Thompson posted a romantic photo to Instagram where he is holding his new bride.

Unfortunately, Caitlyn could not attend the wedding as she had already committed to a ball in Austria.

His caption read, 'Well this happened over the weekend. ❤️ @mitchpohl.'

Brody looked handsome in a light beige suit with white shirt. He was barefoot.

His bride wore a long sleeved white dress with a French veil and was barefoot too as she held onto her gold sandals.

His wife shared a photo of them at sunset next to a fire pit.

She said, 'Parting is such sweet sorrow.'

And Jenner also shared a video from the resort he stayed at, saying, 'Just want to thank @nihisumba and all of the amazing staff for creating one of the most incredible and memorable experiences of my life. You guys truly deserve being the #1 resort in the world the past 2 years ��. Thanks to all my friends and family that came out to celebrate with @kaitlynn and I. Love you all ❤️❤️ Till next year!!'  

The 68-year-old former Olympian was reportedly 'too busy' to attend the nuptials as she has been in Austria, where she attended the Life Ball with gal pal Sophia Hutchins, 21.

According to TMZ, Brody is 'deeply hurt' that the person formerly known as Bruce Jenner did not make the wedding.

It did not appear that half-sisters Kylie or Kendall Jenner were there either and no Kardashians attended.  

'It wasn’t in the cards for Kendall and Kylie to come as Kylie is a new mom and this is a more intimate affair [and it’s a] big ordeal to fly all the way to Bali for the celebration,' a source told UsWeekly.

But Brody has said he was very happy to walk down the aisle with the pretty blonde even if several members of his family were not there to support him.

'I'm looking forward to living the rest of my life with Kaitlynn,' Jenner told the site earlier.

'Hopefully not too much changes. But having the ring and the commitment, that's really exciting.' 

After the wedding, he gushed to People magazine that marriage 'feels awesome. I honestly feel like we’ve been married for five years already!'

He added, 'I am the luckiest man on earth to have Kaitlynn by my side.'

Kaitlynn dished to the magazine about the reception, where Indonesian cuisine was served: 'It was the most dreamy, incredible night ever.'

The blushing bride confided in People: 'We were out until 4 a.m.! It was so much fun.'

There had been four days of festivities before the big ceremony. 

The resort looked idyllic and romantic with luxurious grass-roofed, wood floor huts that had floor-to-ceiling windows.  

'We're just excited to celebrate spending the rest of our lives together,' Jenner told People weeks before the wedding. 'I can't wait to marry Kaitlynn.'

The two met at a party in 2013.

'I was going after her,' Jenner said. 'She's an amazing girl.'

Added Carter: 'He was really honest about what he wanted, no messing around, and I found that really charming and refreshing. Pretty soon after we started dating, I thought it could be for life.'

In 2016, Jenner proposed at the same resort on Nihi Sumba where they would wed. 

'I'm glad we took our time to get to know each other,' said Carter of the long engagement. 'We know for sure that we can work through things and that we want to be together.'

item.title: Love Island SPOILER: Laura admits she 'can't wait to get into bed' with Wes... as unlucky Dr. Alex insists one of the new girls 'will be his wife'
item.description: Ensuring she was not headed out of the villa, Scottish air hostess Laura, 29, was loudly vocalising her feelings for her partner Wes
item.content:encoded:
Tensions are rising in the Love Island villa, ahead of the arrival of two new girls. 

And both the female Islanders are certainly worried, as Samira and Danny are left doubting their positions in the house due to their partners, Alex and Jack respectively, and the new girls Rosie and Georgia. 

Ensuring she was not headed out of the villa, Scottish air hostess Laura, 29, was loudly vocalising her feelings for her partner Wes, as she insisted: 'This is so cringe, but I can’t wait to get into bed and have a little snuggle and fall asleep.'

Rosie and Georgia have been sent into the house to pair up with the boys in the imminent recoupling, meaning the girls places in the villa are in jeopardy.

Despite having looked as though she was going to stray to single Alex, who selected Kendall on Tuesday night's episode, Laura changed her mind once he was off the market and returned to her original partner Wes.

Speaking to Samira, she said: ' When we were all sat by the fire pit last night he put his arm around me. And I liked it. Then in my head, I thought "I do fancy him." 

'And then I thought straightaway "I wonder if tonight in bed we might have a little spoon". And then I thought "Right, don’t get carried away".' 

Speaking of their evening together, Laura went on: 'So then when we got into bed, I did kind of turn around, but I kind of sleep like that anyway. 

'I thought "we’ll kind of see what he does". And then he did proper come in and spoon me, and I liked it. And then he held my hands. And then we fell asleep.'

She said in the Beach Hut: 'He’s so cute and affectionate and that’s what I really like, and he’s always hugging me when I’m cold. And it’s like little things isn’t it...

'It’s just caring, and you need that when you’re in here. And I kind of, oh God this is so cringe, but I can’t wait to get into bed and have a little snuggle and fall asleep. Like, I genuinely do want to do that.'

While Wes was voicing his concerns over his true feelings, Dani reassured him by saying: 'She’s genuine about it. She was noticing things about you. And I thought ‘you don’t notice those things unless you like someone.'

Clearly delighted, he said: 'Dani started to reassure me saying that Laura had spoken to her and said she liked me and that’s a nice thing, it made me feel all warm inside.' 

The duo then confirmed their romantic feelings for one another in a tender moment as she branded him 'cute'. 

Meanwhile, unlucky Alex pins a lot of hope on the new girls before even meeting as he says: 'My wife’s coming in. Wife and mother of my children. You never know.'

Clearly desperate to connect with one of the newcomers, he said: 'We’re all really excited, there’s a real buzz around the boys. For me, obviously I feel really good that this is an opportunity to meet some new girls and someone that could be my type.' 

The girls look down upon the meeting between Georgia and Rosie with the new boys and tensions seem to soar as they watch on.

Watching on, Samira, who has been dismissive of Alex the entire way, said: 'I don’t like this at all', while Dani voiced her worries over her partner Jack, saying: 'I feel like I’m watching my boyfriend cheat on me.' 

West End performer Samira seems particularly irked by the scenario, as she discovered Georgia is a drama student - which she replied: 'Now I feel jealous, I feel weird. I hope she wasn’t on the West End.'

Jack's fidelity has been a thorn in Dani's side after it was revealed he has cheated on his past two girlfriends - much to her chagrin. 

She said: 'I like you as a person, we’ve been getting on and stuff. It’s not a problem. I don’t think I have a problem with you about it because nothing’s going on yet. 

'It just threw me off a little bit. Obviously it’s just a little bit…It makes me think ‘I’ve gone for the same geezer that all my mates say ‘Dan don’t!’ You’ve got to understand that.' 

Seemingly putting the nail in their coffin, she said: 'I’ve got to talk to Jack later. I just don’t get butterflies around him. He’s a lovely looking lad and he’s very funny, and any other girl would be lucky to have that. 

'But not me because, I’ve had that. I do feel ready to find something new and that’s what it is. New and fresh, not used.'

Love Island is on ITV2 tonight at 9pm

item.title: Pixie Lott flaunts her jaw-dropping figure in skimpy white swimsuit as she enjoys stunning sunset in Sicily
item.description: Pixie Lott flaunted her incredible holiday figure in a skimpy white swimsuit on Wednesday as she enjoyed a stunning sunset from her balcony in Sicily, with her blonde hair in a half-up half-down style.
item.content:encoded:
Pixie Lott flaunted her incredible holiday figure in a skimpy white swimsuit on Wednesday as she enjoyed a stunning sunset from her balcony in Sicily.

The 27-year-old stunning songstress oozed sixties chic in the white one-piece with a tie neck, taking to Instagram to share the latest snap from her summer getaway.

Pixie had been soaking up the sun on the Italian island, after spending some time relaxing in Los Angeles with fiance Oliver Cheshire.

In the twilight snap, Pixie's incredible curves were on full display as she confidently posed on her hotel's balcony, letting her simple swimsuit take centre by ditching all other accessories.

The only bit of bling the beauty sported was her sparkling engagement ring, and her ever-flawless complexion also sported barely a scrap of makeup with her blonde tresses in a half-up half-down style.

Pixie captioned her snap: 'Cefalu, Sicily ❤️ pasta and pizza forever.'

Pixie previously stunned fans after showing off her beach baby physique in a sizzling cut-out swimsuit and retro wig, as she documented her tanning time on social media. 

The Mama Do singer showed off her enviably slender figure in the bright green one-piece, made sexier by lace-up detailing at the side.

Plunging at the front to give a flash of cleavage, the swimsuit then tightly clung to her frame all the way down - causing her to turn heads as she relaxed poolside.

Known for her quirky sense of style, the singer then accessorised with dark round sunglasses, and sported a retro bob wig with full fringe as she posed for the social media snap.

Pixie attended the famous Coachella festival in April and had been staying in LA to work on her new music.

The blonde made a return to the pop scene with her hit Baby, a collaboration with producer Anton Powers, back in March, with her next album to be announced. 

Proving her career to be going from strength to strength, she is also preparing to judge series two of The Voice Kids with will.i.am and McFly's Danny Jones later this summer.

Amidst her chaotic work schedule, the blonde is also busy planning her 2019 wedding to model fiancé Oliver Cheshire.

The good-looking couple have been together for almost eight years, and the hunk popped the question at St Paul's Cathedral in November 2016.   

Last month, she celebrated her upcoming nuptials by treating a group of her closest pals and relatives to a lavish lunch at Quaglino's - and announced that she'd chosen them to be her bridesmaids.

The star picked her big sister Charlie-Ann to be her maid of honour as she treated her nearest and dearest to a three-course meal and and endless supply of fizz.

item.title: 'I am the luckiest girl in the entire world!' Nikki Gogan announces her new BOYFRIEND as she shares a gushing snap with mystery man
item.description: Nikki Gogan announced she is a taken woman this Wednesday.
item.content:encoded:
She has just spent the weekend celebrating her 31st birthday.

And it seems there's even more to celebrate for reality starlet Nikki Gogan, who announced she is a taken woman this Wednesday. 

Taking to Instagram, the former Bachelor runner-up shared a black-and-white photo of herself wrapping her arms around the neck of a mystery man, along with a caption confirming that she is loved-up. 

'Happy Birthday to meeee. I’ve had the best day (following the best weekend). Believe me when I say that I am the luckiest girl in the entire world,' cooed the blonde real estate agent. 

'I am surrounded and loved by the most incredible people and I am so so grateful (I haven’t had the opportunity to respond to you all yet but I will!). This has been the best Birthday ever and this man is a major part of that #taken'.   

Nikki was left heartbroken when she failed to win over Richie Strahan on The Bachelor in 2016, only to come runner-up.

And to make matters worse, she revealed earlier this year that she suffered extra heartache after being 'catfished' for eight months.

The blonde beauty revealed she met a man through her work - only for him to lie about being a rich 'property developer,' who drove pricey sports cars. 

'I had no reason not to believe what I was seeing and being told,' Nikki told New Idea. 

'It makes you really wonder how trusting you are when you realise how you accepted this big, elaborate story that ended up having so many holes,' she added.

The term 'catfishing' refers to a person who someone typically meets online, who deceives the other and often creates a fake relationship. 

A man called Matthew first met Nikki when he inspected one of her properties in Perth, pulling up in a luxury sports car. 

He then attended more inspections, driving a different car each time - which a friend of Nikki's said were borrowed or rented.

The publication reports Matthew also pretended to own a number of expensive properties in Perth and showered Nikki in 'designer' gifts.

After Matthew spent Christmas Day with Nikki and her family, she soon found out he was a liar when she met another woman in Perth who had the same story.

A friend of Nikki told New Idea that she's 'embarrassed.' 'She felt foolish after being lead along by Richie on The Bachelor and now this,' they said. 

However the publication reported that Nikki had developed a crush on AFL star Connor Blakely, 21, who recently bought a home from her.

Could Connor be the mystery man in the photo? 

Nikki won the hearts of the nation when she was left devastated, after Richie booted her off The Bachelor in the finale, before choosing Alex Nation as his winner.

However Richie and Alex's union was short-lived, with the single mother announcing she was in a same-sex relationship with Maegan Luxa last August.

In September, Nikki said she 'definitely wouldn't' date Richie, now he's single - ruling him out of this new development.

More recently, fans have been urging Nikki to date former Bachelorette star, Sasha Mielczarek, who was previously in a relationship with Sam Frost.

She was also tipped for an appearance on The Bachelorette and subsequently The Bachelor In Paradise but this never came to fruition.

Following this, and the catfishing scandal, Nikki has kept a low profile - until now.

item.title: Holly Willoughby makes rare outing in her gym gear as she shows off her slim figure in leggings and stylish mesh top ahead of This Morning
item.description: The 37-year-old TV presenter showed off her slim physique in black leggings and a coordinating black T-shirt as she made a high-spirited arrival at the venue.
item.content:encoded:
She's famed for her faultless sense of style, frequently leaving fans in awe of her chic ensembles.

But Holly Willoughby made a rare outing in her gym gear as she made her way into the ITV studios in a very relaxed outfit ahead of her stint on This Morning on Wednesday.

The 37-year-old TV presenter showed off her slim physique in black leggings and a coordinating black T-shirt as she made a high-spirited arrival at the venue. 

Holly's choice of top even flashed a glimpse of her bright pink sports bra thanks to its netted, mesh inserts above and beneath the bust.   

She toughened up the look with a black leather jacket and over-sized shades, while simple black running trainers completed her workout style. 

While Holly has remained tight-lipped on her fitness plan, insiders told New! magazine earlier this year that the mother-of-three is a fan of kickboxing, 

They claimed the Celebrity Juice star has been throwing herself into the intense sport to stay in shape - with each workout shedding a whopping 500-600 calories every hour.

The TV host has managed to fashion herself into something of a style icon thanks to her daily outfit posts which exhibit her polished style and weight loss - which is also said to be the result of mostly vegetables in her diet.   

A source said: 'Holly loves kickboxing and finds it an easy way to stay trim. She even has a kickboxing bag in her spare room, so she can work out at home.

'Holly does eat fish and occasionally chicken but it's mainly veggies. She watches her carbs and is conscious not to overload on the bad stuff.'

Using kickboxing will undoubtedly help Holly lose weight and fast as experts also spoke to New! magazine about the fantastic and quick results.

Insiders said: 'You can expect to burn around 500-600 calories in an hour of boxercise but it depends on your fitness levels.' 

Holly has been well-known for her curves throughout her 12 years in the spotlight, having started as a lingerie model and moved into presenting before becoming both a national TV sweetheart and a widespread pin-up.

item.title: Lily James discusses plans to slow down work to spend time with beau Matt Smith as she stuns for striking monochrome shoot
item.description: Lily James dished all about the strength of her romance with the hunky actor Matt Smith as she stunned for a striking new shoot with Marie Claire.
item.content:encoded:
She is happily in love with Matt Smith, who she has been dating since 2014. 

And Lily James has dished all about the strength of her romance with the hunky actor - admitting that she has found it difficult to find the perfect work/life balance and will consider slowing down in the future to focus on their relationship.

The candid interview accompanies a jaw-droppingly beautiful shoot with Marie Claire where the British star, 29, flaunts her sartorial flair in a series of monochrome ensembles.    

Lily spent months away from her man Matt last year, when she filmed Mamma Mia! in Croatia.

Clearly she wasn't too happy about it, revealing: ‘I’d like a few months where I go travelling and just switch off. When you’re an actor, its like, "you’ve got to keep the momentum up.” And I’m like, “No!” 

'You have to trust that things won’t go away if you stop for a bit. I haven’t really stopped, and I don’t think that’s a feasible way to work. For me, eventually, that’s not the lifestyle I want.

She revealed that her views affected everyone in her personal life: 'That’s not only with regards to my relationship with Matt, but with my friends and family. There’s so much you miss. That’s why I know I can’t keep working at this intensity. I finish a job; Matt starts one.’

Lily also revealed that they are in the process of buying a place together, which will inevitably be of a much more plusher feel than living in a London basement before she was famous.  

‘I used to go to work – to Downton Abbey – at 5am, and everyone would still be partying. It was like Vegas. I’d be like, “Keep going, I’ll be back in ten hours!”

Lily will next be seen in the hugely popular on-screen adaptation of Mamma Mia! - which will hit UK cinemas on 20 July.

Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again's release comes 10 years after the first film, which grossed over $600million (£444million) in the box office, and while the original cast are back in force, they will be joined by a host of new arrivals - including Lily.  

Lily will play a young Donna - a role taken on by iconic Meryl Streep.

Having to flaunt her singing chops for the flick, Lily honestly admitted: ‘In no way did it make me feel like (a pop career) was my calling. It did make me realise I love singing… I used to sing all the time.

When she was questioned over why she stopped, the Surrey-born star stated: 'I think acting sort of took over and I also screwed my voice. I kept losing it from stress.

'It started in Cinderella (2015 movie). You can’t miss a day, so you keep talking through it and go on steroids – and over the next few years I damaged it so much, I stopped singing. '

Lily mentioned that the damage led to a 'weird relationship with her voice.'

'I was frightened of it, but the tone changes as you age. It was freeing and wonderful to embrace it (again),' she thankfully expressed.

As part of the acting business, Lily was also quick to off her opinions on the Time's Up Movement.   

'I feel strengthened by it and intrigued to see how things will change. Obviously, this moment has come out of a really awful time, and the reality of what was being covered up and happening is harrowing. 

'But, personally, I feel braver in being honest about how I feel about things.’ 

Lily explained: 'At times I’ve felt I could laugh away things or I was just used to the way people talked to me, or behaved towards me. I don’t think anyone would even dare now.’

To read the feature in full, see the July issue of Marie Claire, out now.

item.title: Love Island 2018: Adam Collard's ex likes brutal Tweets branding the show 'cringey' and his co-stars 'dry as bread'
item.description: The stunning brunette was spotted liking a number of brutal Tweets about the ITV2 show on Tuesday, in a subtle dig at her former flame.
item.content:encoded:
He has captivated viewers and islanders alike with his good looks and hunky physique.

But one person who is far from happy about Adam Collard's appearance on Love Island is his ex-girlfriend, Claudia Proctor.

The stunning brunette was spotted liking a number of brutal Tweets about the ITV2 show on Tuesday, in a subtle dig at her former flame. 

Claudia, who boasts close to 1,500 followers, proved to be annoyed by her ex's appearance after liking a string of posts slamming the show - just one day after Adam entered the house.

Two messages fiercely blasted the series itself, reading: 'love island needs a rebrand to sausage island what a set of doggggnuts' and 'Catching up on love island and cringing so much lol' (sic)

Meanwhile other Tweets hit out at Adam's castmates, reading: 'Actually fully fancied Hayley until I realised she's dry as bread. I was rooting for you b**** we were all rooting for you b****'

And the more brutal: ''Mile high club' and 'my friends boyfriend' lmaooo v good first impression #LoveIsland'

Claudia has not yet Tweeted about Adam or the show directly, but appeared to make another dig at her ex and his stint on the show last month.

According to The Sun, she wrote: 'It's insane how hellbent some people can be on ruining your happiness.'

Claudia and Adam dated last year, and even enjoyed romantic breaks to Las Vegas and Bali together.

However, the personal trainer revealed to the paper that they parted ways just before he entered the villa, due to her worries about him training female clients.

He said: 'It was a lot of insecurities on her end. We had our differences. I get quite a bit of attention because of the way I look and Instagram is a big thing.'

Tuesday night's viewing was no doubt uncomfortable for Claudia, as Adam became the first islander to go on a date.

The Newcastle native stole Kendall Rae-Knight from her partner Niall Aslam at the start of the episode, and proceeded to wine and dine her in a candle-lit clearing.

Clicking from the start, Adam even drew the brunette in for a kiss towards the end of their date, in the first official smooch of the series.

It is no wonder Adam wasted no time in locking lips with Kendall - having already revealed he was open to having sex in the villa. 

Speaking to MailOnline ahead of the show, he said: '''ll probably have sex on TV, but it's not that bad. 

'I'm in there for eight weeks and I'm sharing a bed with someone, so I'm not gonna be surprised if something happens.

'I said I'm hoping to find someone who takes my fancy so much where I'm like 'this could work outside.' I hope someone takes my attention enough where I'll probably stick with her, and that's where I might get a little bit protective.'

item.title: Katie Price's mother Amy reveals why she's refusing a lung transplant from her daughter as she says the model is 'feeling positive' following marital split
item.description: Katie Price’s mother Amy Price spoke to Loose Women on Wednesday about her decision to refuse a lung transplant from her daughter, Katie.
item.content:encoded:
Katie Price’s mother Amy Price spoke to Loose Women on Wednesday about her decision to refuse a lung transplant from her daughter, Katie. 

The 64-year-old was diagnosed with IPF,  a rare condition that causes progressive and irreversible scarring of the lungs last year, but she says she won't let Katie, 40, take any risks in order to save her life.

She said: 'I can’t take one of her lungs, it’s ridiculous. I might not survive the operation for a start, so it’d be a waste of a lung and she needs it.

'She’s got her own family and her children. She’ll be like the figurehead of the family when I go.'

Amy said her recent check-ups at the hospital have been positive, despite Katie being told back in April her mother could die within a month. 

Amy said: 'The NHS have been brilliant with me. I went for tests to have a transplant, but I'm too fit to have one which I'm really pleased about. 

'They keep an eye on me, and if they see me deteriorate they can decide whether to put me on the list or not.’ 

Contracting an innocuous cold could have a fatal outcome for the lung condition she is battling. 

Amy said that Katie has now come to terms with things and they've been helping one another through it.

She said: 'I think she’s accepted it [my illness] and we support each other really. 

‘She's quite soft really, and I think out of all my children she's probably taken it the hardest, because she hasn't really got many good friends.’

‘In February, I went to a yoga retreat and she came over. She's so unfit I couldn't believe it.’

WHAT IS IDIOPATHIC PULMONARY FIBROSIS?

Idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis (IPF) is a condition in which the lungs become scarred and breathing becomes increasingly difficult.

It's not clear what causes it, but it usually affects people around 70-75 years of age and is rare in people under 50.

Several treatments can help reduce the rate at which IPF gets worse, but there's currently no treatment that can stop or reverse the scarring of the lungs.

The symptoms of IPF tend to develop gradually and get slowly worse over time.

Symptoms can include:

There is no cure and it's very difficult to predict how long someone with IPF will survive at the time of diagnosis. 

Regular monitoring over time can indicate whether it's getting worse quickly or slowly.

Source: NHS Choices

While Katie is going through a much-publicised split from husband Kieran Hayler, 31, Amy said: ‘I don't want to talk about what's going on.

'Katie's doing alright. I would say, now, I think she’s coming out of the doom and gloom and she’s really quite positive.' 

Speaking to Now magazine in an emotional interview back in April, Katie shared: 'My mum is dying, it’s that simple. They normally diagnose is three to five years but Mum has already had to change her life.

'She’s sold her house because of the stairs. She really struggles with them. But she could get a cold now not get rid of it, and die within month – that’s how bad it is... Either way, she hasn’t got long.' 

While Katie is getting her head around things, Amy said it's hard to know what to tell her grandchildren.

She said: 'Harvey wouldn’t understand. But he’s doing really well. I would say that Junior and Princess understand, but the other two are too young.

'I think they know but they just look at me thinking, "Well Nan’s still here, she looks well, what’s going to happen?"

'I’ve written letters to them all but I'm going to give them to them yet. The one for Kate is going to be like this [thick]. You must do this... you must do that.'

Amy, who is raising awareness for the British Lung Foundation said she is not feeling too bad, nine months after her shock diagnosis. 

She said: 'I think I've got worse in the way breathing wise, but it hasn’t impacted my life.

'I have to check my oxygen levels don’t drop too much. I use an oximeter. If they drop, I slow down and then carry on again.

‘I do everything. It's so important when you’ve got a lung condition to keep moving. You've got to keep strong. I did a spin class this morning.' 

In September, Amy appeared on Loose Women and went into detail about her condition and explained that she was previously diagnosed with asthma before they released she had IPF.

She said: 'I was under local doctor for about five years for asthma, I kept going back saying inhalers aren't working. Then I had a chest infection they said, "OK, go and have an X-ray and something showed up."

'My doctor referred me to a specialist, he said yes, you've got a condition. It means that there's scarring of the lungs and it actually will stop you breathing. It's progressive - in the end you won't be able to breath.'

Amy went on to say she was furious to be struck down with such a condition - as she has always worked hard on staying healthy.

She said: 'I’ve never smoked. I’ve always been a sports person. I go to the gym every morning, I do maybe two hours every morning and I’ve done that for years and years and I’ve never smoked. And that’s why I was so surprised I’ve got a lung condition.

'I'm fuming. I’m fuming over it because I’ve been healthy all of my life.'
item.dc:abstract: Katie Price’s mother Amy Price spoke to Loose Women on Wednesday about her decision to refuse a lung transplant from her daughter, Katie. The 64-year-old was diagnosed with a terminal lung condition last year, but says she won't let Katie, 40, take any risks in order to save her life. She said: 'I can’t take one of her lungs, it’s ridiculous. I might not survive the operation for a start, so it’d be a waste of a lung and she needs it.

item.title: Real Housewives Of Orange County star Meghan King Edmonds welcomes twin boys
item.description: The Real Housewives of Orange County star's husband Jim Edmonds, 47 - a retired baseball star - shared the happy news on Wednesday morning on social media.
item.content:encoded:
Meghan King Edmonds, 33, has welcomed twins boys.

The Real Housewives of Orange County star's husband Jim Edmonds, 47 - a retired baseball player - shared the happy news on Wednesday morning on social media.

'1 little foot each,' he wrote next to a photo of the children's foot prints on his arm. He added, 'They made it. Everyone is safe and healthy.' The sports announcer then said that the 'pictures will come soon.'

They already have 18-month-old daughter Aspen. He also has four other children from a previous marriage.

In late May she revealed her huge baby bump in a string bikini as she played in the pool with her little one. 

The blonde posted the cute pool picture on Instagram captioned: 'Warning: Use protective eyewear when viewing this photo,' adding the hashtag #36weekspregnantwithtwins.'

Meghan maintained a sense of humor while heavily pregnant. She shared a video showing her legs and stomach as she lounged on a recliner poolside.

'I may or may not be naked, who knows anymore,' she joked because her burgeoning belly completely obscured her bikini bottoms. 

Another snap showed Meghan standing in the water as Aspen climbs on the pool’s stairs, where she joked that she was wearing a prosthetic belly due to its extreme size.

She then re-captioned the picture to confirm it's her real stomach, with a heart drawn around it.

'Ps I’m measuring 47 weeks pregnant nbd,' she wrote. 'So you prob don’t look as big as me but thanks for the consolation.'

Meghan, who had to use IVF to get pregnant both times, admitted life was much more difficult at 36 weeks gone.

'I’m getting miserable,' she told People, laughing. 'I feel like the babies are like, in my ears. And most definitely in my lungs. I am really struggling with breathing. You can really tell in my Instagram Stories.'

She added, 'I’ll listen to them back and I’m breathing so heavily just doing nothing. Plus, I can’t feel my legs. And bending over is, like, a thing in the past.

'I’m so ridiculously pregnant, I can hardly move off the couch,' she added. 'We just had a cleaning lady come today — I don’t even know how she did, because I’m too tired to look. That’s where I’m at.' 

And mornings are really difficult with Aspen.

'I have a nanny and she’s been so good — and Jimmy’s been so helpful too — but waking up with Aspen in the morning, that’s even hard,' Meghan explained.

'I can get her out of the crib and stuff, but going up and down my stairs is tough. I want her to be able to have fun and go to the park, but I can’t walk around the park anymore.

'It makes me sad. It’s a hard place to be.' 

Meghan said she planned to have the twins as naturally as possible, saying on her blog: 'I’ve prepped my body by treating it like a temple through nourishment, I’ve prepped my mind by breathing and meditating, I’ve prepped my spirit by praying: I’ve got this. Let’s do it.'

item.title: 'Blessed be the fruit!' AFL WAG Rebecca Judd dons a scarlet gown and fur-trim hooded cape as she dresses up as Handmaid's Tale character
item.description: The Handmaid's Tale is known for its gripping storytelling and the now instantly recognisable handmaid costume.
item.content:encoded:
The Handmaid's Tale is known for its gripping storytelling and its instantly recognisable handmaid costume.

And Rebecca Judd couldn't resist trying her hand at dressing up herself, as she donned her own version of the handmaid outfit on Wednesday.

The 35-year-old AFL WAG channelled Elisabeth Moss' character of Offred with her ensemble, rocking a full scarlet skirt and a fur-trim hooded cape. 

Scroll down for video 

Getting fully into character, she layered a navy satin skirt underneath and gave the look a modern twist with a pair of studded Chloe boots. 

Sweeping her glossy dark locks back into a severe topknot, she framed her features with minimal make-up.  

Clearly proud of her efforts, she shared a snap of her outfit on Instagram and referred to the greeting 'blessed be the fruit' used by handmaids in the show in her caption: 'More is more #blessedbethefruit.'

The TV presenter, who is married to AFL star Chris Judd, also shared a second costumed photo on her Instagram Stories. 

Taking off her hooded cape, she posed regally with a fan in her hands in front of an intricate painting. 

Judd later changed out of her costume in favour of a more contemporary look consisting of black jeans and a military-inspired navy coat.

Rebecca posted the snaps from the open-air museum Sovereign Hill, where she was filming segments for her travel and lifestyle TV show, Postcards.

With period costumes and an abundance of fake snow on hand, it appears that Rebecca has something special planned for her TV show to coincide with the museum's upcoming Winter Wonderlights event.

Sovereign Hill's Winter Wonderlights event will take place on June 30th.

item.title: Laura Prepon's net worth revealed after OINTB star's wedding to Ben Foster
item.description: Laura Prepon revealed on June 3, 2018 that she and longtime boyfriend Ben Foster were married. The pair are reported to have begun dating in 2016 and welcomed their first child together in summer 2017.
item.content:encoded:
Laura Prepon is officially a married woman.

The Orange is the New Black star and longtime boyfriend Ben Foster tied the knot over the weekend. Laura, 38, shared a photo of her and the father of her only child on their big day with Instagram followers, thanking them 'for all the love and support'.

Laura and Ben's wedding comes nearly one year after they welcomed their first child together. Their daughter, Ella, will be one this summer.

Who is Laura Prepon?

Laura Prepon is an American actress born on March 7, 1980 in New Jersey.

The 38-year-old is one of five children born to Marjorie and Michael Prepon. Her father died when she was 13, however. 

After finishing high school at Watchung Hills Regional High School, Laura went on the study at the Total Theatre Lab in New York City.

She got her start as a stage actress, appearing in plays like A Woman of Property and Ascension Day in the '90s. From there, she scored her first major role — and perhaps her most notable — as Donna Pinciotti on That '70s Show. She appeared on the show until it ended in 2006.

Back behind the camera directing #OITNB! Love our amazing #orangefamily! ❤️🍊

A post shared by Laura Prepon (@lauraprepon) on Jan 16, 2018 at 9:26am PST

Laura continued to act, but wasn't in anything with a massive following until Netflix's Orange is the New Black, which she still co-stars on.

Laura married longtime boyfriend Ben Foster at the start of June 2018. The pair are believed to have begun dating in 2016. 

They welcomed their first child together in mid-to-late summer 2017, though the exact date of their daughter's birth remains unconfirmed. 

Laura Prepon net worth

According to Bankrate, Laura Prepon's net worth is $12 million (£8.9m).

How did Laura Prepon make her money?

Laura Prepon made the majority of her money as an actress, though she's done some work as a model. 

Her big break came in 1998 when she appeared on That '70s Show as Donna Pinciotti.

She also appeared in Slackers, Southlander, The Pornographer: A Love Story, Lightening Bug, How I Met Your Mother and, most recently, Orange Is the New Black.

Waiting for #OITNB season 6 like…

A post shared by Laura Prepon (@lauraprepon) on May 31, 2018 at 9:46am PDT

Laura Prepon and Orange is the New Black 

Laura Prepon has been playing Alex Vause in Netflix's Orange is the New Black since 2013. Her character is the love interest of co-star Taylor Schilling's Piper Chapman.

The show and its characters are based on the real-life memoir of a woman called Piper Kerman. The book is called 'Orange Is the New Black: My Year in a Women's Prison.'

Where the real Piper was held in a real low-security prison called FCI Danbury, Orange Is the New Black is set in a fictional facility called Litchfield. 

On the Netflix original series, Piper is a woman in her 30s who was sentenced to 15-months in prison after being caught transporting a suitcase full of drug money for Alex, whom she was dating at the time. Alex was an international drug smuggler.

#ThrowbackThursday to filming one of my favorite #OITNB episodes with @lori_petty! I talked about it on Facebook Live this Tuesday - check out the full video on my Facebook page.

A post shared by Laura Prepon (@lauraprepon) on Apr 5, 2018 at 8:44am PDT

She was also busted and found herself in Litchfield with Piper, who had since moved on and married a man called Larry (Jason Biggs).

Behind bars, the scorned exes found that they still had love for one another and ended up back together. Their relationship was eventually rocked by the many trials and tribulations both women faced while staying at the prison.

In addition to focusing on the relationship between Piper and Alex, Orange Is the New Black shines a light on very real issues like corruption, funding cuts, overcrowding, excessive force and so on in the American prison system.  

Fans of the show are currently awaiting the release of the sixth season. 

Laura Prepon cookbook 

Laura Prepon co-authored a cookbook called The Stash Plan with a woman by the name of Elizabeth Troy. The book is about a 21-day plan to help readers shed weight and reach the peak of 'overall wellness'.

The actress often showcases her love of cooking on Instagram. She shares photos of prepared meals as well as videos of her process. 

Laura often shares new and tried and true recipes with her followers.

Come hang with me on Tuesday at 2pm EST! I’ll be doing a Facebook Live Q&A about #TheStashPlan with @CatGreenleaf. To join us, go to my Facebook page!

A post shared by Laura Prepon (@lauraprepon) on Mar 31, 2018 at 11:32am PDT

Laura Prepon husband 

Laura Prepon is married to Ben Foster, who she's thought to have been dating since 2016. They have reportedly been close friends since they were teens.

The pair have one child together, Ella, who was born in summer 2017.

Laura announced her marriage to Ben on Sunday, June 3, 2018. They were spotted picking up their marriage license from the New York City clerk's office in May, however.

Who is Ben Foster?

Ben Foster, Laura Prepon's husband, is also an actor. He was born on October 29, 1980 and comes from Boston, Massachusetts.   

He and his family moved to Iowa when he was young after their home was broken into while they were inside. 

There, he attended the Maharishi University of Management. 

Ben got his start as an actor at 16. Early on in his career he landed a role on the series Flash Forward. From there he went on to start in Get Over It, Six Feet Under, The Punished, X-Men: The Last Stand, Alpha Dog and more. 

Before Ben dated Laura Prepon, he was in a relationship with Robin Wright. 

In 2014, they were engaged to be married. They called it off that November only to reconcile a short while later. 

Ben and Robin's reunion was short-lived, though. They called it quits again, this time for good, in August 2015.

Ben and Laura are thought to have started dating in July 2016. They were engaged that October and announced they were expecting a child in January 2017.

Now, Ben and Laura are happily married. 

With a busy schedule, falling behind on laundry, and an early call time - sometimes you gotta resort to using your daughter’s unicorn towel.

A post shared by Laura Prepon (@lauraprepon) on Dec 5, 2017 at 12:50pm PST

Laura Prepon height 

Laura Prepon is five-feet, 10-inches tall. 

How tall is Ben Foster? 

Ben Foster is five-feet, nine-inches tall.  

Laura Prepon baby

Laura Prepon and Ben Foster welcomed a baby girl called Ella in mid-to-late summer 2017, according to E! Online. The child's birth date remains a mystery. 

The actress has never shared a photo of her daughter, though she does occasionally post about her in other ways on Instagram.

She shared a photo of her daughter's onesies hanging on a drying rack. She also regularly shared photos of her baby bump during her pregnancy.
item.dc:abstract: Laura Prepon revealed on June 3, 2018 that she and longtime boyfriend Ben Foster were married. The pair are reported to have begun dating in 2016 and welcomed their first child together in summer 2017. The Orange Is the New Black star and her hubby have kept much of their lives together so far very private and will likely continue to do so into their marriage. They have released just one photo from their wedding and none of their daughter since her birth close to one year ago. It's unlikely that fans will get more details on Laura and Ben's big day.
