item.title: Love Island PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Gabby Allen, Tina Stinnes and Cara De La Hoyde sizzle in matching black swimsuits as they spend the last day of Olivia Buckland's hen do on a luxury yacht
item.description: Leading the sexy displays was newly-single Gabby, 26, who sizzled in her plunging black swimsuit as she paraded around the luxury boat with her pals.
item.content:encoded:
They have been enjoying a raucous girls' trip to Mykonos for Olivia Buckland's seemingly never-ending hen do. 

And it seemed the bridal party saved the best activity for last as Gabby Allen, Cara De La Hoyde and Tina Stinnes stripped down to matching swimsuits and took to the seas on Wednesday, as the spent the day larking around on board a lavish yacht.

Leading the sexy displays was newly-single Gabby, 26, who sizzled in her plunging black swimsuit as she paraded around the luxury boat with her pals.

Making the most of her last day in the sunshine, the Love Island star topped up her tan in a high-cut swimming costume, which flashed her perky derriere.  

Letting the sun infiltrate her glowing complexion, Gabby chose to keep her face free of make-up and swept her short blonde locks away from her face. 

Sharing a sneaky peek of life on the vessel on Instagram, the reality TV beauty shared a cheeky snap of herself posing against the idyllic blue sea, writing: 'Last full day in Mykonos...'

It came moments before new mum Cara posted a picture of the girls cuddling up to one another and laughing as they partied at sea.

'Every brunette needs her blonde besties,' she captioned the sweet snap, which is the latest in a flurry of shots she shared on her Instagram. 

Gabby has also been keeping her fellow hens entertained by performing yoga classes around the pool of their plush villa, though bride-to-be Olivia proved she wasn't taking part yesterday as she instead shared a clip of herself eating cheese and Frazzle sandwiches while her friends worked out.   

Olivia has jetted on holiday ahead of her wedding to Alex, who will no doubt be enjoying an equally raucous stag do in the coming weeks.

The pair met on the 2016 series of Love Island, and continued their relationship outside the Majorcan villa and set up home in Olivia's native Essex just months later. 

After a whirlwind romance, the duo became engaged in December that year, with Alex popping the question during a festive getaway to New York City. 

Speaking to MailOnline last month, Olivia admitted she never dreamed of meeting her Mr Right on the reality show and confessed her relationship with Alex came as a total shock.

She said: 'It’s the last thing I thought would happen. It is crazy to think that two years ago I was in a much different position to what I am in now. I was actually like "I hate men" when I went into the villa.'

Before joking of his input in wedding planning: 'I mean, he helps out with the decision making but he usually just sits there like "what is this?" But he does try hard to help out and add his opinion on things.

item.title: She said YES! Love Island's controversial couple Grant Crapp and Tayla Damir reveal their engagement plans after dating for less than a week
item.description: They're a controversial couple on Love Island, after he ditched ex-lover Cassidy McGill for her.
item.content:encoded:
They became the most controversial couple on Love Island when he ditched Cassidy McGill for her.

And now Grant Crapp, 22, and Tayla Damir, 21, have revealed that their feelings for each other have grown so strong that they would consider getting engaged.

During a game called 'truth bike' on Wednesday's episode, Tayla admitted she would say 'yes' to Grant if he popped the question at the end of the show.

Scroll down for video 

'At the end of Love Island, if Grant asked you to marry him, would you say yes?' Tayla was asked when she took her place on top of the bike. 

Giggling at the abrupt question, Tayla rung the bicycle bell to indicate that she would say yes.

Her fellow Islander Justin, was clearly shocked at her admission and pointed out that the end of the show was in just four weeks.

Tayla then defended her answer, saying: 'Yeah, but you can be engaged for like four years to someone.'

To camera, the brunette beauty added: 'I said yes but listen, you can be engaged to someone and have a bloody nice ring on your finger for at least four to five years!'

Grant then spoke to camera and considered what Tayla would say if he proposed. 

'If I did that, do you personally think she'd say yes?' he asked. 

Meanwhile when Grant was on the bike, he was asked if he was 'falling in love with Tayla'.  

'F**k, that's intense man,' he said grinning, before dinging the bell and answering yes.  

Meanwhile, Erin was asked if she was falling in love with Eden - to which she replied that she was.

She also admitted she would relocate to Sydney for him, and that he's the best looking man she's ever been with.

item.title: Vogue Williams SLAMS cruel trolls for 'fat-shaming' her at seven months pregnant as she admits she 'can't wait to get bigger'
item.description: Pregnant Vogue Williams, 32, only had one thing on her mind, as she took to her Instagram Stories on Tuesday to vent about being 'fat-shamed' by cruel online trolls.
item.content:encoded:
She is reportedly tying the knot with beau Spencer Matthews this weekend. 

But Vogue Williams, 32, only had one thing on her mind, as she took to her Instagram Stories on Tuesday to vent about being 'fat-shamed' by cruel online trolls.     

The model-DJ, 32, was defiant as she hit back: 'I actually just have to laugh at the people fat shaming me. I'm seven months pregnant, the online world is a nasty little place. 

Making her point clear, Vogue continued: 'Myself and my larger body are very happy and looking forward to getting even bigger.'

The rest of Vogue's week has been a cause of celebration as she was joined by friends and family for her baby shower - which was documented on her social media platform.    

Vogue made sure to show off the delicious treats served at the shindig, with blue iced cupcakes and an intricately designed cake with adorable blue ice shoes carved on top.

The beauty's baby shower comes after it was rumoured the model with be marrying the TV star within the next week.

The pair are thought to be getting hitched at Spencer's family's 10,000-acre Glen Affric Estate in Cannich, Scotland, which can cost holidaymakers £900 a night plus VAT, and includes a chauffeur service to and from Inverness airport.

A source told The Sun: 'It is understood the wedding will be private and low-key. They are keen to make their union official before becoming parents.

'Spencer and Vogue have only told people in their close circle, but are likely to have more of an extravagant and star-studded party after the baby is born.'

Vogue recently let slip the gender of her and Spencer's unborn baby during a TV interview with RTE One's Cutting Edge.

Discussing how she was coping with pregnancy, Vogue told the panellists: 'I'm not eating for two people. My baby is the size of an heirloom tomato today, I Googled it.'

Host Brendan O'Connor quizzed her: 'A little tomato... Is it happy in there right now on television?' Vogue then quipped: 'He's delighted with himself!'

'Is he? So it's a boy?' the presenter asked her, prompting Vogue to laugh nervously and hide her face in her hands.

As the audience gave her round of applause, the fitness-loving star cackled, 'I hate you! I knew I would do it!'

Spencer and Vogue announced their pregnancy one month after confirming their engagement after he proposed following a performance of The Lion King at London's Lyceum Theatre in February.

They have been together since January 2017 after meeting on reality show The Jump.

Vogue was previously married to former Westlife singer Brian McFadden, 38, from 2012 to 2015. Spencer's elder brother, James Matthews, 42, is married to Kate Middleton's younger sister Pippa, 34.

item.title: Lily Allen confirms her divorce from ex-husband Sam Cooper went through this week... two years after their split
item.description: Lily Allen has confirmed she is officially divorced from ex husband Sam Cooper, three years after their split.
item.content:encoded:
Lily Allen has confirmed she is officially divorced from ex husband Sam Cooper, two years after revealing their split.

The 33-year-old singer, who recently admitted to being unfaithful to Sam after struggling to cope with fame, confirmed the official end of the pair's marriage in a candid interview on Loose Women on Wednesday.

The Hard Out Here hitmaker confirmed her split from Sam, 40, in 2016 following more than a year of speculation, and five years of marriage. The former couple, who share daughters Ethel, six and Marnie, five, first began dating in 2009.

Scroll down for video 

Lily said : 'I can use the D-word... [I've been] divorced for three days now.'

The Smile songstress said she shares a 'very friendly' relationship with Sam, and that the pair have an unconventional custody agreement, where they take their daughters for alternative weeks at a time.

She said: 'Me and my ex-husband share custody, a week on and a week off, which is useful for me work, when he's got them, I can do that.'

While Lily and Sam aren't together any more, she admitted they are still 'really friendly'.

Asked how they came to the custody agreement, she said: 'It wasn't really something we discussed, we're both really friendly, our kids go to school equidistant between our houses, so it works.'

‘I left home quite a lot when I was young, I think I moved out when I was 15 or 16, my parents are quite unique. My mum was busy working away in America she couldn't keep an eye on me anyway.

‘I signed a record deal when I was 15, and I had a bit of money so I moved in with my boyfriend. I have no regrets.’   

The star also opened up about feeling guilt over leaving her children when she goes away to work and revealed it had inspired her new album. 

She said: ‘I wrote a song called Three which is from the perspective of my children which is about when I leave to go on tour for long periods of time.

‘It's half what I imagine them to be thinking and half what I'm projecting.

‘I was reading a book, I wrote the song when the kids were two and three and obviously they can’t articulate and this book is thinking about things from their perspective. 

You want to shower them with love, but then in contrast going "ok bye I'm going to work now" it must be really confusing for them.

‘They think "it's my fault they left".'

Talking about the inspiration behind her songs, she said: ‘I have my studio days and it might be something I've read in the newspaper or having a fight with my mum or having not seen my kids for a couple of days.

‘I don't think that they were contrived, but I was certainly working to other people's time constraints. I blew up when I was 19, and it was only having ten years in the industry I thought maybe I can manoeuvre this to my own work.

‘It's open to however the listener wants to interpret it, it's very harrowing it's very honest, some people would shy away from talking about those subjects, bt I'm like here I am talking about it, hopefully I can absolve myself of some guilt and some shame.

‘I want to have the confidence to own my own work and narrative, it's difficult as a woman to say I did this. This is mine. Sometimes we feel guilty and shameful for being successful.’

This comes after Lily admitted that she cheated on her husband after struggles with fame led her to lose her identity.

The singer told Vulture that she blames some of her lost self and personal troubles on her comeback to music in 2014.

Lily added that it was during her time away from the spotlight to focus on motherhood that she lost control of her image, but now feels she is turning back towards her best.

Speaking to the publication Lily admitted that she needed the help of others to regain a celebrity image after spending time focusing on her children, and it was then that the control over her image began to slip away.

She said: 'I was 14 stone and I had to lose all that weight. I wasn't eating, I wasn't sleeping. I'd always been in control of my image, but I'd been a mum in slippers and a dressing gown for two years.' 

Lily also admitted that she felt her struggles dealing with fame led her to cheat on husband Sam Cooper - the father of her two children Ethel, seven, and Marnie, five -who she split from in 2016

She added: ‘I lost my sense of self. I lost my identity. I was being a bad mum. I was being bad at my job. I’d wake up on a tour bus in the middle of Wisconsin and be so hung-over.

'I cheated on my husband. All I wanted to do was be with my kids. I wasn’t even making any money.' 

In the interview Lily also confessed that despite her identity conflicts at the time she doesn't hate the work on her most recent album Sheezus, and her discomfort at finishing the album's tour actually came from her work on that Christmas' John Lewis advert.

Her cover of Keane's Somewhere Only We Know shot to number one after featuring in the animated/live action hybrid ad The Bear And The Hare, but Lily says that she didn't see a penny in revenue.

But despite her recent struggles Lily appears to have bounced back in spectacular form, preparing to release a new album No Shame next month and recently saying that she and her two children are really close now and have a 'great relationship.'
item.dc:abstract: Lily Allen has confirmed she is officially divorced from ex husband Sam Cooper, three years after their split. The 33-year-old singer, who recently admitted to being unfaithful to Sam after struggling to cope with fame, confirmed the official end of the pair's marriage in a candid interview on Loose Women on Wednesday.

item.title: 'I felt objectified!' Tegan Martin reveals the discomfort she felt while competing in swimsuit component of Miss Universe
item.description: Tegan Martin, 25, has spoken candidly about the discomfort she felt while competing in swimsuit component of Miss Universe.
item.content:encoded:
Tegan Martin has spoken candidly about her negative experiences while competing in the bikini portion of Miss Universe in 2014.  

Speaking to Daily Telegraph, the 25-year-old said she felt 'objectified' by the segment, which sees contestants parade around in skimpy swimwear. 

'I personally felt objectified with that portion of the pageant,' she told the publication. 

Scroll down for video 

'It would have been a lot less of a stressful experience without it. However it was my choice to enter and I knew it was a part of the competition,' she explained.  

'The feeling of walking out on stage knowing the judges are giving you a number and comparing your body to the girl next to you is not a good feeling,' she said. 

The model also admitted that she felt pressure to lose an unhealthy amount of weight for her body type as a result of the portion. 

Tegan's comments come after Miss America announced the removal of the bikini portion of the pageant, effective as of this year's contest which takes place in September. 

On Wednesday Gretchen Carlson, the new head of Miss America's board of directors, revealed that the pageant will no longer judge women based on their physical appearance.

'We are no longer a pageant,' Carlson told Good Morning America on Tuesday. 'We are a competition.'

The decision comes months after internal emails revealed former CEO Sam Haskell and board members frequently demeaned the physical appearance, intellect, and personal lives of former pageant winners, including Carlson.

Instead contestants will be asked to wear any attire that makes them feel confident, expresses their personal style, and shows how they will advance the role of Miss America.

'We've heard from a lot of young woman who say, "We'd love to be a part of your program but we don't want to be out there in high heels and a swimsuit"', Carlson said.

'So guess what, you don't have to do that anymore.'
item.dc:abstract: Tegan Martin has spoken candidly about her negative experiences while competing in the bikini portion of Miss Universe in 2014. Speaking to Daily Telegraph, the 25-year-old said she felt 'objectified' by the segment, which sees contestants parade around in skimpy swimwear.

item.title: Katie Piper reveals she struggled with anxiety after giving birth to her second child... as she unveils incredible figure after losing TWO stone
item.description: Katie Piper has revealed that she struggled with anxiety after giving birth to her second child. The 34-year-old TV presenter was appearing on Lorraine Kelly on Wednesday about lifestyle overhaul.
item.content:encoded:
Katie Piper has revealed that she struggled with anxiety after giving birth to her second child.

The 34-year-old TV presenter told Lorraine Kelly on Wednesday that since admitting to her mental health struggles, she has been channelling it into helping other mums in similar situations.

Katie's appearance came as she revealed her incredible figure just six months after welcoming daughter Penelope, losing two stone after overhauling her diet and fitness regime.

Scroll down for video 

Katie told Lorraine that she believed her anxiety struggles partially stemmed from her diet and lifestyle, as she chatted about her new book with weight loss guru TerriAnn Nunns.

She said: 'In the plan we talk about how anxiety can be linked to diet and lack of exercise and lack of sleep. It was that ownership of saying I do have anxiety, it can be everyday small worries or physical symptoms.

'It's acknowledging it's OK. We set up a forum and you can log in and talk to other mums.'

Katie said that her decision to overhaul her daily regime was part of a plan to steadily lose her baby weight, adding that she was most focused on happiness and health rather than her dress size.

She added: 'I met TerriAnn, who over ten years has lost seven stone, and we got together and I didn't want it to be just about weight loss, because you can't get happiness from losing weight.

'You've got to be fit to have two kids, it's about healthy eating, exercise and good choices. My hope for this is that it is a lifestyle, well-being and mental health, and you can stay on it forever.'

Katie added: 'I have lost my baby weight, but I can also do a 16 hour day and stay enthusiastic.

'As a mum there's a lot of opportunities to go from baby group to baby group from biscuit to biscuit. I breastfed for the first seven or eight weeks, so for the first two months I didn't do anything. 

'I think for me I don't like all these unhealthy comparisons, you've got to strive to be you. Having had health problems the best thing you can be is to be as healthy as possible.'

Katie added that her new lifestyle has completely changed her outlook on food, and tries to avoid having any distractions during mealtimes to bond with her family. 

'I notice the difference I can wake up early I get to sleep properly,' she said.

'If I'm eating lunch I don't sit scrolling on my phone, I put the phone away and concentrate on what I'm eating.

'Even as a mother mealtimes can be bonding time with the family, use that moment because they are special moments.'

Katie put on a stylish display as she headed to Television Centre in London for the interview, rocking a bold summer look by teaming an orange slogan t-shirt with yellow checked trousers.

The blonde beauty sported a cute top emblazoned with the word Loved along with her printed trousers and white studded heels.

Keeping her feathery tresses in simple waves, Katie highlighted her flawless complexion by sporting a classic smoky eye and nude lip.

item.description: The contestants on Love Island typically walk around their Spanish villa in their tiny bikinis and board shorts.
item.content:encoded:
The contestants on Love Island typically walk around their Spanish villa in their tiny bikinis and board shorts. 

But this Wednesday, Grant and Elias chose to strip down even further as they hit the kitchen to prepare a tapas luncheon for their co-stars.

In a hilarious piece-to-camera, Millie said she was almost turned off her food when Grant and Elias told the girls that the food was ready, delivering the dishes while completely nude under their aprons. 

Scroll down for video   

As part of a joke, Grant and Elias took off their swimwear before they made their way over to the girls to tell them about the meal.

The boys wore nothing but aprons, leaving their derrieres exposed. 

Grant jokingly did a funny dance and said: 'Alright ladies, we're letting you know that your luncheon has now been served, so if you'd like to come.'

Millie said to camera: 'It nearly turned me off my food completely.' 

She added: 'Nothing was really cooked, they sliced up some cheese and stuff,' with thew boys in charge of cooking. 

'But it was really cute. They did a good job.'

Natasha meanwhile joked: 'To be honest, I didn't really mind them walking out with their you-know-what showing, their bum cheeks,' she said. 

'But it gave us a reason to go upstairs and wax Grant's a**e!'

Afterwards, the Islanders waxed Grant's posterior, with Grant screaming in pain while getting the beauty treatment, leaving his co-stars in fits of laughter.

In a hilarious piece-to-camera, Millie said she was almost turned off her food when Grant and Elias told the girls that the food was ready, delivering the dishes while completely nude under their aprons.

item.title: Amber Heard strips naked to star alongside ex-husband Johnny Depp in controversial movie London Fields
item.description: They famously split in May 2016 following an 18-month marriage, finalising their divorce in January 2017.
item.content:encoded:
They famously split in May 2016 following an 18-month marriage, finalising their divorce in January 2017. 

But Amber Heard, 32, and Johnny Depp, 54, both appear in a trailer for controversial new movie, London Fields, set for a delayed August release. 

The film has been adapted from author Martin Amis' 1989 novel, and was shot in 2015 before Amber and Johnny split, but it release was delayed due to legal issues.

According to Vulture, producers sued Amber for $10million, alleging that she had reneged on her obligations to make and complete the film they had approved.

She countersued in 2017, claiming that producers had employed a body double to make it seem like she had done more nudity than was stipulated in her contract.

Despite the friction, Amber can be seen in various states of undress in the film.

She goes braless under a blue shirt and models white underwear, before going completely naked.

Amber plays clairvoyant temptress Nicola Six who knows she's going to be murdered in the future and tries to track down her killer before the event.

Johnny Depp plays a character called Chick Purchase who can be seen in the trailer with a face full of scars.

He stars alongside Billy Bob Thornton, a terminally ill American writer living in London, who suffers from writer's block.

Also on the castlist is Cara Delevingne, who stars as Kath Talent.  

In the movie's accompanying film poster, Amber can be seen smoking a cigarette as she smoulders alongside the tagline, 'All of them want her. One of them want her dead.'

The film has been adapted from author Martin Amis' 1989 novel, and was shot in 2015 before Amber and Johnny split, but it release was delayed due to legal issues.

item.title: Olivia Buckland PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Love Island star slips into slinky bridal swimsuit as she embarks on luxurious boat trip to end Mykonos hen do in style
item.description: The reality star, 24, showed off her sensational figure in the skimpy white one-piece as she joined her hens - including Cara De La Hoyde, Gabby Allen and Tina Stinnes - for a luxurious boat trip.
item.content:encoded:
She has spent the last week celebrating her upcoming nuptials to Alex Bowen with her nearest and dearest.

And Olivia Buckland's wedding excitement reached fever pitch on Wednesday, as she slipped into a bridal swimsuit for the last day of her Mykonos hen do.

The reality star, 24, showed off her sensational figure in the skimpy white one-piece as she joined her hens - including Love Island stars Cara De La Hoyde, Gabby Allen and Tina Stinnes - for a luxurious boat trip in the sunshine. 

Olivia showed off her sensational figure in the swimsuit - aptly emblazoned with the word 'Bride' in peach on the front. 

Plunging into a scoop neckline at the front, the one-piece subtly teased at her cleavage before tightly clinging to her slim frame the rest of the way down. 

Cutting off high at her thigh, the swimwear then pulled into a daring thong cut at the back - to give a saucy glimpse of her derriere as she topped up her tan. 

Sweeping her hair into a half up-do and adding round sunglasses however, it was Olivia's radiant complexion and beaming smile that took centre stage, as she enjoyed her final day as the bride-to-be.

The blonde proved to be in very high spirits as she laughed and joked with her pals on board - indulging in a few cooling drinks, before pulling pal Tina Stinnes in for a tight hug.

Letting Olivia take centre stage, her hens all slipped into matching black swimsuits, emblazoned with their names on the back.  

The one-pieces plunged into low necklines as well as low backs to flash plenty of skin, before they laced up at the sides in an additional saucy touch. 

Snapping selfies together and indulging in a few refreshing drinks, the troupe could not contain their delight as they made the most of their day in the sunshine together.

The girls were spending the final day of the Mykonos hen do on the boat - which they heavily documented on their social media pages.

Cara, who Olivia starred alongside in the second series of Love Island, shared a snap of herself with Gabby, Tina and Lady Nadia Essex topping up their tans on deck.

The foursome sizzled in their matching swimsuits - but let Olivia take centre stage by all sporting black, as they indulged in their last day of sunshine on the boat. Clearly having had a ball on the getaway, Cara simply captioned the snap: 'Every brunette needs her blonde besties'  

The blonde is clearly excited to say 'I do' - having slipped into a bridal gown for a pretend wedding dinner during the getaway on Tuesday.

Olivia dazzled in a striking white wedding dress, which hugged her sensational figure, and teased at what's to come in a matter of weeks.

The bride-to-be and her hens were treated to a dinner cooked by a private chef on their terrace, before things became more rowdy with a string of funny speeches, after a few glasses of wine.

Olivia has jetted on holiday ahead of her wedding to Alex, who will no doubt be enjoying an equally raucous stag do in the coming weeks. The pair met on the 2016 series of Love Island, and continued their relationship outside the Majorcan villa.

After a whirlwind romance, the duo became engaged in December that year, during a festive getaway to New York.

Speaking to MailOnline last month, the blonde admitted she never dreamed of meeting her Mr Right on the reality show.

She said: 'It’s the last thing I thought would happen. It is crazy to think that two years ago I was in a much different position to what I am in now. I was actually like "I hate men" when I went into the villa.'

Before joking of his input in wedding planning: 'I mean, he helps out with the decision making but he usually just sits there like "what is this?" But he does try hard to help out and add his opinion on things.'

item.title: Spice Girls reunion: Emma Bunton hints the band's animated movie is ON... yet remains coy over Victoria Beckham's widely-discussed input
item.description: The 42-year-old pop star, who performed under the moniker Baby Spice, appeared on This Morning on Wednesday where she was quizzed about the legendary pop band's widely-discussed reunion
item.content:encoded:
Emma Bunton has hinted the rumoured Spice Girls animated movie will go ahead. 

The 42-year-old pop star, who performed under the moniker Baby Spice, appeared on This Morning on Wednesday where she was quizzed about the legendary pop band's widely-discussed reunion - the answers of which left fans delighted. 

While she responded to questions about the movie, which was first rumoured in March, she remained coy about her bandmate Victoria Beckham's involvement, as questions have been raised over the fashion designer's plans. 

Emma looked sensational as she appeared on the show to talk to her good pal Holly Willoughby and co-host Phillip Schofield about her work as a Unicef ambassador while also touching on the eagerly-anticipated return. 

In February, the band released a statement saying: 'We are always overwhelmed at how much interest there is across the whole world for the Spice Girls. The time now feels right to explore some incredible new opportunities together...

'I was with Geri and Mel C in Mel's kitchen and we're like: "What are we going to do?" There's so much excitement it's just about making sure we do the right thing.'

Now, she hinted that the animated superhero movie will be the way into the reunion - ahead of a tour or any festival appearances.   

It's not the first time the group have broken through on the big screen, having starred in their first cinematic film - Spice World: The Movie - 21 years ago. 

She said: '(The film) is something we are talking about... I’m not sure about a tour, but a few shows definitely... (Glastonbury) would be nice!' In regard to Victoria making a comeback, she said: ‘I'm sure Victoria will be involved in some way. ‘ 

Emma herself confessed she's been back in the studio for solo work, saying: ‘I am back in the studio. I'm having fun with some music on my own.’

In February, it was reported each band member - comprising of Geri Horner, Mel B, Mel C and Victoria £10m ($14.15m) to promote a new greatest hits album. 

The Spice Girls last toured after reuniting in 2007, with their greatest hits shows wrapping up in 2008. The last time they performed as a five-piece was at the 2012 London Olympics closing ceremony.   

Back in February, Mel had hinted that the Spice Girls would be performing at Prince Harry's wedding to Meghan Markle - although the promise did not materialise.

The group are said to be in talks to take on a number of projects this year - including endorsement deals and a TV project - but had fans hoping that they would be performing at the royal wedding too.

Mel was asked on the talk show The Real if she knew anyone attending the nuptials - with Mel nodding in response, and mouthing:'Yeah, I’m going... I don't know if I should've said that!'

While she responded to questions about the movie, which was first rumoured in March, she remained coy about her bandmate Victoria Beckham's involvement, as questions have been raised over the fashion designer's plans.

item.title: Danniella Westbrook displays major underboob in a vibrant bandeau top and TWO pairs of bikini bottoms as she goes sun-seeking on Essex beach
item.description: Former soap star Danniella Westbrook, 44, certainly looked like she was living her best life when she was spotted frolicking on the English coast in Frinton-on Sea on Sunday morning.
item.content:encoded:
She dismissed claims that she was dating another toyboy, 29, last week, saying she was 'single and living life'.

And Danniella Westbrook, 44, certainly looked like she was living her best life when she was spotted frolicking on the English coast. 

Despite a lack of sun, the former EastEnders actress brought vibrancy to Essex beach Frinton-on Sea on Sunday in a bright neon bikini.

The 44-year-old showed off her lean figure in a bandeau top and matching string briefs as she posed against a tide break.

Not satisfied with just one striking shade, Danniella doubled up on her bikini bottoms with an orange pair worn underneath a second, yellow pair.

With the beach to herself, Danniella also showed off her sunny disposition, pulling shapes, posing and dancing along the sands.

She seemed to be showing off a golden tan, despite the lack of sunny intervals in Frinton-On-Sea.

One-time soap actress Danniella has been taking a stay-cation in Essex with friends for the last 10 days. 

Last Friday, Danniella clarified her relationship status, telling fans that she was 100% single while away on holiday. 

The formerEastEnders star wrote: 'For the record im single living life I have friends family and future plans... [sic]' 

She continued: 'and im very close to @Beno_ldn but we are not an item so for every one who can't wait 2 tell me what they think they know.too late I already know.but it's amusing us @Beno_ldn next ur be a porn [star] [sic].' 

The mother-of-two also shared a tweet from her management that read: 'We would like to confirm that our client @westbrookdanni is 100% single and is happy and free living / livening life with massive things ahead! #DontBeliveWhatYouRead [sic]'. 

Nevertheless, the friends are currently planning their next holiday together.

Danniella has hinted that she has plans for a Mediterranean cruise with Ben - who previously boasted to MailOnline about bedding 200 women in a year.

The 29 year-old romeo said he would send out saucy messages and gets hundreds of replies a day from girls including full-frontal naked selfies.

He claimed two or three of those will ask him for sex and in 2014 had four or five 'tweethearts' on the go at any one time.

item.title: Getting carried away! Cate Blanchett flashes her white designer handbag as she steps out in New York ahead of Oceans 8 film premiere
item.description: She's set to hit screens for the premiere of her latest film Ocean's 8 on Thursday.
item.content:encoded:
She's set to hit screens for the premiere of her latest film Ocean's 8 on Thursday.

And ahead of the female-driven flick debut, Cate Blanchett proved she's equally a fashion icon as she is an actor when she stepped out in New York City on Tuesday.

Dazzling in a powder blue pant-suit, the 49-year-old's statement-making handbag proved to be the real showstopper.

Adding the perfect pop of white to her pastel blue outfit, Cate oozed elegance as she strolled the streets of Manhattan carrying her designer handbag.

Merging practicality with fashion, the star opted for an over-sized minimalist piece to complete her look.

Adding an element of fun to the set, the blonde beauty wore a matching hued polka dot top with a neck tie underneath the suit. 

Opting for a '70s-inspired look, Cate's high-waisted pants sat just about her ankles.

The star left her blonde locks in their signature style, adding sweet beachy waves that bounced to perfection as she strolled the streets of New York.

Keeping her makeup minimalist, the beauty added a matching-hued peach lip to complete her look.  

Cate has been busy in the US promoting her new flick Ocean's 8.

Also staring Sandra Bullock, Anne Hathaway, Sarah Paulson, Mindy Kaling, Aquafina, Helena Bonham Carter, Dakota Fanning and Rihanna along others, the female-driven flick has been predicted to be a hit.

According to Deadline, the star-studded female heist flick - which is a spin-off of the George Clooney led Oceans 11 trilogy - is tracking for an opening weekend between $30 million and $45 million.

item.title: 'Love doing life with you!' Jake Wall shares romantic throwback snap with Miss Universe wife Jennifer Hawkins as they celebrate five years of marriage
item.description: Loved up Jake Wall was sure to honour his wife Jennifer Hawkins by uploading a loved up snap to Instagram, which was in fact taken on their honeymoon.
item.content:encoded:
They're celebrating their five year wedding anniversary, having tied the knot on 4 June 2013 in Indonesia. 

And loved up Jake Wall was sure to honour his wife Jennifer Hawkins by uploading a loved up snap to Instagram, which was in fact taken on their honeymoon.

In the snap, the pair perched on an ornate couch with a stunning backdrop of the ocean, cliff sides and rolling green hills.

Scroll down for video 

Taken at dusk, the then-newlywed couple each wore a crisp white shirt, with Jennifer, 34, cuddling into her man, 35, in tiny black shorts, showing off her toned pins.

Jake wore smart chino shorts in the snap - which was taken during one of the many legs of their honeymoon which saw them travel to Bali, Paris and the Maldives.

He captioned it with the sentimental message: 'Love doing life with you.' 

The couple had already been together for eight years when the wed in a small ceremony in a luxury resort, having been engaged for 18 months after Jake proposed in New Zealand.

The pair are a fan of traveling the globe, with former beauty queen Jennifer seen enjoying a romantic nature walk with her husband Jake through Ku-ring-gai Chase National Park, near Sydney, recently.

In a photo captured by her husband, which she reposted on her Instagram Story, the stunner flaunts her statuesque figure as she makes her way down a man-made staircase.

The blonde beauty marked their romantic bush hike with a selfie of herself and Jake on the hike.

Clearly exhausted from their strenuous activity, she wrote in the caption: 'Currently have jelly legs.'  

The self-tan entrepreneur also shared a snap of a tiny inlet with a walkway leading down to a secluded beach. 

Jennifer recently revealed her plans to start a family with her husband of five years, former model turned builder Jake Wall. 

In an interview with BW magazine, she said: 'We would definitely love to have a family, the timing though is something you have to keep between your husband and yourself, it's important to keep that private.'
item.dc:abstract: They're celebrating their five year wedding anniversary, having tied the knot on 4 June 2013 in Indonesia. And loved up Jake Wall and Jennifer Hawkins perched on an ornate love seat, with a stunning backdrop of the ocean, cliff sides and rolling green hills, in a throwback honeymoon picture.

item.title: Taylor Swift's beau Joe Alwyn is seen in the first trailer for historical drama Operation Finale alongside Oscar Isaac
item.description: Joe Alwyn is set to flex some serious acting muscle, as he is seen in the first, newly released trailer for Operation Finale.
item.content:encoded:
He has seen a surge in popularity thanks to his romantic endeavours with girlfriend Taylor Swift. 

But Joe Alwyn is set to flex some serious acting muscle, as he is seen in the first, newly released trailer for Operation Finale.

The British actor, 27, is taking on the role of Klaus Eichmann - the eldest son of Adolf Eichmann (Ben Kingsley), who was one of the major organisers of the Holocaust. 

The historical drama, based on true events, follows the 1960 convert mission of Mossad agent Peter Malkin (Oscar Isaac) as he infiltrates Argentina to capture Adolf Eichmann.

Eichmann was a Nazi Officer who developed the transportation logistics that brought millions of innocent Jews to their deaths in concentration camps.

Joe is joining an incredibly talented cast of Oscar Isaac, Ben Kingsley, Melanie Laurent, Haley Lu Richardsonm and Michael Aronov. 

The movie, directed by Chris Weitz, is set to hit cinemas on September 14. 

Joe's first major movie credit was for the 2016 war drama Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk.

Meanwhile, Joe's relationship with Taylor was revealed in May of last year.       

Despite their fame, the duo have kept their relationship very private since rumours first emerged they were dating.

Joe has been attending some of Taylor's concerts as part of her Reputation tour, and in March the couple were pictured on a hike, yet before then they hadn't been seen since the Jingle Ball in New York in December where they were pictured holding hands. 

According to The Sun, the singer had been renting a house in North London for their rendezvous and they are rumoured to use disguises while going out and about in the city.

'They're clearly serious,' an insider told E!. 'Taylor's met all of Joe's family. They've done many a Sunday roast together — in fact it happens without fail if she's here over a weekend—and they seem very comfortable around her,

'His brothers all seem to be fans of them together as they've hung out with Taylor and Joe on several occasions.'

Taylor previously dated British actor Tom Hiddleston for three months, with the couple not shying away from showing off their romance with lots of public outings.

The short-lived relationship followed Taylor's split from Scottish DJ Calvin Harris in June 2016 after 15 months together.

item.title: He's Thor handsome! Chris Hemsworth looks every inch the leading man as he leads the glam arrivals at TAG Heuer party in Sydney
item.description: d Chris Hemsworth , 34, looked every inch the leading man on Wednesday, as he attended the Australian launch of TAG Heuer's Museum In Motion party.
item.content:encoded:
He got his big acting break in Home And Away before achieving global fame as an Avengers action star.

And Chris Hemsworth, 34, looked every inch the leading man on Wednesday, as he attended the Australian launch of TAG Heuer's Museum In Motion party at Sydney's Museum of Contemporary Art.

The Byron Bay-dwelling actor actor ditched his usual board-shorts and T-shirt for skinny jeans and a relaxed blazer at the red carpet bash.

Scroll down for video 

Chris completed his dapper look with a pair of heavy-duty black leather boots and a white T-shirt.

Letting his monochrome ensemble do the talking, he accessorised simply with a pendant necklace. 

Boasting a tan from his recent family vacation to Stradbroke Island, Chris wore his hair slicked back and sported a tiny hint of stubble. 

Chris jetted off to Stradbroke Island, Queensland, with his Spanish actress wife Elsa Pataky and their twins, Tristan and Sasha, both four.

Elsa shared several sweet snaps from the idyllic getaway, including a selfie with Chris and a sweet shot of their twins starring out at the ocean. 

The actress captioned the image: 'Two old souls Checking the surf and pondering life's great questions. #brothers'. 

Else recently revealed that shortly after she and Chris met in 2010, the A-list couple made a pact to never live in the other's home turf.

Speaking to Yahoo Be, the Spanish star revealed: 'We always said when we met, I'd never make you live in Spain, and he would never make me live in Australia because our families are so far away from us.'

After the birth of the twins, the Avengers actor persuaded to Elsa to change her mind by moving to Byron Bay.

Also attending the TAG Heuer bash was Erin Holland, who stunning in a cobalt trouser suit and 1940s-style waves 

Elsewhere, Allison Langdon was seen rocking a chic peplum one-shoulder top and tapered trousers.  

The Bachelor's Matty Johnson was also seen puckering up with his ladylove Laura Byrne.  

Laura rocked a stylish monochrome outfit, while Matty J looked dapper in a navy suit. 

Meanwhile, Samantha Armytage exuded elegance in a tassel-hem black dress teamed with chic leopard-print courts

item.title: Caroline Flack stuns fans with 'naked' optical illusion outtake photo from sizzling Women's Health shoot
item.description: Caroline Flack stunned fans as she shared a saucy outtake shot from her recent Women's Health shoot, in which she appeared naked.
item.content:encoded:
She is the face of Love Island who is known for her stunning looks and killer physique.

And Caroline Flack stunned fans as she shared a saucy outtake shot from her recent Women's Health shoot, in which she appeared naked.

The presenter, 38, showed off her flawless toned limbs as she seductively posed cross-legged on the floor, running a hand through her hair and revealing her new diamond engagement ring.

The beauty, who was wearing a tiny tan leotard, appeared naked in the optical illusion shot as she worked the camera with her caramel flecked tresses styled into loose waves.

She sported smoky eye make-up and a glossy coral lip for the stunning shoot. 

The star was soon inundated with comments from her hordes of Instagram followers and labelled 'Absolutely perfection', 'Such a beauty' and 'Stunning' by her fans.

This comes after Caroline opened up on marriage, body confidence and the new series of Love Island in a cover shoot for the July edition of the magazine.

The star admitted she always saw herself as a career woman after successfully carving a profession in TV hosting.

Caroline told the publication now she has found love with The Apprentice and Celebrity Big Brother star Andrew, 27, she sees herself 'having it all' as she referred to a future with work, marriage and babies.

She said: 'Of course, it's possible to have it all. Work, marriage, babies – I know a lot of women who do all of it; who have raised families and go to work every day. 

'For me, I thought work was always what I wanted to do, but now, I don't know, maybe I just hadn't met the right guy. 

Gushing about her beau Andrew Caroline said that she loves the feeling of falling in love, after forgetting what it was like to be in that phase.

When it comes to wedding plans she revealed that it is all a bit up in the air, as she doesn't know where to begin with planning her big day.

She said: 'I do sort of feel different. But then marriage was something that I’d never… People keep saying to me, “Oh, do you have your wedding all planned out?” but actually I don’t know where to start. 

'What do I do first? I forgot what it felt like. When you fall in love, then fall out of love, you forget those first feelings. I love the beginning part of falling in love – it’s nice.

The presenter, 38, showed off her flawless toned limbs as she seductively posed cross-legged on the floor, running a hand through her hair and revealing her new diamond engagement ring.

item.title: Living it up! Giggling Elsa Pataky licks caviar off her hand as she hits the town with a pal on evening away from Chris Hemsworth and kids
item.description: Uploading a candid video to Instagram Stories on Wednesday, Elsa Pataky was seen licking scoops of caviar decadently off her hand, cosying up to her pal.
item.content:encoded:
She's a doting wife to hunky actor Chris Hemsworth and a full-time mother to their three children Tristan, India and Sasha.

But it was all about 'me time' for Elsa Pataky on Tuesday, as she hit the town with a pal for a night of indulgence.

Uploading a candid video to Instagram Stories, the blonde, 41, was seen licking scoops of caviar decadently off her hand, cosying up to her girlfriend.

Scroll down for video 

'First time to have a shot of caviar,' was the caption emblazoned across the video, as she licked the expensive treat from her skin, savored it and then burst into fits of giggles with her friend.

The Spanish-born model is known for documenting her adventures on social media.

And she didn't disappoint on Sunday when she shared a sweet selfie with her and her husband during a weekend away, having just returned from a family vacation to Stradbroke Island.

Elsa was all smiles as she huddled close to Chris, 34, on a balcony.

Wearing a pair of mirrored Aviator-style sunglasses, Elsa casually leaned against the balcony's railing.

Chris, meanwhile, sported a rather relaxed expression and playfully flashed a cheeky peace sign.

In captioning the image, Elsa was full of gushing sentiment for the Thor star.

'Weekend get away with this handsome man!' Elsa wrote, reiterating the sentiment in her native Spanish. 

Her fans too were full of gushing praise for the genetically blessed couple, writing comment underneath the image such as; 'You guys are so lucky to have each other,' and: 'You two are so cute.'
item.dc:abstract: She's the doting wife to hunky actor Chris Hemsworth and mother to his three children Tristan, India and Sasha. But it was all about 'me time' for Elsa Pataky on Tuesday, as she hit the town with a pal for a night of indulgence.

item.title: Suits you! Cate Blanchett steals the spotlight in a glittering multicoloured blazer and matching trousers at Oceans 8 premiere
item.description: She's one of the silver screen's most loved leading ladies.
item.content:encoded:
She's one of the silver screen's most loved leading ladies.

And on Tuesday night, Australian actress Cate Blanchett proved she's just as much as a shining star off screen, by sporting a two-piece bedazzled suit at the Oceans 8 premiere in New York.

The two-time Oscar winner easily defied her 49 years in the glittering blazer and matching trousers by Missoni.

Scroll down for video 

The statement suit featured a splattering of multicoloured sequins and rainbow racer stripes down the side seams. The blazer's plunging neckline showed off a hint of clevage.

Letting her outfit do the talking, Cate kept her hair and makeup simple. 

The Giorgio Armarni Beauty ambassador opted for a simple slick of black eyeliner and a nude lip, while sweeping her blonde tresses into a side parting. 

Cate was joined by the impressive A-list cast of Ocean's 8 for photos on the red carpet. 

Fellow leading ladies Sarah Paulson, Anne Hathaway, Sandra Bullock, Mindy Kaling, Helena Bonham Carter, Awkwafina and Rihanna stood in formation to premiere an all-female reboot of the franchise in New York.

After three years in the works, the octet of Hollywood royalty looked proud to be finally introducing the heist movie at the global premiere, held at Alice Tully Hall in Manhattan.

They represented a cross-section of women in Hollywood, each with individual red carpet style and a back catalogue of blockbusters under their belts.

The actresses have spoken at length about how it felt to work with so many talented stars, which was made all the more significant because they were all women. 

Ocean's 8 all-star female line-up sees Debbie Ocean (Bullock) - the estranged sister of Danny Ocean - attempt to pull of a $150 million heist at the Met Gala.

Cate Blanchett stars as Lou, Debbie's partner-in-crime, while Sarah Paulson plays Tammy, a suburban mom and Debbie's former partner-in-crime.

Mindy Kaling is along for the ride as Amita, a jewelry maker, while Awkwafina plays Constance, a thief, and Rihanna is Nine Ball, a tech genius.

Helena Bonham Carter also appears in the summer female blockbuster as Rose Weil, a fashion designer.

On the otherside is Anne Hathaway playing Daphne Kluger, a celebrity and the target of the heist, whose assistant is James Corden (John Frazier).

It will also see cameos from Anna Wintour, Zayn Malik, Katie Homes, Serena Williams, Kim Kardashian, Kendall Jenner and Kylie Jenner. The movie hits theaters June 8.

The two-time Oscar winner easily defied her 49 years in the glittering blazer and matching trousers by Missoni.

item.title: Love Island's Laura Anderson reveals she's a member of the mile-high club as air hostess is forced to admit X-rated secret during brutal challenge
item.description: The air stewardess, 29, was left blushing when her fellow Islanders learned she was a member of the mile-high club after having intercourse with her ex-boyfriend on board a flight.
item.content:encoded:
Fans have already predicted she will be one of the first contestants to have sex in the villa. 

And Love Island star Laura Anderson will have increased bets after one of her naughty secrets was revealed during Tuesday night's show.

The air stewardess, 29, was left blushing when her fellow Islanders learned she was a member of the mile-high club after having intercourse with her ex-boyfriend on board a flight. 

The revelation was made as the girls and boys went head-to-head in a game that unearthed their raunchiest secrets. 

When a saucy fact was revealed, the opposing teams had to passionately kiss the person they believed the secret was about. 

While Jack Fincham later admitted he knew the correct answer was Laura, who used to work on Emirates flights, he instead ceased the opportunity to smooch Dani Dyer after growing close to the aspiring actress in the villa.

Later shedding some light on her racy secret, Laura said in the Beach Hut confessional: 'I was a passenger with my boyfriend.'

The brutal game also saw Dr Alex George admit to a threesome, Jack confess to cheating on all of his exes and Samira Mighty reveal her fling with a Hollywood actor.

But it was Wes Nelson's confession that he once splashed out £1,000 on a first date that seemed to delight Laura, prompting some viewers to call her a 'desperate gold-digger' on social media. 

The air hostess was flighty with her affections on Monday, having stepped forward for smoldering Wes after being paired with Alex, but later admitted she wasn't all that into her current partner when she set her sights on Adam Collard.

Yet on Tuesday, the Olivia Attwood lookalike angered fans when she declared her interest in the Electrical and Nuclear Systems Design Engineer after finding out he had money.

Love Island viewers branded the blonde bombshell as 'money grabbing' and 'shallow' in a slew of scathing tweets.

Others remarked: 'Funny how that Laura now suddenly cares about Wes now that she knows he's got money #golddigger #LoveIsland.'

item.title: Love Island: Cockney Dani Dyer could be set to take Camilla's 'poshest ever contestant' crown as viewers revisit her VERY unlikely royal connections
item.description: She comes from a family of proud cockneys - but Love Island contestant Dani Dyer could be set to become the show's 'poshest' ever contestant.
item.content:encoded:
She comes from a family of proud cockneys - but Love Island contestant Dani Dyer could be set to become the show's 'poshest' ever contestant.

Arguably, the contestant currently holding the crown for such a title is 2017 contestant Camilla Thurlow, 28, who famously once dated Prince Harry, 33.

But viewers have been reminding each other about 22-year-old Dani's very unlikely royal connections on Twitter, as she is related to two kings of England.

Scroll down for video

The unexpected lineage came to light in 2016 when her father, EastEnders actor, Danny Dyer, 40, appeared on BBC show Who Do You Think You Are?

The series - which sees celebrities trace their heritage and learn about their family trees - showing Danny mapping his ancestry as far back the 11th Century.

He was staggered to learn that distant relative of William The Conqueror.

As well as this stake to the throne, he was informed of further links to King Edward III, Henry VIII's chief advisor Thomas Cromwell and a plethora of aristocrats.  

Ironically, Dani said she was nervous about mentioning her famous father to any potential love matches on Love Island and was over the moon when Jack Fincham made out he didn't know they were related.

But she has yet to mention her other, slightly more famous family members. 

Viewers haven't forgotten though and tweeted: 'If Dani Dyer doesn't mention that her dad, Danny Dyer is related to King Edward 3. She's doing it all wrong.'

Another penned: 'People thought Camilla was posh, but I suppose Dani Dyer is a direct descendant of Edward III.' 

Danny, who comes from the Canning Town area of East London, spoke to Radio Times in 2016 about his links to Cromwell, saying: 'He came from a slum, I come from a slum.

'Cromwell left the country at 14, I started acting at 14. He was a self-taught lawyer. I'm a self-taught actor. Cromwell had two daughters and a son.

'I've got two daughters and a son. Cromwell wrote his last letter to Henry VIII begging for his life, on July 24, which is my birthday ... And I drink in the Anne Boleyn pub.'

So fascinating was the episode that viewers took to Twitter to praise the show, its producers and Dyer himself for his heartfelt reactions to the findings.

'The best episode of #wdytya ever! Fact; stranger & far more glorious than fiction!' came one excited tweet.

'If you thought 2016 couldn't get any weirder, go watch Who Do You Think You Are on the iPlayer. Astonishing stuff!' typed somebody else. 

'I can totally see Danny Dyer as a descendant of Thomas Cromwell, self-made, resilient and cheeky. Get in!' observed another fan.

'Never mind a Pearly King - you're a Proper King!' posted another Twitter user.

'So now we have Prince Danny Dyer? Fabulous British history!' another tweeter remarked. 

'Can we somehow make Danny Dyer next in line to the throne now please?' quipped someone else. 

Others wrote: 'OMG, if you didn't watch the Danny Dyer Who Do You Think You Are? you MUST. It was BRILLIANT. I am still laughing,' one person typed about Dyer's quips about his descendants being 'geezers' and living in 'massive gaffs'.

'Danny Dyer was charming in #wdytya. I was almost moved to tears, related to King Edward IIII, Henry III, William the Conqueror. AMAZING,' said another. 

Others found themselves converted into new fans of the show: 'Loved watching #wdytya, never seen it before but thought as Danny Dyer was in it I'd give it a whirl! Proper chuffed I did now!'

'I can't believe it. I don't know what to say,' Dyer was seen saying to one of the historians. 'I need a moment to digest this. A kid from Canning Town is related to Edward III.

'It's ridiculous to think that someone of my stature shares the same bloodline. I can't compute it.'

The show has been known to drop certain celebrities lined up for the show because their stories are just too dull.

Dyer's story was far from it, with the initial research in the show proving that his family tree on his father’s side initially indicated that criminal connections were looking far more likely than aristocratic ones.

His three-times great-grandmother, Mary Ann, had ended up in the workhouse after being suspected of killing her illegitimate daughter. Further investigation revealed that Mary Ann had likely delivered her own baby and the child had died in the process. In a panic she hid the baby’s body in a bucket and covered it with ashes.

Mary Ann went on to make a good marriage and it was through her husband’s family that Dyer was able to trace his ancestors back to grander circumstances.

His ten-times great-grandfather Robert was landed gentry, a Cavalier in the English Civil war who, in the words of Dyer, was a ‘proper geezer, as game as you like’. Dyer visited the stately home in Suffolk where his distant relative once lived and learned of further, even more impressive, connections.

Going back another five generations, he discovered his 15-times great-grandfather was Thomas Cromwell, right-hand man to Henry VIII. 

Dyer was particularly tickled that, like him, Cromwell came from humble beginnings and his father, a blacksmith, had also run a tavern.

Before falling foul of King Henry, Cromwell had married his own son off to Elizabeth Seymour and — through her lineage — Dyer found that he was the 22-times great-grandson of Edward III. 

However, he said it was the connection to Cromwell, who was played by his mentor Mark Rylance in the BBC adaptation of Hilary Mantel's novel Wolf Hall, that was particularly meaningful.

Arguably, the contestant currently holding the crown for such a title is 2017 contestant Camilla Thurlow, 28, who famously once dated Prince Harry, 33. But viewers have been reminding each other about 22-year-old Dani's very unlikely royal connections on Twitter, as she is related to two kings of England.

item.title: Katy Perry swaps her glittering stage costumes for sportswear as she enjoys sunny hike and bike ride in Berlin
item.description: The singer, 33, took a break from her hectic schedule on Tuesday, as she enjoyed a sunny hike and bike ride in Berlin. The star is currently performing the European leg of her 115-date Witness Tour.
item.content:encoded:
She has been performing for her fans all over Europe in recent weeks, as part of her 115-date Witness Tour. 

But Katy Perry took a break from her hectic tour schedule on Tuesday, to enjoy a sunny hike in Berlin, Germany.

The singer, 33, swapped her glittering stage ensembles for casual sportswear as she explored her new surroundings both on foot, and by bike. 

Katy kept things casual for her afternoon of activity in a grey T-shirt, printed with her star sign Scorpio, and Adidas' classic striped leggings.

Never failing to look stylish, whether off duty or on stage, she also tied a matching sweatshirt around her waist, and tied her look together with monochrome Adidas trainers.

She accessorised with a black sports cap, in a bid to keep a low profile, but added large gold hoops to her ears in a more glamorous finishing touch. 

First soaking up the stunning scenery by foot, Katy then joined a group of fellow explorers for a bike tour around the city.

The Roar hitmaker proved to be full of energy during her afternoon - despite a hectic few weeks travelling across Europe.

Katy's Witness world tour kicked off in September last year, and is set to wrap in New Zealand in August. 

Whilst Katy has been giving her all to her fans, she hasn't been able to spend as much time with boyfriend Orlando Bloom - who she reconciled with this year.

The pair initially called it quits in March 2017, but People magazine now claims the couple are 'happier than ever' after a year apart. 

The actor, 41, even gushed about his girlfriend to The Times in April, revealing: 'She's a remarkable human being, actually.

'I wouldn't have imagined anything happening. And, you know, when you get hit sideways you get hit sideways. You don't pick who you fall in love with.'
item.dc:abstract: She has been performing for her fans all over Europe in recent weeks, as part of her 115-date Witness Tour. item.title: Avengers actor Benedict Cumberbatch insists he's 'no hero' after protecting a Deliveroo cyclist from a gang of attackers
item.description: Benedict, 41, who's better known for playing Dr Strange in the Avengers franchise, was called 'brave and selfless' by onlookers after putting himself in danger to pull the gang off the victim.
item.content:encoded:
He leaped to the rescue of a Deliveroo rider who was being beaten up by a group of four last week in London.

But Avengers actor Benedict Cumberbatch says he's 'no hero' for protecting the delivery driver who was being hit over the head with a bottle in the street.

Benedict, 41, who's better known for playing Dr Strange in the franchise, was called 'brave and selfless' by onlookers after putting himself in danger to pull the gang off the bloodied victim.

'There are real-life heroes out there and I'm not one of them,' a humble Benedict told The Sun this weekend.

When asked, Benedict - who is sometimes better known in the role of Marvel's Dr Strange - previously said that he did what he 'had to' do.

The actor was in anUber vehicle on Marylebone High Street in central London with his wife, Sophie Hunter, when they first saw the cyclist being attacked.

The driver of the car, Manuel Dias, told the newspaper last Friday: 'Benedict was courageous, brave and selfless. If he hadn't stepped in the cyclist could have been seriously injured.

'He stood there instructing them in the street, shouting, "Leave him alone".'

The driver said he grabbed one of the men and Benedict got hold of another and added the star knew exactly what to do. 

The driver says they fled when they recognised who he was.

On-screen, fans of the Hollywood actor's work will know that Benedict's Avengers character has been known to defend the universe. 

Afterwards, the delivery company Deliveroo issued a public statement of gratitude via Twitter.

'Thank you Benedict Cumberbatch for your brave actions,' a tweet from the Official Twitter account read. 

'Deliveroo riders are heroes - their safety is our priority and any violence against them is totally unacceptable. So on behalf of everyone at Deliveroo: thank you.'

Fans flooded the post with their own praise for the actor, saying that he was an 'amazing person' and 'a boss'. 

'I definitely need a man like Benedict :)' one fan wrote: 'Get a man who saves your life and your food.' 

Another said: 'Well done to him for been incredibly brave and doing what's right.' 

While one other commented: 'I know you thanked him but I'd say Benedict is more the hero in this case.'

'No surprise here,' another said. 'Mr. Cumberbatch has always been a stand up, genuine human being who just happens to have a job as an actor. Kudos Mr. Cumberbatch for showing the rest of us what is the right thing to do!'

Declaring her love, a fellow cyclist said: 'I love you Benedict Cumberbatch!! I'm a cyclist too and safety is kind of always on our mind but usually we are worried about cars not attackers. You are a hero!'
item.dc:abstract: Marvel comics paragon Benedict Cumberbatch says he's 'no hero' for protecting the delivery driver who was being hit over the head with a bottle in the street. Benedict, 41, who's better known for playing Dr Strange in the Avengers franchise, was called 'brave and selfless' by onlookers after putting himself in danger to pull the gang off the bloodied victim.

item.title: John Travolta weighs in on 'Sandy is dead' fan theory in Grease... as iconic film prepares to celebrate 40th anniversary
item.description: John Travolta has weighed in on the fan theory speculating that Sandy Olsson was actually dead in Grease, as the musical film prepares to celebrate its 40th anniversary.
item.content:encoded:
The internet went wild in 2016 when a fan theory threatened to change the way Grease enthusiasts watched the film forever.

And lead star John Travolta has weighed in on the fan theory speculating that Sandy Olsson was actually dead in Grease, as the musical film prepares to celebrate its 40th anniversary.

The popular theory saw some avid viewers of the film speculate that Sandy (played by Olivia Newton-John) had actually drowned at the beach where she first met Danny Zuko (Travolta), told in the song Summer Nights.

Fans went on to say the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing, 50s flick was actually the bubbly blonde's coma fantasy dreamt up by Sandy in her last minutes on earth, culminating in the final flying car scene which symbolises her arrival in heaven.

Travolta, now 64, told USA Today: 'I love it, imaginations are awesome. These things are bound to happen to something timeless like this. It's so fun.'

Debunking the theory, he added: 'I could have fun with it. But I know the writers of Grease, and I was around in the original days. I can't take it too far.'

In September 2016, Olivia, 69, weighed in on the bizarre fan conspiracy theory, saying that she found the whole 'debate' rather amusing.

'I thought it was hilarious,' she said during an interview with Network Ten's The Project.

'But I thought, if that's true, we were the first zombie musical! I think we look pretty good considering,' she chuckled. 

When quizzed by host Waleed Aly about whether she found the flying car scene strange during filming, Olivia said: 'I wondered what it was about but I didn't question it. 'It kept people interested!' 

The theory dates back to a three-year-old Reddit thread which resurfaced when actress Sarah Michelle Gellar wrote about it on her Facebook page.

Another fan theory that has emerged is that Sandy killed herself toward the end of the movie, making the ending scene her dying thoughts or a dream.

Evidence for this theory is based on the song 'Look at Me, I'm Sandra Dee (Reprise)', in which Sandy utters the final line 'Goodbye to Sandra Dee'. 

Jim Jacobs, who wrote the original Grease book and film with Warren Casey, debunked the fan theory this week, telling People that 'Sandy was very much alive' at the end of the movie. 

He also noted that that whoever came up with the theory 'must have been on acid.'

Olivia and John famously played star-crossed lovers in the 1978 film, good girl Sandy and greaser Danny who fall in love over the summer in the 1950s. 

When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, question marks arise over whether they will be able to continue their passionate romance.

It catapulted the two lead actors into superstardom and became one of the most successful films of all time, with its soundtrack album featuring hits including Greased Lightnin', Hopelessly Devoted To You and You're The One That I Want selling a mammoth 28m copies worldwide

item.title: Fiona Phillips on depression battle: GMTV star admits she was 'overwhelmed' as she juggled caring for ailing parents and motherhood
item.description: Fiona Phillips has admitted that she once felt 'overwhelmed' by depression as she juggled her TV presenting duties with motherhood and caring for her ailing parents.
item.content:encoded:
Fiona Phillips has admitted that she once felt 'overwhelmed' by depression as she juggled her TV presenting duties with motherhood and caring for her ailing parents.

The 57-year-old GMTV presenter told Lorraine Kelly on Wednesday that she struggled with mental health as she cared for her two children and her mum and dad, who had both been diagnosed with Alzheimer's.

Fiona also revealed that she underestimated the impact having the menopause would have on her body, despite her mum going through a similar ordeal.

Scroll down for video

Fiona told Lorraine she felt she 'had to' get on with juggling her work as a breakfast TV presenter alongside raising two children and taking care of parents Phillip and Amy who passed away in 2012 and 2006 respectively after battling Alzheimer's.

She said: 'You have to don't you? Otherwise I would have had two parents with Alzheimer's and be homeless because we wouldn't be able to afford the mortgage.

'All the time my emotions were torn – I should be with my kids, I should be with my parents… you know what it's like. You have to have a house for your kids and food on the table.'

Fiona also admitted that her mum suffered with depression while she was growing up, and confessed that she was also unprepared for the effect the menopause would have on her body.

She said: 'My poor mum, when we were little, she used to lock herself in the room for a day in the dark because she was just so, so depressed. I think it can run in families as well. 

'Things happen to you… and the menopause, that is a horrible thing! I remember my mum in a real state with her menopause and I just thought, 'It can't be that bad surely' – and yes, it can.

'Anxiety in all sorts of things that you might never had had before. Suddenly you’re overwhelmed by things.'

Fiona was appearing on Lorraine to chat about her new financially savvy series Shop Smart Save Money, and admitted that her mum was never short of saving a few pounds in the supermarket.

She confessed: 'My mum was hilarious, we used to go round the supermarket, and they had ugly vegetables, my mum would pick a cabbage up that had slug holes and she would take the outer leaves off. She had a lighter cabbage to pay for so she was saving money!

'You couldn't do that now because everything is wrapped in plastic!'
item.dc:abstract: Fiona Phillips has admitted that she once felt 'overwhelmed' by depression as she juggled her TV presenting duties with motherhood and caring for her ailing parents. The 57-year-old GMTV presenter told Lorraine Kelly on Wednesday that she struggled with mental health as she cared for her two children and her mum and dad, who had both been diagnosed with Alzheimers. Fiona also revealed that she underestimated the impact having the menopause would have on her body, despite her mum going through a similar ordeal.
item.dc:creator: Laura Fox

item.title: Love Island: Danny Dyer THREATENS any boyfriend 'to make a tear fall from daughter Dani's f**king eye'... as she is seen sobbing over love rat Jack
item.description: In a newly-unearthed video, the EastEnders hardman is seen telling Jack Whitehall that he would be fine with any of his daughter's boyfriend unless they cheated
item.content:encoded:
Danny Dyer's reaction to his daughter Dani's Love Island stint is being closely monitored by intrigued fans. 

And Tuesday night's episode of the show was certainly a shocker as the reality starlet was seen breaking down in tears over her partner Jack Fincham's confession during an Excess Baggage task, that he cheated on all his girlfriends in the past. 

In a newly-unearthed video, the EastEnders hardman is seen telling Jack Whitehall that he would be fine with any of his daughter's boyfriend - so long as a 'tear never drops from her f***ing eye', in which case they would be dismissed.

Funnyman Jack was seen interviewing Danny, 40, on his BBC3 comedy chat sho3w with his father Michael, where they grilled him on his protective nature. 

Jack took to Twitter to share a clip from the interview, as he penned: 'I see Danny Dyer’s daughter is in Love Island - any would be suitors been warned.'

He responded: 'Listen I am sweet with him as long as a tear never drops from her f***ing eye we’re gonna be good friends. I can do it in a look. 

'You walk in you’re getting blanked straight away – I’m blanking ya I’m looking at the telly and I just go – and look away again. It’s a little pipe, which is a look and then look away and then have another look right and then say f**k all to him.' 

On Tuesday, Dani broke down in tears after Jack's cheating past come to light during the emotional roller coaster episode of Love Island. 

As she admitted she 'made a mistake', fans posted a host of memes joking that her dad Danny would want to torture him for upsetting her.

Dani lamented: 'It just seems to be that I always step forward for the same boys. He's cheated on all of his girlfriends.

'He said it's just two it doesn't matter. I don’t care if it’s one. I just feel like I've stepped forward for the boy that I always go for.

'So I feel like I've just made a mistake…. I just thought his reaction wasn’t that great... I just thought it was a little bit muggy on his behalf, really.'

Yet Jack tried to play down his cheating past as he insisted if the right girl come along he wouldn't be unfaithful while trying to explain his behaviour.

During the episode, he said: 'I was 17 years old, I was young. The other, she cheated on me and it became a to and fro... I wouldn't cheat on the right person. I don't want her to think, "Oh, he's not trustworthy".'

So it already seems like there is trouble in paradise for the new lovebirds who had instantly hit it off on Monday's episode.

item.title: Love Island: Piers Morgan sends fans wild with dodgy Niall impression... after the Coventry-born Islander says 'like' SIX times in FIVE seconds
item.description: In the midst of his rant, the 53-year-old journalist hit out at a clip of the student and construction worker in which he said like six times in five seconds
item.content:encoded:
He has made his thoughts on Love Island resoundingly clear. 

And Piers Morgan was on his soap box once again on Wednesday as he discussed the show on Good Morning Britain, during which he took particular aim at Coventry-born Islander Niall Aslam for his incessant use of the word 'like'. 

In the midst of his rant, the 53-year-old journalist hit out at a clip of the student and construction worker in which he said like six times in five seconds - leading to Piers quipping: 'This is why we should be proud of our country.'

Piers has been ranting about the show since its return on Monday, as he has been hitting out at the contestants - including Niall and his lingo.

The clip of Niall depicted him saying: 'But, like, I didn't actually, like, say to her, like, before she went, like, anything, like, I didn't say, like.'

Piers' attempt to mimic his voice led to fans being tickled on social media, as fans soon swarmed the microblogging site to pen: 'Piers, I can assure you us Coventry people do not speak with a dummy brummie accent or like niall from love island... 

'@piersmorgan making me belly laugh this morning! #LoveIsIand... I thought the same thing thats not a Coventry accent but Niall sounds more brummy then Coventry... @piersmorgan on fire this morning with his impression of Niall'.

On Tuesday morning's episode of the show, Piers called the show 'c**p', to the shock of his co-presenters Charlotte Hawkins, Susanna Reid, and Alex Beresford.

Susanna urgently reminded him the big GMB boss was in the building so he should refrain from the naughty activity.  

She said: 'You've chosen this morning to inspire a complaint from Ofcom and trash one of ITV's biggest programmes.'

Piers dismissed her concerns, saying: 'Come on then son, fire me. 

'Take away your rock star and leave everyone with these three. For me, it's not a difficult choice.' 

Susanna later said: 'The boss is in the building, he's waiting to give you your P45.'

item.title: Is this the most DISGUSTING moment ever seen on reality TV? Love Island's Grant Crapp screams as he gets his butt waxed by scorned ex-lover Cassidy McGill
item.description: They made amends on Tuesday's episode of Love Island, after he dumped her to pursue a relationship with Tayla Damir.
item.content:encoded:
They made amends on Tuesday's episode of Love Island, after he dumped her to pursue a relationship with Tayla Damir. 

And it seems Cassidy McGill may have still gotten her revenge on ex-lover Grant Crapp, when she and her female cast mates waxed Grant's butt. 

In a hilarious preview for Wednesday's show, Grant can be seen writhing in a pain as Tayla and his female cast mates perform the beauty treatment on him. 

Scroll down for video 

'Oh f**k!,' Grant screamed, with four wax strips being applied to his derriere.

'Oh my gosh that's so f**king hairy Grant,' one of the girls says. 

In the clip, Cassidy can be seen leaning over Grant who lays down on a towel, and films the whole thing.

'Is that it?,' Grant can be heard saying.    

'There's one more,' they say, as they burst out laughing.  

The clip - which was shared to Love Island Australia's official Instagram page - was captioned: 'Cassidy's revenge: Just when you thought things couldn't get any more hairy for Grant.'

Fans flocked to comment on the clip, with one writing: 'Ha ha, thank God I've eaten dinner already!'

Another wrote: 'Karma is a b***h!'

One fan felt sorry for Grant, writing that was a 'poor bugger.'

On Tuesday's show, Cassidy was reduced to tears when playing a kissing game, when Grant cruelly taunted her.  

Grant slammed Cassidy for the way she kissed him, saying: 'Hashtag been there and done that!'

During the game, the boys were blindfolded and had headphones on as each of the girls kissed them. 

Cassidy kissed every boy except Grant, planting fingers on her lips as a snub to him. 

After the game, Grant half-heatedly apologised to Cassidy by insisting that he was only joking, but Cassidy wasn't having any of it.  

'He's just a t**t, he's a young boy and just immature,' Cassidy said.

Tayla then confronted him about his comment to Cassidy, and he felt bad and approached Cassidy again.

He then asked her how she is handling watching him pursue a relationship with Tayla.

'I think you're a disrespectful d**khead... everything you said to me was a load of s**t,' Cassidy said.

Grant called himself a 'f***wit,' and the pair agreed to be friends and hugged it out.
