item.title: Kieran Hayler flashes a smile as he heads to the dental clinic... amid claims he 'wants revenge' on ex Katie Price for Kris Boyson romance
item.description: The former stripper, 31, flashed a smile at cameras as he arrived for his appointment in a casual ensemble - casting his recent drama with ex-wife Katie Price aside.
item.content:encoded:
His ex recently claimed he will be hell-bent on getting revenge on his ex, after the emergence of her new romance with Kris Boyson.

But Kieran Hayler cast any drama with estranged wife Katie Price aside on Tuesday, as he visited a posh Harley Street dental clinic in London.

The former stripper, 31, flashed a smile at cameras as he arrived for his appointment at YourDentist.co.uk, in a casual ensemble.  

Kieran kept things low-key in simple skinny jeans, teamed with a white and red logo T-shirt.

Layering a denim shirt on top and adding black trainers, the star proved to be comfortable as he headed to his appointment, to improve his pearly whites. 

Kieran looked relaxed as he smiled at cameras outside the clinic, despite the recent drama with his ex Katie. 

The pair parted ways last month after Kieran's numerous infidelities emerged, and his ex has since moved on with Kris Boyson, 29.

However, Kieran has since been spotted liking a number of women's sexy Instagram posts - which his ex Laura-Alicia Sumners claims is the star's idea of 'revenge'.

Weighing in on their split, the Ex On The Beach star told Reveal: 'He's trying to wind her up. He knows what she's like. Remember when Peter Andre married that gorgeous young doctor? Ooh, I bet Katie was seething!

'Wasn't she pretty much getting surgery the next day? And Kieran knows it. Katie reacts to certain things so he will do it for revenge. But equally he probably does want to meet someone for stability.' 

Yet, the reality star also revealed the hunk's more sensitive side, and revealed he will be hurting about the split deep down.  

'He's super soft and will take this terribly hard,' she added. 'He loves kids, he loves animals, he won't like the separation and I can't imagine he'd have any legal rights to the children that aren't biologically his.'  

Following the split, Kieran was also spotted at a tattoo parlour last week to have his inking tribute to Katie removed.

The former stripper had two intertwined Ks inked on his ring finger, alongside a vast portrait of the star dressed as an angel down his leg - and is now keen on banishing all traces of his previous declaration of love.

A source told The Sun: 'Kieran is looking into getting the wedding tattoo lasered off. He doesn't see the point in keeping it and wants to get rid of it.

'It's just a daily reminder of his marriage, which is now over. He wants the whole thing removed and is booking in sessions for it to get lasered off.' 

Kieran finally moved out of their former marital home last month - but was left looking after the kids when Katie celebrated her 40th birthday in Belgium with her new toyboy beau.

Katie confirmed Kieran had left the family home with a dig on Sunday, writing alongside a snap of son Harvey's birthday cake: 'Thankyou @wendyhayler04 for Harvey's birthday cake you made it's amazing and thanks Kieran for dropping it off.'

item.title: Jamie Lee Curtis flees from psychotic Michael Myers in TERRIFYING first look photos from new Halloween movie
item.description: Jamie Lee Curtis, 59, is seen returning as character Laurie Strode in the first official stills from the newest instalment of Halloween, forty years on from the original.
item.content:encoded:
She made her debut in the 1978 flick Halloween, thus spawning a hugely successful horror movie franchise. 

And forty years on, Jamie Lee Curtis has returned to Haddonfield as her iconic character Laurie Strode, as she is seen in the first official pictures for the new instalment released by Universal Pictures and Blumhouse. 

The American actress, 59, is seen terrorised at the hands of Michael Myers - who wields a knife in an updated mask in another first look picture from the new movie. 

The new stills from the movie pay homage to the original flick - including the gruesome villain cutting an imposing figure as he stands in the hallway and Jamie hiding in panic behind the door. 

In the new movie which has been produced by horror guru Jason Blum, Jamie is reprising the role of Laurie for the 40th anniversary of John Carpenter’s original in 1978.

A continuation from the original movie, the new flick will be updated to include a pop culture twist as a camera crew will come to visit Michael in prison - unaware he has been planning and plotting his revenge since his incarceration.

After escaping, Michael will proceed to cause his signature havoc and in particular will have his sights set on Laurie. 

Meanwhile, unable to take her mind of the horrifying events forty years ago, Laurie has been preparing to take on Michael one last time - and she will finally get her chance in the grisly next instalment. 

Director Gordon Green has returned to offer his visionary to the project, as well as co-writing the script with Danny McBride and Jeff Fradley. It is being produced by horror buff Jason Blum.

Curtis has played the role in a number of sequels throughout the years, including 1981's Halloween II, 1998's Halloween H20: 20 Years Later and the 2002 film Halloween: Resurrection. 

Back in January, Jamie thrilled fans as she shared a movie from the set where she was sporting a long blonde wig.  

Observing the association of her name to the movie franchise, Jamie recently told USA Today: 'I recognise that it will be my biggest contribution. 

'Despite writing books for children, all of my advocacy, all of my politics, all of my own personal journey, my legacy will be Halloween.  

Speaking of her character Laurie's development, the Santa Monica native explained: 'In this case, she is well-matched, she is prepared, she is focused.

'She will be the one people are standing behind when that moment comes, because she’s the one ready.'

Meanwhile, director David Gordon Green touched upon the true horror of the movie as he detailed the character of Michael Myers.

'He’s the essence of evil. So much of what makes the boogeyman horrifying to me is the mystery and almost cat-like mannerisms and curiosity of this character,”

The film is set to hit theatres October 19th, 2018.

item.title: Michelle Keegan divides fans with 'too glam' appearance as Our Girl returns... with some even demanding 'much better' Lacey Turner is reinstated
item.description: The second half of Our Girl season three returned to screens on Tuesday night, with a mixed reaction from fans.
item.content:encoded:
The second half of Our Girl season three returned to screens on Tuesday night, with a mixed reaction from fans.

It seemed that viewers fell into two camps; Michelle Keegan enthusiasts or those still pining for the 'much better' series' original star Lacey Turner, claiming the former is 'too glam' to portray a Army Corporal. 

Lacey, 30, played Molly Dawes in the series first season but left afterwards, paving the way for Michelle, 31, to take on the role of Georgie Lane.

Scroll down for video 

'I’m sorry but #OurGirl was so much better with Lacey Turner!' one person headed to Twitter to declare.

A second typed: 'Love Michelle Keegan but she’s probably a bit too glam. Never understood why Lacey Turner didn’t stay, she was great.'

A third posted: '#OurGirl started off good with Lacey T but now too much white saviour syndrome its enough to make you want to barf!'

‏'Hoping Lacey Turner will make an appearance!' came a fourth remark, as a fifth person posted: 'Is it a bit late to say I miss Molly Dawes? She was what Our Girl was always about. Her journey. 

'Much preferred her and Captain James. I still cannot warm to Georgie, as much as I like Michelle Keegan’s acting. Bring back Molly please!' 

Another viewer voiced: 'Unpopular opinion but I much preferred Stacey from Eastenders on #OurGirl than Michelle Keegan!' 

Someone else added: 'Mightn't be a popular opinion but I think Our Girl would be better without Michelle Keegan. She isn't a great actress!'

Someone else fumed: 'Michelle Keegan playing an Army Corporal is the worst piece of casting since James Cordon voiced lovable national treasure Peter Rabbit.'

On the flip side of this, others praised Michelle for her return to the role.

'Michelle Keegan is unreal even playing that role!' one fan gushed.

'Watching #OurGirl. Say what you may like, but to be fair, Michelle Keegan is a very talented actress,' a second viewer added. 

A third person typed: 'Thoroughly enjoyed tonight's first ep of #OurGirl very good Michelle!' 

The 31-year-old actress was busy promoting the show in London on Tuesday, popping in to Radio 1, This Morning and AOL Build.

She was doing the rounds to talk all-things Our Girl ahead of the BBC drama's new episodes, and also confessed earlier in the day that she wouldn't rule out moving to Los Angeles with husband Mark Wright. 

Michelle recently made a dramatic U-turn on her recent claims that she would never move to LA with husband Mark, telling Radio 1 Breakfast Show host Nick Grimshaw she will 'never say never' to moving to America.  

Michelle bashed down the rumours, explaining: 'That's not true - I wouldn't say it's false, but it's not true.'

On whether she would ever consider giving up her home in the UK, the former Coronation Street star said: 'I would never rule that out, never say never, but at the minute, I like going backwards and forwards.

'I like the option, I like going out for a month, coming back for a few weeks, going out again.' 

When asked about how reality TV husband Mark, 31, is fairing in LA after bagging a correspondent role on Extra TV, Michelle described how the former TOWIE star has fallen in love with his new home.

'Oh yeah he loves it' the actress divulged. 'I think it's the lifestyle, the weather. It's such a nice place and everyone is just really positive out there.'     

Michelle spent eight long months away from her beau while shooting military drama Our Girl in South Africa.

Despite the long distance while away filming, Michelle insisted she would never join her husband by making a permanent move to Los Angeles while discussing Our Girl on BBC's The One show last week.

'I'd love to work in America but I couldn't see myself living out there full time,' she said. 'I'm a home bird.' She clarified. 'It won't be permanent. Definitely not.'

item.title: Friends star Lisa Kudrow poses with Laverne Cox at Who Do You Think You Are? event in LA
item.description: She's most famous for playing Phoebe Buffay in American sitcom Friends, but Lisa Kudrow has another project, executive producing Who Do You Think You Are?
item.content:encoded:
She's most famous for playing Phoebe Buffay in American sitcom Friends, but Lisa Kudrow has another project, executive producing Who Do You Think You Are?

The 54-year-old looked incredibly youthful as she posed alongside actress Laverne Cox, 46, at the show's press event at Wolf Theatre in North Hollywood.

Also present was Lisa's business partner, Dan Bucatinsky.  

TLC's Emmy-Award winning series also has an equivalent on the BBC and season nine saw the likes of Laverne, Hilary Duff and Megan Mullally tracing their ancestry.

Laverne looked incredible at the event, wearing a black top tucked into maroon high-waisted trousers.  

On May 22, viewers saw the star piecing together the inspiring life of her African American ancestor.

They challenged societal norms and bravely pushed the boundaries just years after Emancipation.

Lisa, too, looked incredible at the event, wearing a simple white top with black tie, under a black blazer, wearing her short blonde locks in a sleek style. 

The US version of the show is produced by her company, Is or Isn't Entertainment.  

She said in the past: 'It's the most fun show and we get to keep doing it.' 

The show first began in the US on NBC on March 5, 2010 and ran for three seasons before being cancelled in 2012, before being picked up by TLC. 

The UK version of the show has seen the likes of Danny Dyer, Cheryl and Michelle Keegan.

item.title: Alexa Chung makes a rare solo outing in NYC as she discusses falling in love with 'amazing, supportive' Alexander Skarsgard in unearthed interview
item.description: The 34-year-old was pictured on a solo dash through NYC on Tuesday, as she spent a rare afternoon in the city alone, following multiple recent sightings with the Drowners lead singer Matt.
item.content:encoded:
She was believed to have rekindled her romance with Alexander Skarsgard in March, but was seen holding hands with ex Matthew Hitt in May.

And Alexa Chung seems keen to keep fans guessing after an unearthed interview with Porter hears her talk about 'falling in love with Tarzan' for the first time.

The 34-year-old was pictured on a solo dash through NYC on Tuesday, as she spent a rare afternoon in the city alone, following multiple recent sightings with the Drowners lead singer Matt, her ex-flame from 2014. 

Alexa looked lost in thought as she stepped out in Manhattan this week, carrying a tan jacket over one arm as she maintained an air of typically-cool street style.

She paired a basic white T-shirt with straight leg jeans and leather lace-up ankle boots, carrying a cute white handbag for her essentials.

The fashionista clutched a water bottle, seeming to walk with conviction in the absence of any company.

Just last week, Alexa raised eyebrows on another casual outing with one-time boyfriend Matt.

Despite dating as long ago as 2014, the duo have remained the friendliest of exes, and are regularly seen strolling through the city together.

Alexa seemed to reference her split from the rocker in an interview with Porter this February, simultaneously heaping praise on Tarzan actor Alexander, from whom it was understood that she had recently parted ways.

'[My best friend] was there for the heartbreak years,' she told the magazine. 'I think we spent thousands of dollars on booze and eggs. Then I fell in love with Tarzan.'

Referencing Alexander again, she elaborated: 'He’s an amazing man, very structured, responsible and supportive. He’s very good at, not making me more grown up, per se, but at making me take myself more seriously.' 

Alexa and Alexander confirmed their split in July 2017, with friends claiming the separation was entirely amicable after two years together.

Yet pictures of them arriving into London together by Eurostar in March seemed to hint that they had reconciled, and her kind words about the actor have now added more fuel to reunion reports.

It was the same interview in which Alexa explored the idea of 'losing her lesbian virginity'.

The British model and fashion designer confirmed that she would not rule it out, even saying that she was not sold on the idea of marriage, or monogamy.

She said: 'I don’t subscribe to the fact that you need one man to be happy: I think it’s a really crappy, anti-feminist sentiment.'
item.dc:abstract: Alexa Chung seems keen to keep fans guessing about her love life after an unearthed interview with Porter hears her talk about 'falling in love with Tarzan' for the first time. The 34-year-old was pictured on a solo dash through NYC on Tuesday, as she spent a rare afternoon in the city alone, following multiple recent sightings with the Drowners lead singer Matt, her ex-flame from 2014.
item.dc:creator: Becky Freeth

item.title: If you've got it, flaunt it! The RAUNCHIEST snaps of Love Island's ladies showcasing their curves in skimpy swimwear
item.description: The ladies of Love Island Australia have set pulses every night in their scantily clad displays.
item.content:encoded:
The ladies of Love Island Australia have set pulses every night in their scantily clad displays.

And there has been no shortage of the feisty females proudly parading their bikini bodies at the Majorca villa over the past week.

As Natasha, Millie, Tayla, Cassidy and Erin enjoy the Spanish summer Daily Mail Australia takes a look at some of their raciest swimsuit photos to date. 

Busty blonde business owner Natasha Cherie, 24, is another beauty who has proudly flaunted her physique in a high cut one piece online. 

In a recent snap shared to her Instagram page, Natasha is seen posing with a crimson one-piece swimsuit barely covering her ample assets and pert derrière.

A selfie previously shared by the glamazon shows her flaunting her slender figure in a black one piece, that also put a strong emphasis on her cavernous cleavage.

Brunette beauty Millie Fuller is another bikini fiend who knows just how to work in a tiny two piece.

No stranger to the sand and surf, the petite 24-year-old previously posted a photo of herself relaxing on a beach towel in a red and black bikini.

She also recently shared a snap of herself in a eye-catching yellow two-piece that accentuated her slender frame.

Perth-stunner Tayla Damir is another beauty who is not shy of showcasing her physique.

In photos shared on her Instagram last year, the 21-year-old proudly showed off her  body in a bright yellow two-piece bikini. 

Bartender Cassidy McGill, 23, similarity hasn't been shy when showing off her stunning physique in saucy swimwear.

Before entering the Love Island villa, the blonde beauty shared a series of Instagram, including a bathroom selfie showcasing her busty display in a black-and-white stripped bra.

Another snap of the stunner shows her wearing a tiny black bikini during a holiday to Cancún, Mexico in 2016. 

While her co-stars have previously boasted about their bodies on social media, Erin Barnett has shied away from posts like her co-stars, only showing off her bikini body Love Island.

There's been no shortage of sexiness from the pocket-sized stunner who recently flaunted her figure in a cleavage-baring swimsuit.

An honorable mention should be noted to recent evictee Kim Hartnett who had tongues wagging from the moment she walked into the Spanish Villa.

The 22-year-old single mother has proudly shown off her body in a series of eye-catching Instagram posts including white two piece that drew attention to her ample assets and pert derrière.

Meanwhile the latest female intruder Françoise has been impressing everyone with her bikini body.

item.title: Wizard of Oz's oldest living munchkin Jerry Maren dead at 98 following battle with dementia
item.description: The late star passed away at a nursing care facility in San Diego, California, last week, following an ongoing battle with dementia.The actor's funeral was held in Hollywood last weekend.
item.content:encoded:
The Wizard of Oz's oldest living munchkin Jerry Maren has died at the age of 98.

The late star passed away at a nursing care facility in San Diego, California, last week, following an ongoing battle with dementia.

The actor's family and friends gathered for his funeral at Forest Lawn in Hollywood over the weekend. 

Despite landing a number of small parts throughout his 70 years in showbiz, Jerry's most notable role was that of the 'oldest munchkin' in 1939 fantasy phenomenon The Wizard of Oz. 

Standing at 4ft 3in, Jerry was just 18-years-old when he starred as a member of The Lollipop Guild, alongside Jakob 'Jackie' Gerlich and Harry Earles, in the movie, which saw the late acting legend Judy Garland play leading lady Dorothy.

He went on to secure a number of uncredited roles, playing a gremlin in supernatural sitcom Bewitched in 1967 and an ape in 1968 cult classic Planet of the Apes. 

Jerry bagged his first supporting part in 1971 TV series Lidsville and boasted another title role in 1982 comedy series No Soap, Radio, which also starred Steve Guttenberg.

Jerry also had a walk-on role in an episode of Seinfeld 'The Yada Yada' and played a mime in the 2010-released comedy horror movie Dahmer Vs. Gacy, one of his final acting roles.

The long-time actor was bestowed the honour of a handprint and footprint ceremony at Grauman's Chinese Theatre in Hollywood in September 2013.

The privilege came six years after he appeared with six other Munchkin actors at the unveiling of a Hollywood Star for the Wizard of Oz Munchkins on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. 

Away from the spotlight, Jerry was married to Elizabeth Barrington for 36 years before she tragically passed away in 2011. 

His final Instagram post, shared in May 2017, was a black-and-white snap of the happy couple on their wedding day, alongside which Jerry wrote: 'Happy Aniversary my life long love. Rip.'

Jerry was also forced to use the social media site as a platform to dismiss reports he had died after he was the subject of a death hoax back in 2016.
item.dc:abstract: The Wizard of Oz's oldest living munchkin Jerry Maren has died at the age of 98. The late star passed away at a nursing care facility in San Diego, California, last week, following an ongoing battle with dementia. The actor's family and friends gathered for his funeral at Forest Lawn in Hollywood over the weekend.
item.dc:creator: Kayleigh Giles
item.mi:shortTitle: Wizard of Oz's oldest living munchkin Jerry Maren dies at 98

item.title: Rihanna, Sarah Paulson and Anne Hathaway compete for worst outfit at the Ocean's 8 premiere as they put on a bizarre parade of frock horrors
item.description: Rihanna, Sarah Paulson and Anne Hathaway competed for worst-dressed at the Ocean's 8 world premiere in New York City on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
They are three of the leading lights in the all-female reboot of the Ocean's franchise.

But Rihanna, Sarah Paulson and Anne Hathaway hit a style low point as they competed for worst-dressed at the Ocean's 8 world premiere in New York City on Tuesday, with an array of bizarre dresses taking centre-stage on the red carpet.

Singer Rihanna, 30, who plays technical genius Nine Ball in the film, put on a very quirky display in a shimmering asymmetric dress which featured out-there bell-shaped fringe detail, which covered her toned frame from view.

As well as swamping her figure, the outlandish gown featured extra material around the neck which almost obscured the Umbrella hitmaker's visage from view.

Her gorgeous legs were however on full display as the fabulous dress cut just around the knee and draped asymmetrically.

Throwing caution to the wind, the diva went with bold make-up look with smokey eyes and a deep berry lip.

Next up to join the worst-dressed parade was Sarah Paulson, 43, who plays Tammy, a suburban mum and Debbie Ocean's former partner-in-crime.

Grabbing attention on the red carpet, the blonde beauty slipped into a garish neon yellow frock with statement pearlescent tassels which made for a truly eccentric look on the red carpet.

Upping the ante for the offbeat look, the star accessorised with a matching neon bag.

Her blonde tresses were styled slicked back from her face while her pretty features were enhanced with a rich palette of make-up. 

Completing the frock horror parade was Oscar winner Anne Hathaway, 35, who plays celebrity Daphne Kluger in the film.

The brunette beauty covered her lithe frame in an tent-like halterneck dress with a white bodice and flamboyant oversized skirt.

Anne seemed keen to emphasise the extremely baggy skirt, which was decorated with black and yellow geometric patterns, and smiled as she fanned the material out.

Her brunette tresses were worn sleek and straight while her pretty features were accentuated with metallic shadow, feline flicks of liner and a sweep of peach blush. 

The trio joined actresses Cate Blanchett, Sandra Bullock, Mindy Kaling, Helena Bonham Carter, and Awkwafina to premiere the hotly-anticipated film.

After a three-year wait, the octet of Hollywood royalty looked proud to be finally introducing the heist movie at the global premiere, held at Alice Tully Hall in Manhattan

Ocean's 8 all-star female line-up sees Debbie Ocean (Bullock) - the estranged sister of Danny Ocean - attempt to pull of a $150 million heist at the Met Gala.

Cate Blanchett stars as Lou, Debbie's partner-in-crime, while Sarah Paulson plays Tammy, a suburban mom and Debbie's former partner-in-crime.

Mindy Kaling is along for the ride as Amita, a jewelry maker, while Awkwafina plays Constance, a thief.

Helena Bonham Carter also appears in the summer female blockbuster as Rose Weil, a fashion designer.

On the otherside is Anne playing Daphne Kluger, a celebrity and the target of the heist, whose assistant is James Corden (John Frazier).

It will also see cameos from Anna Wintour, Zayn Malik, Katie Homes, Serena Williams, Kim Kardashian, Kendall Jenner and Kylie Jenner. The movie hits theaters June 8

item.title: Faryal Makhdoom shares snaps of Amir Khan's 'man cave' to Instagram... proving the couple to be united following cheating scandal
item.description: Taking to her Instagram page, the 26-year-old posted a clip of the boxer's new man cave, and photos of the renovations taking place at their Bolton home - despite recent allegations of his infidelity.
item.content:encoded:
Their relationship was rocked earlier this month when it was claimed the boxer had been unfaithful, just two weeks after the birth of their second child.

But Faryal Makhdoom proved to be united with 'cheating' husband Amir Khan on Tuesday, when she shared snaps of their developing family home with followers. 

Taking to her Instagram page, the 26-year-old posted a clip of the boxer's new man cave, and photos of the renovations taking place at their Bolton home - despite recent allegations of his infidelity. 

Faryal first shared a video of the 'boys room' in their house, complete with plush sofas, flat screen TV and even a cabinet containing all of Amir's trophies. 

Clearly proud of the luxurious new room, the New York captioned the clip: 'Boys room almost coming together', followed by the high-five and love heart emojis. 

She had also shared an image of their stunning new living room at the end of last month, just as the cheating claims began to surface. 

Standing by her man and their happy family life, she wrote in the caption: 'Our home is finally coming together'. 

Faryal is currently overseeing the high-end building and interior design work at their luxury Bolton pad, while Amir is exploring new training facilities in the States.   

However, the couple have been plagued with drama in recent weeks - with boxer Amir being caught on private dating app Raya last week, just days after claims he had been unfaithful first emerged.

On the software, the former world champion's profile has advertised his availability, where he joins an exclusive host of celebrities and high-profile singletons.

The father-of-two's profile image shows the Bolton native gazing fiercely at the camera, while showcasing his toned upper body as he goes shirtless. 

The page also displays Amir's age, Twitter handle, and place of birth, as well as where he currently resides. MailOnline has contacted Amir's representatives for comment.  

The sportsman - who welcomed his second daughter Alayna in April - has been met with a number of cheating allegations since he tied the knot to Faryal in 2013. 

During their tumultuous romance, Amir and Faryal temporarily split in August 2017, but reconciled just three months later.

His 26-year-old wife recently touched on 'enduring hardship' following his alleged night of passion with beautician Sophia Hammani, 22, last month. 

The day before, Faryal shared two quotes on Instagram which seemed to be thinly-veiled jibes at her husband, with the first – attributed to Imam Ali – reading: 'Enduring hardship is more rewarding then enjoying ease'. 

Faryal's second heartbreaking quote by the same Muslim cleric said: 'It may happen that you ask God for something and he does not give it you to you in order to endow you with something of better quality later.'

Just days before, it was claimed Faryal had confronted the beautician who slept with the boxer just 17 days after the arrival of their newborn. She texted Sophia Hammani after discovering her number on the I’m A Celebrity star’s phone.

She said: 'What a f***ing a**hole. He makes me sick. I cannot believe this man'. Sophia, 22, admitted she had spent the night with the boxer in his hotel room after they met at a London club earlier this month.

However, instead of being angry with her husband's lover, Hammani claims they had a 'sisterly chat' and Faryal forgave her for the fling.  

The boxing star rejected the claims as 'nonsense' on Twitter, saying she was simply a fan aggrieved when he wouldn't pose for a photo.

The former Olympic boxer - who also shares four-year-old Lamaisah with the brunette beauty - wrote on Twitter after the story broke: 'What total nonsense! She was wanting a pic but was told to leave by security due to her being too drunk. IMO that's the reason she sold a story.'

Amir added: 'Quite strange at the fact that there is no photos of us together. Supposedly, i gave her £20, is that all she's worth?' In the early hours of this morning, Faryal mysteriously tweeted 's*** happens' to her 217,000 followers.

Taking to her Instagram page, the 26-year-old posted a clip of the boxer's new man cave, and photos of the renovations taking place at their Bolton home - despite recent allegations of his infidelity.

item.title: Elsa Hosk puts on a stylish display in lime green blouse and Gucci fanny pack as she grabs a green smoothie in New York
item.description: Elsa Hosk made a bold statement in a lime green blouse and Gucci fanny pack on Tuesday as she sipped a green smoothie while out and about in New York's East Village.
item.content:encoded:
Elsa Hosk made a bold statement in a lime green blouse and Gucci fanny pack on Tuesday as she sipped a green smoothie while out and about in New York's East Village.

The 29-year-old supermodel was effortlessly stylish in the bright top and statement accessories as she enjoyed a healthy beverage while out and about in the Big Apple.

Elsa shielded her eyes from the sunshine with dark-framed sunglasses and carried minimal essentials in her high-end body bag - which retails at an eye-watering £795.

Elsa appeared to be enjoying a spot of downtime in her non-stop schedule as she rocked her bright green top with black chino trousers.

The Swedish beauty accessorised her look with red and blue striped loafer heels as well as her designer bag, sporting her dark thick-framed sunglasses against her flawless complexion.

Elsa sported only a classic pink lip-gloss to highlight her plump pout as she headed into the city, keeping her blonde hair scraped back in a centre-part up-do.

Elsa went solo for the low-key outing after stunning with a sharp black suit at New York's CFDA awards, flashing a hint of her toned abs in the sartorial look.

The Victoria's Secret star first rose to public attention after joining the iconic lingerie brand in 2011, earning her coveted wings four years later.

Since then she has modelled for brands such as Dolce and Gabbana, Anna Sui and Guess, and has walked the Victoria's Secret annual fashion show seven times.

Elsa has also been in relationship with entrepreneur Tom Daly, 30 since some time in 2015 when they were first linked together.

However despite their high profiles, the pair keep their relationship private, only occasionally appearing on each other's social media.

Earlier this year Elsa and Tom did team up to star in an advert for J Brand jeans, larking about and giving each other piggyback rides in the light-hearted video.

item.title: Selma Blair shows off her slender legs in kooky boho mini as she head out for coffee and ice-cream run in LA
item.description: The 45-year-old Cruel Intentions star stuck her tried-and-tested flirty style, as she nailed the boho look in an intricately embroidered mini with pumps
item.content:encoded:
She has been spotted spending time with a mystery man for the past few weeks.

Yet Selma Blair was flying solo on Tuesday as she headed out for a coffee and ice-cream date without her rumoured new beau.

The 45-year-old Cruel Intentions star stuck to her tried-and-tested flirty style, as she nailed the boho look in an intricately embroidered mini with pumps.

Selma looked stunning for her outing as she showed off her endless legs in the black mini which was perfectly designed to also show off her waist. 

She nipped in her middle with a stylish belt while also toting a teal coloured bag to ensure she had all her essentials to hand. 

The Cruel Intentions beauty added a superstar touch by just rocking a pair of sunglasses over her perfectly made-up face. 

Her newly-lightened hair was styled into loose waves to help perfect her over-all boho babe ensemble.   

Selma has been spotted out and about in LA several times in recent days.

Just on Friday, she reunited with her Cruel Intentions co-star Sarah Michelle Gellar for a Pink concert at the Inglewood Forum. Gellar brought along her 8-year old daughter Grace, and one of her friends, for the girls night out.

'We have big smiles cause we were together at @pink concert and loved every minute,' Selma wrote on Instagram.

'It was the most incredible show I have ever been to and my heart is still blown open by what this incredible woman and performer does on that stage and in her life. We love you Pink!'

Selma left her 7-year old boy Arthur at home for the night out. 

Arthur's father is fashion designer Jason Bleick. Selma and Jason split up in 2012 after two years together.

item.title: 'Oh my God!' The Queer Eye cast send fans into a meltdown when they visit a local cafe in Canberra while filming the show's second season in Australia
item.description: They're filming season two in Australia and preparing to give an Australian celebrity a makeover.
item.content:encoded:
They're filming season two in Australia while gearing up to give a local celebrity a makeover.

And on Tuesday, the cast of Queer Eye enjoyed some downtime - sending fans into overdrive when they visited a local cafe in Canberra. 

The boys enjoyed dining at The Cupping Room, with the cafe owner sharing a shot to Instagram of the boys looking relaxed on the outing. 

Scroll down for video 

'Thanks to the Fab 5 @QueerEye for dropping by today!,' the post was captioned, with the post getting almost 1,000 likes. 

'Oh my god! Amazing!,' one fan commented underneath the snap. 

Another added: 'The Queer Eyes were in Canberra and I wasn't!'

One fan wrote: 'I am so upset, I wish I was there!'

Operations manager of The Cupping Room, Katie Bowen, told Daily Mail Australia about the visit from the boys. 

Katie said the staff are all 'massive fans' of the show, with the visit making their day.   

'The Queer Eye team are so incredibly nice and lovely, such genuine people,' Katie said. 

'They ordered a range of things from our menu including some of our staple items; the avocado, haloumi fingers and salmon dish.'

'Antoni (Porowski) did mention that in his opinion "Australia is definitely leading in the coffee industry." 

She added that the boys kept the identity of the celebrity to whom they are giving a makeover under wraps.

'We didn't hear any gossip about who they might be doing their makeover on, we didn't want to interrupt them too much as they were still settling in from the long plane ride,' she said.

'But we feel very humbled they came to visit and only hope they come back to say hi in the future!'  

Queer Eye is the Netflix revamp of Queer Eye For The Straight Guy. 

Earlier on Tuesday, the cast of the show worked off the jet lag by hitting the gym to exercise. 

While promoting the show Down Under, the Fab Five have teased fans about their plans to give a local celebrity one of their famous makeovers. 

Fans have speculated the celebrity could be One Nation senator Pauline Hanson or former Nationals leader, Barnaby Joyce. 

The second series of Queer Eye will premiere on Netflix on June 15.
item.dc:abstract: They're filming season two in Australia and preparing to give an Australian celebrity a makeover. And on Tuesday, the cast of Queer Eye enjoyed some downtime - sending fans into overdrive when they visited a local cafe in Canberra. The boys enjoyed dining at The Cupping Room, with the cafe sharing a shot to Instagram of the boys looking relaxed on the outing.

item.title: Kendall Jenner looks casually chic in simple plaid shirt and teal jeans as she heads out in New York... a day after she was pictured kissing Anwar Hadid
item.description: She's known for her daring sense of fashion and she's often seen gracing some of the world's most famous catwalk shows.
item.content:encoded:
She's known for her daring sense of fashion and she's often seen gracing some of the world's most famous catwalk shows. 

But model Kendall Jenner, 22, showed she can still stand out while wearing a casual look when she stepped out in New York on Tuesday. 

The half-sister of Kim Kardashian wore a simple plaid shirt tucked into a pair of teal jeans which were cropped, a day after she was pictured kissing Anwar Hadid.

Yet despite her simple sartorial choice, the raven-haired beauty was still a head-turner as she strolled down the sidewalk. 

She wore a pair of rather conservative heeled ankle boots as she sashayed to her next destination and wore her locks in a sleek yet straight style. 

She kept her accessories to a minimum for her outing, wearing a simple pair of earrings and carrying a silver bag across her body. 

The night before, Kendall was pictured kissing Anwar Hadid, the 18-year-old younger brother of her best pals Gigi and Bella Hadid.

DailyMail.com has obtained an image of the two kissing at a CFDA after party held at Socialista in New York City. 

Jenner also shared a photo of his hands that evening - he has several tattoos. One says 'I love you angel' and another states: 'ODXX 22.' He had chipped black nail polish on and several silver bracelets. 

For the past year, Anwar has been dating actress Nicola Peltz, who was not the CFDAs. 

The couple was last seen together in public in early May at a Prada event in NYC. According to TMZ, they split soon after that.

Kendall and Anwar have been friends for the past several years, often attending the same parties in New York and Los Angeles.
item.dc:abstract: She's known for her daring sense of fashion and she's often seen gracing some of the world's most famous catwalk shows. But model Kendall Jenner, 22, showed she can still stand out while wearing a casual look when she stepped out in New York on Tuesday. The half-sister of Kim Kardashian wore a simple plaid shirt tucked into a pair of teal jeans which were cropped in length.

item.title: TOWIE's Danielle Armstrong holds an emotional funeral for her late best friend Sammy after she died following a long battle with breast cancer
item.description: Danielle Armstrong, 30, gave her late pal Sammy an emotional farewell after she passed away last month following a long battle with breast cancer.
item.content:encoded:
Last month she revealed her best friend Sammy had sadly passed away following her battle with breast cancer. 

And Danielle Armstrong, 30, joined her beau Daniel Spiller, as well as her family and friends to give her late pal an emotional farewell.

Taking to Instagram on Tuesday, the former TOWIE star shared snaps of the funeral and revealed 'we had tears, cry’s laughs and dancing just like Sammy had wanted.' 

Danielle shared a snap of a huge heart-shaped floral bouquet, which saw Danielle and her companions smiling. 

She offered a lengthy caption: 'Yesterday We Said Goodbye To Our Princess. I hope we done you proud Sammy and every little detail you had planned for this day went exactly how you wanted it to go. 

'We had tears, cry’s laughs and dancing just like you said you wanted it to be like. I think it’s clear to see how loved you were by the amount of people that showed up to pay there respects to our true Essex princess.'

'Now it’s the hard part where we will try and live in a world without you and live with this hole in our hearts.'

'I just say to myself I will see you again one day and we can have so much to catch up on like we always loved our hourly evening catch ups just the next one we have can last forever.' 

'I promise I’ll look after your mum dad brother and jack always✨.

Danielle's other half David also offered an emotional post with Sammy's picture. 

Yesterday we said goodbye to our gorgeous Sammy, as hard as it was to say goodbye for now, it was a special day, what an incredible girl not only to plan your own day but to add in your humour along the way to put a smile on everyone’s face.

It truly was, a wedding, 30th and baby shower all in one. Goodnight, god bless Sammy,' he concluded the sweet post. 

Three weeks go Danielle took to Instagram where she informed her fans of the sad news: 'Last night we lost a princess but heaven gained an angel.

She said: 'We have been friends for over 20 Years and I can’t even find the words to describe how I’m feeling apart from the fact I’m so blessed and honoured to call you my best friend.  

'I take comfort knowing you are no longer in pain but at peace.'

Adding: 'Our beautiful sammy the way you say Danieellleeee and that screaming infectious laugh I will miss so much. 

'You will always be our 5th spice girl and I promise the whole world will get to know your story. Love you always Forever and you will always be in my heart my best friend my sister my sammy our princess xxx.' 

She also shared a video of herself with her pal in which she asked Sammy: 'What would you say you love about this holiday the most?'

Sammy replied: 'Spending all this quality time with you,' as she kissed her on her shoulder.'

'That's the cutest thing you've ever said in 25 years,' Danielle responded, as Sammy giggled.

On Saturday night, Danielle shared a picture of her hand holding Sammy's, writing: 'To anyone that may not have received my message that I cancelled my party due to my friend being very poorly.

'I thought it would best to share this for anyone that was going to attend this evening. Apologies if this is the first time you heard about it being cancelled. x'

Danielle's former TOWIE co-star Jessica Wright also paid tribute to Sammy in a sweet social media post. 

The reality star shared snaps of the pair together, writing: 'Heaven gained an angel yesterday. Sammy you were a light in so many peoples lives & my heart breaks at your loss & for your family. 

'Stunning, kind, fun, wonderful person & you will be missed by so many. Your last words to me were ‘never change jess’ , right back at you beautiful girl thank you @daniellearmstrong88 for introducing me to your wonderful friend thinking of you & all at this sad time. Love you Sammy.'

Earlier this year Danielle got a heart tattoo inked her rib cage in support of Sammy. 

In 2016, Danielle shared another snap of her friendship group, writing: 'Last night we celebrated our beautiful @sammybrandon's first night out with the girls after a brave year fighting breast cancer.

'We love you and so happy we have our Sammy back #friends #20years #special #close #lovethesegirls.' 

Danielle shared the heartbreaking news that her best friend was diagnosed with a terminal illness via Instagram a month ago. 

She broke the news to her 1.1m followers after fans noticed she had been away from social media for longer than usual, with many sharing their concerns with her.

In the devastating post, Danielle asked fans to 'cherish every moment' with loved ones as she explained how she's coping with the awful news.

Danielle shared a picture of an illustrated butterfly with the words: 'You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have'. 

In the lengthy caption, the TV personality detailed how fans had shared their concern for her and how she felt obligated to share her news. 

Danielle wrote: 'Lots of you have been messaging me on Instagram, Twitter and emails asking if everything is ok as I’ve been quite the last 10 days across all my social media. 

'I shouldn’t have to really write this but I do know its because people genuinely care and want to see if I’m ok..... My best friend of over 20 years has been told she is terminally ill and as you can imagine myself our friends & family are heartbroken.'

Struggling to come to terms with the heartbreaking revelation, Danielle added that she's determined to stay strong throughout the difficult ordeal.   

Danielle continued: 'I cant even find the words to describe the feelings, emotions and pain we are all going through but all I know is we are all staying strong it’s the only thing we can do.

'My friend is probably the strongest out of all of us and it’s her strength and how she is dealing with this which is helping us all do the same.

'I’ll have days I’m ok and you will see me being me in my shop and on snap chat being silly and then their will be days I’m just keeping myself to myself. All I ask is you cherish every moment you have with your loved ones and best friends'.

Fans of the reality star rushed to send their messages of support, with one kindly writing: 'Much love to you and your friend Dannii. So sorry to hear this sad news....you're a wonderful person and I'm sure will make fabulous memories with your friend while you can'.

Another replied: 'Bless you, it’s a shame you felt the need to explain to everyone', while a third simply wrote: 'Sending thoughts and prayers for you and your friend and family'.

Macmillan Cancer Support can be contacted on email or freephone: 0808 808 00 00 (Monday - Friday, 9am - 8pm).

item.title: Love Island: Cosying up to Channing Tatum, zip-lining with ex Dane Bowers and giddy Alan Shearer snap... Laura's celeb-hunting past REVEALED
item.description: Given her job as an Emirates air hostess, it seems the First Class cabins permitted the star some high-end star meetings while she is rumoured to have dated ex Dane
item.content:encoded:
It is a truth universally acknowledged, that Love Island contestants are not only seeking romance but also the inevitable fame that comes with the show.

And it seems Scottish air hostess Laura Anderson has always been celebrity-minded as backdated images on the 29-year-old's Instagram account show a host of superstar meetings and a D-list relationship.

Given her job as an Emirates air hostess, it seems the First Class cabins permitted the star some high-end star meetings while she is rumoured to have dated Another Level star and Katie Price's ex Dane Bowers.

Since joining the photo-sharing site in 2012, Laura has dedicated her page to images of some of the nine boyfriend she admitted to having, her high-flying life in the skies, bikini-clad getaways - and also her many snaps with an array of snaps. 

The most recent in her string of celeb links was a series of videos and snaps with Dane, who she is said to have dated, as they headed to an adventure park in Dane.

She shared a sweet snap as they cosied up to one another while also posting videos as they showed their wild side while zip-lining as they egged one another on. 

Laura's snaps with Dane only date back to February, meaning he may have been the boyfriend she referred to when saying she was single for two to three months. 

The confession was met with mirth, after viewers pointed out the applications for Love Island closed six months ago - meaning she had either dumped her beau to enter the show or had entered behind the 'mystery man's' back.

Possibly her most high-profile snap, was the image in which she cosied up to Channing while in her Emirates uniform, before also sharing an image with his Magic Mike co-star Adam Rodriguez - in yet another cosy shot. 

CSI star Kellan Lutz joined the A-list roll of stars on her roster, again looking elegant in her Emirates uniform and beaming at her celeb spot. 

England legend Alan Shearer was looking suave as he posed with Laura and her pals - again as she seemed delighted to be rubbing shoulders with the stars.

It seems Laura also has a frienship with the stars of Liberty X, as she recently posted an image with Kelly Young, Jessica Taylor and Michelle Heaton. 

As her celeb-spotting was revealed, Laura came under fire on Tuesday night's show after she was accused of gold-digging when she discovered her partner Wes Nelson revealed he had once spent £1000 on a first date. 

One user penned on Twitter: 'Laura liked Adam yesterday and now she hears about Wes has got money she's got fanny flutters the gold digger slosh pot #loveisland'.

The air hostess was flighty with her affections on Monday, having stepped forward for smoldering Wes after being paired with unlucky-in-the-villa Dr. Alex George.

In unbelievable scenes, Laura then decided she wasn't all that into her current partner when she fixed her eyes on the muscle-bound Adonis Adam Collard.

Yet on Tuesday, the Olivia lookalike angered fans when she declared her interest in the Electrical and Nuclear Systems Design Engineer after finding out he had money.

Love Island viewers branded the blonde bombshell as 'money grabbing' and 'shallow' in a slew of scathing tweets.

Others remarked: 'Funny how that Laura now suddenly cares about Wes now that she knows he's got money #golddigger #LoveIsland.'

item.title: Mel B's new Barbie-doll look leaves Simon Cowell VERY confused during America's Got Talent auditions
item.description: Mel B's latest transformation left head judge Simon Cowell agog as she took her seat on the judging panel on Tuesday
item.content:encoded:
She is somewhat of a style chameleon having shown off long curly brown tresses and a short slicked back bob during the latest series of America's Got Talent.

But Mel B's latest transformation left head judge Simon Cowell agog as she took her seat on the judging panel on Tuesday.

The former Spice Girl, 43, looked almost unrecognisable as she arrived to the show,wearing a flowing blonde hairpiece which cascaded down her shoulders in loose waves.

With soft make-up and a blush pink shift dress, the Wannabe hitmaker looked like a modern-day Barbie, and her transformation didn't go unnoticed by Simon.

The mogul, 58, did a double-take as Mel arrived, and stared at her without saying anything.

A typically outspoken Mel said: 'Do I look that different?'

As Simon continued to silently stare, she said: 'What's your problem? Either you like it or you don't!'

Simon finally responded with a slight grimace: 'I love it!' 

A moving tale of fatherly love preceded an astonishing performance that won Simon's coveted golden buzzer on Tuesday's episode of America's Got Talent.

When pediatric mental health nurse Michael Ketterer nervously took to the stage, he seemed to be like many others saying: 'My family is my reason I'm here.'

He soon told the amazing tale of how he almost lost his wife and daughter, with 'signs' later leading them to adopting five sons — three rescued from a squalid meth lab, one who was homeless, and another with cerebral palsy.

Michael then started singing To Love Somebody — stunning the room with his beautiful voice and a performance clearly driven by the words of devotion for his family. 

Simon struggled to contain his emotions as he called Michael 'real,' smiling as he said 'sometimes actions speak louder than words' — standing to press the golden buzzer sending him straight through to the live rounds.

After jumping for joy, Michael's wife and kids joined him for hugs onstage, with Simon also going up to meet them all, telling Michael: 'What a fantastic audition. Something about your voice, I genuinely mean this, is special and everything was perfect.'
item.dc:abstract: Mel B's latest transformation left head judge Simon Cowell agog as she took her seat on the judging panel on Tuesday. The former Spice Girl, 43, looked almost unrecognisable as she arrived to the show,wearing a flowing blonde hairpiece which cascaded down her shoulders in loose waves.
item.dc:creator: Eve Buckland
item.mi:shortTitle: Mel B's Barbie-doll look leaves Simon Cowell confused on AGT

item.title: Coronation Street stars celebrate Brooke Vincent's 26th birthday at VERY boozy bash complete with bouncy castle
item.description: Coronation Street stars partied up a storm on Tuesday night as they celebrated Brooke Vincent's 26th birthday with a booze-fuelled bash complete with shots and a bouncy castle.
item.content:encoded:
Coronation Street stars partied up a storm on Tuesday night as they celebrated Brooke Vincent's 26th birthday with a booze-fuelled bash.

Stars Lucy Fallon and Alan Halsall took to Instagram to share a slew of snaps and videos from the occasions, showing the soap's flagship actors downing shots and larking around on a bouncy castle.

In the hilarious snaps Brooke can be seen enjoying a drink or two while Lucy snaps some selfies, but it was all a bit too much for Colson Smith who fell asleep at the end of the night.

In the snaps Brooke - who's played Sophie Webster on Corrie since 2004 - can be seen passing around a tray of shots as she and her co-stars party on a boat in presumably Manchester, looking as stylish as ever in a white cropped top and red flared trousers.

And it appeared the soap beauty got into the birthday spirit as the night went on, with hilarious videos posted by Alan (Tyrone Dobbs) showing her dancing on a chair.

Writing in the caption: 'Oh s**t @brookelevivincent has taken over' the video showed the Dancing On Ice beauty having a whale of a time at the birthday bash.

Some of Brooke's co-stars that could also be spotted in the snaps were Lucy Fallon (Bethany Platt), Nicola Thorp (Nicola Rubinstein), Colson Smith (Craig Tinker), Ellie Leach (Faye Windass), James Burrows (Alex Neeson), Sair Khan (Alyz Nazir) and Alexandra Mardell (Emma Brooker).

And as the evening got into full swing another funny video saw the stars enjoying a run through a bouncy castle at Alan's house, with him writing in the caption 'Oh s**t the lunatics have taken over the asylum.'

Inside the toy he also filmed Lucy – who at the weekend won two gongs at the British Soap Awards – looking much the worse for wear and a now quieter Brooke slumped at the back studying her phone.

The footage ended with Lucy mouthing 'F**K off' at the lens. 

But the evening proved to be too much for Colson, who fell asleep in one of the final snaps while Alexandra took a selfie.

Earlier in the week many of Brookes co-stars took to social media to wish her a happy birthday, with the actual occasion falling on Monday 4 June.

Alan left his pal red-faced after sharing a boozy snap of Brooke hanging out of her car window with the cheeky caption: 'Happy birthday to one of the most elegant, classiest young women I know @brookelevivincent #shewillbeexpectingtoseethispictoday #stayclassy'.

Michelle Keegan also shared a sweet snap of the pair, with a caption reading: 'One of a kind you girl'.

Her co-star Ryan Thomas' brother Scott was also dishing out some love, as he shared a duo of images with the caption: 'From day to now!!! Love ya! Happy bday'.

And it appeared even the party's aftermath was a mean feat, as Alan posted some funny snaps of his house riddled with empty bottes after having almost the entire Corrie cast in his house for the after-party.

He captioned one photo: 'No don't worry guys I will clean up' before tagging several of his co-stars.

Another post also showed the words: 'So Tuesday night... well that escalated quickly.'

item.title: Marnie Simpson brands Love Island's Adam Collard a 'liar' for saying he rejected Geordie Shore offer and claims he auditioned for EVERY series
item.description: The 26-year-old star has refuted Adam's claims that he was approached by bosses of the raucous reality show, but turned them down because he's 'not that type of person'.
item.content:encoded:
Marnie Simpson has branded Love Island's Adam Collard a 'liar' after he claimed he repeatedly rejected offers to appear in MTV's Geordie Shore.

The 26-year-old star refuted Adam's claims that he was approached by bosses of the raucous reality show, but turned them down because he's 'not that type of person'.

Instead, Marnie told her Twitter followers that the hunky personal trainer, 22, was 'rejected' after auditioning numerous times for the show. 

Speaking to MailOnline ahead of his stint in the Love Island villa, she said: 'I saw him on a night out and he said: "Do you want to come on Geordie Shore?" I was like “not really, because it’s not me.” I’m not that type of person.

He added: 'Don’t get us wrong, I like going out. But I’m not daft, I’ve got something between my ears at the same time. 

'I wouldn’t want the stereotype of “Oh, let’s go, let’s get f**ked.” Like, it’s not me, do you know what I mean? I wouldn’t want to come across that way as well.'

The reality star also claimed that the real Newcastle is 'more like Love Island than Geordie Shore'.

But Marnie slammed Adam's allegation, writing: 'Well that's a lie. You auditioned for it every series and got rejected.' 

Marnie's co-stars Holly Hagan and Chloe Ferry also appeared to support her remark as they later liked the tweet. 

If the former Celebrity Big Brother star's claim is true, Adam might not want to bid his supposed Geordie Shore dream goodbye just yet, as last year's Love Island contestant Sam Gowland went on to bag a spot on the reality show.   

Adam is certainly making for entertaining viewing for Love Island fans, after stealing Kendall Rae-Knight from Niall Aslam. 

The fitness enthusiast, who has had many of the girls vying for his attention, even stole a kiss from the former beauty queen as they shared a romantic candlelit dinner.

item.title: Colin and Livia Firth put on a loving display at Happy Prince premiere party after she admitted to affair with man she accused of stalking her
item.description: They've been facing personal woes since Livia Firth admitted to an affair with a man who she later accused of stalking her.
item.content:encoded:
They've been facing personal woes since Livia Firth admitted to an affair with a man who she later accused of stalking her. 

But the Italian film producer put on a united front with her husband Colin, 57, when they attended an afterparty following the premiere for the Happy Prince movie.

The event was hosted by Justine Picardie, the editor of Harper's Bazaar, at London's swanky Cafe Royal.

Livia, 48, who promotes eco-friendly fashion, stood out wearing a purple and pink patterned blazer over an all-black ensemble and strappy heels. 

Colin looked smart wearing a black suit with his white shirt unbuttoned a little. 

The heart throb stars as Reggie Turner in the untold story of the last days in the tragic times of Oscar Wilde.

Other big names appearing in the film include Rupert Everett and Emily Watson. 

Colin and Livia's outing comes after prosecutors reportedly revealed they had enough evidence to go to trial with Livia's alleged stalker Brancaccia, and under Italian law the journalist could face up to five years in prison.

After being charged with the crime, the Italian legal system states that a preliminary hearing will decide whether Brancaccia's case will proceed to full trial.

A preliminary hearing has been postponed until July due to a lawyers’ strike.

Prosecutor Maria Monteleone said: ‘There was evidence of stalking against the victim in the form of messages and emails.

‘She was very frightened and they were serious persecutory acts against her. She had to change her lifestyle because of the messages.

'She made her complaint in the prosecutors office in Rome and we recovered material from the defendant’s home.’

Livia had a secret romance with Brancaccia while she and husband Colin were temporarily separated.

She later accused 55-year-old Brancaccia of a campaign of harassment when their one-year relationship ended in 2016.

item.title: Susanna Reid reveals she lets her 12-year-old son watch Love Island... despite references to sex toys, threesomes and the 'mile high club'
item.description: Speaking on Good Morning Britain, the presenter said she feels the ITV2 series is 'more moralistic' than most on television - but assured he is not allowed to watch when it gets 'too rude'.
item.content:encoded:
It is known to be raunchy as a series, and has even screened contestants copulating in the past.

But Susanna Reid has revealed that she allows her 12-year-old son to watch Love Island - despite its adult and sexual themes. 

Speaking on Tuesday's Good Morning Britain, the presenter, 47, said she feels the ITV2 series is 'more moralistic' than most shows on television - but assured he is not allowed to watch when it gets 'too rude'. 

Co-host Piers Morgan was left shocked when Susanna revealed she allows her three sons - aged 12, 14, and 16 - to watch the saucy show.

Taken aback by her admission, Piers asked of her youngest: 'You're letting him watch that programme with people just basically trying to have sex all the time?'

However, the Croydon-born journalist was quick to defend the show in return, and claim the contestants have 'morals' that can be learned from.

She responded: 'They're not trying to do that! They actually have pretty good morals compared to some of the stuff on television. It's much more moralistic.'

Placing his head in his hands, a dumbfounded Piers simply said: 'It's moralistic... Love Island... all that.'

Yet, Susanna did confirm she monitors her 12-year-old's viewing, and does not let him watch the raunchier scenes under the covers. 

'I don't let him watch it when it gets rude,' she added, 'A little bit later in the series we won't be watching.' 

The brunette's confession comes after the ITV2 show aired particularly adult content on Tuesday night.

The islanders participated in a Kiss and Tell game during the episode, which saw them lock lips on-screen after revealing their sauciest secrets.  

Dr Alex George revealed he had previously enjoyed a threesome, while Niall Aslam admitted to using a musical instrument as a sex toy. 

Air hostess Laura Anderson also admitted to being a member of the 'mile high club' - having had sex on an airplane - while Jack Fincham confessed to cheating on both of his previous girlfriends. 

With the nation hooked on the show, Piers and Susanna continued to joke about Love Island throughout their broadcast. 

The pair went on to announce their Good Evening Britain spin-off show, which will go head-to-head with the ITV2 series later this month.

Piers couldn't help but remark that the new panel show will wage war on ratings winner Love Island, causing Susanna to quip: 'I'll have to get my bikini out!'

item.title: Ocean's 8: Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway, Sandra Bullock and Rihanna make up a Hollywood octet of leading ladies as they premiere all-female reboot
item.description: Cate Blanchett, Sarah Paulson, Anne Hathaway, Sandra Bullock, Mindy Kaling, Helena Bonham Carter, Awkwafina and Rihanna stood in formation on the red carpet for the Ocean's 8 world premiere.
item.content:encoded:
The impressive A-list cast of Ocean's 8 redefined 'squad goals' on the red carpet on Tuesday night.

Actresses Cate Blanchett, Sarah Paulson, Anne Hathaway, Sandra Bullock, Mindy Kaling, Helena Bonham Carter, Awkwafina and Rihanna stood in formation to premiere an all-female reboot of the franchise in New York.

After a three-year wait, the octet of Hollywood royalty looked proud to be finally introducing the heist movie at the global premiere, held at Alice Tully Hall in Manhattan.

They represented a cross-section of women in Hollywood, each with individual red carpet style and a back catalogue of blockbusters under their belts.

The actors have spoken at length about how it felt to work with so many talented stars, which was made all the more significant because they were all women.

Sandra Bullock told People in May: 'I saw a group of women support each other in the most humbling way. Everyone wanting the other to ‘have their moment.'

She went on to say: 'Early on in the shoot we started reading stories that we were at each other’s throats, but the opposite was true. A lot of film was wasted on laughing fits that usually resulted in makeup having to be redone and a little snot being removed.' 

Meanwhile, the stars have tried to play down the significance of the line-up being exclusively women.

Awkwafina told Refinery29: 'I hope we can live in a world where it’s not special, where it can just be a movie.'

Cate Blanchett conquered, adding: 'I hope that we don’t have to have these conversations anymore. I am really done with talking about how amazing it is that we’ve got an all-female cast. 

'Because in the end, it’s a heist movie, and you don’t want this sort of political climate on a human issue to eclipse the fact that this is just a fun film. The timing is actually completely coincidental. Fantastic, wonderful, but completely coincidental.'

Ocean's 8 all-star female line-up sees Debbie Ocean (Bullock) - the estranged sister of Danny Ocean - attempt to pull of a $150 million heist at the Met Gala.

Cate Blanchett stars as Lou, Debbie's partner-in-crime, while Sarah Paulson plays Tammy, a suburban mom and Debbie's former partner-in-crime.

Mindy Kaling is along for the ride as Amita, a jewelry maker, while Awkwafina plays Constance, a thief, and Rihanna is Nine Ball, a tech genius.  

Helena Bonham Carter also appears in the summer female blockbuster as Rose Weil, a fashion designer.

On the otherside is Anne Hathaway playing Daphne Kluger, a celebrity and the target of the heist, whose assistant is James Corden (John Frazier).

It will also see cameos from Anna Wintour, Zayn Malik, Katie Homes, Serena Williams, Kim Kardashian, Kendall Jenner and Kylie Jenner. The movie hits theaters June 8.

The cast - along with some of the cameo stars - certainly set the red carpet alight on Tuesday night, with an ecclectic choice of red carpet outfits. 

Sarah Paulson made quite the statement in an electric green dress, made up of thousands of confetti like frills. 

Sandra Bullock and Anne Hathaway showcased their individual styles in elegant floor-sweeping dresses, oozing glamour.

Gravity alum Sandra, 53, looked every inch the movie star in a gold fringe dress while Devil Wears Prada star Anne, 35, turned heads in a unique geometric gown.

Sandra's fabulous sartorial choice featured an ethereal sheer gold fabric with intricate bedazzled designs. 

She showcased her delicate decolletage and ample cleavage as the showstopping number boasted a plunging neckline.  

Rihanna commanded attention in a dazzling purple couture dress that cut just around the knee and draped asymmetrically with bell-shaped frills.  

Allowing the fashion forward sartorial choice to speak for itself, Rihanna opted for minimal accessories with only a set of floral shaped earrings and small clutch.

The sensational deep purple color of the fabric highlighted her perfect skin tone.

Throwing caution to the wind, the darling diva went virtually makeup free with only a slight smokey eye and deep berry lip.  

Her trademark raven tresses were left long and slicked straight as they cascaded over her back.

Meanwhile, the Barbadian beauty has broken up with her billionaire boyfriend, Hassan Jameel.

According to reports the pop star ended her romance with the Saudi businessman, after supposedly 'tiring' of him,

A friend of the musician told MediaTakeOut.com: 'It's over... Rihanna broke his heart. That's what she does, break men's hearts. Rihanna just got tired of him. She gets tired of men sometimes.'

Rihanna had never confirmed the romance, thought to have started last year, but had spoken of being in a serious relationship in interviews.

Indeed in the June edition of Vogue she said her unnamed partner had given her a new outlook on life.

The Stay hitmaker explained: 'I used to feel guilty about taking personal time, but I also think I never met someone who was worth it before.' 

And Rihanna had a role in creating her movie's character Nine Ball - a street-smart hacker with dreadlocks.

In a recent Vogue article, the movie's director Gary Ross remembers brainstorming ideas for her character after one of her concerts in 2016 and coming up with the idea to make Nine Ball a Barbadian native.

'Rihanna is so bravely authentic. She doesn’t care what people think of her; she’s fully invested in being herself,' said Ross. 

'She also has a seriousness of purpose and focus that not a lot of people have. It’s all about the work, and it doesn’t come with any excess personal baggage.'
item.dc:abstract: Ocean's 8 castmembers (from left) Cate Blanchett, Awkwafina, Sarah Paulson, Anne Hathaway, Sandra Bullock, Mindy Kaling, Helena Bonham Carter and Rihanna stood in formation on the red carpet in New York on Tuesday night, proud to be finally introducing their female reboot after three years in the works.
item.dc:creator: Becky Freeth

item.title: 'My new man': Former high class escort Samantha X announces famous Welsh actor as her 'boyfriend'
item.description: One is a former high-class escort who commanded $1000 an hour for her services, and the other is an actor from TV series The Alienist.
item.content:encoded:
One is a former high-class escort who commanded $1000 an hour for her services.

The other is an actor from TV series The Alienist and who has appeared in big-name Hollywood movies, including Fast & Furious 6 and The Hobbit.

And on Wednesday, Samantha X, 44, posted an Instagram photo of her cuddling up to Luke Evans, with the joking caption: 'I would like to introduce my new man. The Real Luke Evans.'

In the picture, Samantha is clad in a busty midriff top, with her lips pursed into a kiss towards Luke, who looks towards her with a smile. 

Samantha continued: 'See that look? That is clearly love in his eyes ... We met, by chance, on the steps of my favourite hotel in Melbourne.' 

She added: 'Our relationship lasted around 90 seconds, which is one of my longest and most successful.'

It is not suggested that anything physical actually took place between the pair.  

The unlikely pair do in fact have a very intriguing connection - in The Alienist, Luke, 39, plays 19th-century illustrator John Moore who is part of a team trying to unmask a serial killer who has been targeting boy prostitutes who dress as girls.

His character frequents brothels and has a favourite prostitute.

Samantha - real name Amanda Goff - stopped working as an escort last year but still runs a highly successful female agency. 

On her Instagram post, Samantha commented: 'We [Luke and I] took the lift together and of course I talked for the both of us', but she claimed not to have seen The Alienist.

Some binge-watching might be in order for the former call girl.
item.dc:abstract: One is a former high-class escort who commanded $1000 an hour for her services. The other is an actor from TV series The Alienist and who has appeared in big-name Hollywood movies including Fast & Furious 6 and The Hobbit. And on Wednesday, Samantha X posted a shot on Instagram of her cuddling up to Luke Evans, with the caption: 'I would like to introduce my new man. The Real Luke Evans.'

item.title: Susanna Reid leaves Piers Morgan wide-eyed as she jokes she'll host ITV late night special Good Evening Britain in her BIKINI in a bid to steal Love Island viewers
item.description: Susanna Reid left co-host Piers Morgan wide-eyed as she joked she will be donning her bikini to host the newly announced Good Evening Britain spin-off show.
item.content:encoded:
She is the bubbly presenter who has won a legion of fans on Good Morning Britain with her wit, intelligence and ageless good looks.

And Susanna Reid left co-host Piers Morgan wide-eyed as she joked she will be donning her bikini to host the newly announced Good Evening Britain spin-off show, set to go head to head with Love Island later this month.

The brunette beauty, 47, and 53-year-old Piers will take their winning double act to a special one-off primetime episode of their hit show, which will air on on ITV on June 28, immediately after England's third World Cup group match against Belgium.

Scroll down for video 

Announcing the news on the show today, a whimsical Piers said: 'You know you think you've had enough of me in the mornings? 

'Good news Britain, you're going to get a load of me in the evenings because we are having our first ever Good Evening Britain.'

Susanna added: 'We've made the big time!'

Piers continued: 'We are coming to primetime – we're actually very excited about it. I won't have to go to bed for that until about mid-afternoon, it's going to be great.'

As Piers, known for his no-holds-barred interviews,  emphasised the fact the show will air post watershed, he couldn't help but remark that Good Evening Britain will wage war on ratings winner Love Island.

Susanna then said: 'I'll have to get my bikini out' leaving Piers speechless and very wide-eyed. 

The one-hour episode will feature debate, chat, a host of famous faces giving their thoughts on the match result and capture the thoughts of the nation after England's clash with Belgium. 

Good Evening Britain will also focus on the controversial, memorable and amusing moments of the night, alongside the usual news, current affairs and showbiz stories of the day 

Emma Gormley, Managing Director of ITV Studios, Daytime said: 'We are excited to introduce one of our flagship shows to the evening schedule. It promises to be a lively 60 minute event, filled with all of the ingredients that make GMB so unmissable!'
item.dc:abstract: Susanna Reid left co-host Piers Morgan wide-eyed as she joked she will be donning her bikini to host the newly announced Good Evening Britain spin-off show, set to go head to head with Love Island later this month. The brunette beauty, 47, and 53-year-old Piers will take their winning double act to a special one-off primetime episode of their hit show, which will air on June 28 on ITV, immediately after England's third World Cup group match against Belgium.

item.title: Amber Rose goes TOPLESS as she seductively licks a boxing glove to promote her SlutWalk movement
item.description: Amber Rose, 33, took to her Instagram platform on Tuesday to upload a topless snap to promote the 4th annual march for her organisation SlutWalk.
item.content:encoded:
She has been a staunch supporter of women's right - championing sisterhood, independence and sexual freedom. 

And Amber Rose took to her Instagram platform on Tuesday to upload a topless snap to promote the 4th annual march for her organisation SlutWalk.

The model, 34, oozed body confidence in the image as she licked a boxing glove while utilising her other arm to cover her eye-popping assets. 

Stood against a black background, Amber ensured all focus on herself as she gave the camera a strong, sexy and unapologetic pose. 

The inked beauty made sure to cover her modesty, while cladding the rest of her physique in a pair of monochrome bottoms which was engraved with the SultWalk logo.    

Amber informatively captioned the snap: 'SLUTWALK 2018: October 6th, 2018,  The wait is over! Join me for the 4th annual SlutWalk at Pershing Square in DTLA and get your applications in to reserve your spot as an Intern, Vendor or Sponsor by heading to the “Get Involved” section of www.amberroseslutwalk.com 

'I cant wait to see all of my Rosebuds,' she ended. 

In another image shared before the SlutWalk image, Amber showed off her racy flair once again as she dangled on some ropes. 

The former video vixen slipped her famous curves in a perilously plunging red and black bodysuit. 

Amber completed the look with a pair of thigh-high socks and towering high heels as she gave the camera her best sultry look. 

Her sexy Instagram display comes after Amber discussed the difficulties she faced due to her large bust size.   

'My boobs slowed me down,' she said of her natural 36H cup size in an interview with People. 'It was almost as if I had like a heavy backpack on my chest.'

So in January, the star went under the knife to have breast reduction surgery.

Now a 36DDD, she told People she's glad she decided to get the procedure done after three years of prevaricating.

'I was scared that I wouldn't feel sexy anymore, but it got to the point where I literally was in pain,' she said.

She also said she worried she looked heavier than she was because of the size of her breasts. 

It all came to a head when she appeared as a contestant on ABC's reality show Dancing With The Stars in 2016 with pro partner Maksim Chmerkovskiy.

'My boobs slowed me down. And, my partner, Maks, would be like, 'Come on! Hurry up, faster, faster, faster.' And, I'm like, 'Dude, I can't go any faster! I'm like in pain. I literally cannot move that fast,'' she said.

Amber explained that she started getting breasts at the age of 14 and that their size fluctuated over the years as her weight changed. After giving birth to son Sebastian in 2013, she said they got much bigger. 

'I had to wear two to three sports bras while exercising,' she revealed. 

'There was times I would just walk and just stop and be like … it would kill me. And, so, at that point, I was like, this is more of like a health issue, where I have to get this done,' she told People. 

Amber's three-and-a-half-hour surgery was performed by Beverly Hills plastic surgeon Dr. Garth Fisher and she says her new look is 'a dream come true.'
item.dc:abstract: She has been a staunch supporter of women's right - championing sisterhood, independence and sexual freedom. And Amber Rose took to her Instagram platform on Tuesday to upload a topless snap to promote the 4th annual march for her organisation SlutWalk. The model, 34, oozed body confidence in the image as she licked a boxing glove while utilising her other arm to cover her eye-popping assets.
