item.title: Kendra Wilkinson shares details of her fight with ex Hank Baskett in real-time via Twitter
item.description: The Girls Next Door said Baskett, who played wide receiver for the Philadelphia Eagles, was blaming her for the end of his career on the football field.
item.content:encoded:
Kendra Wilkinson shared on Twitter Tuesday the details of a fight she had with ex Hank Baskett, but later deleted the tweets.

The 32-year-old wrote, 'Why is Hank recording me right now. Please tell him to leave me alone and stop.'

The Girls Next Door said that the 35-year-old Baskett, who played wide receiver for the Philadelphia Eagles, Minnesota Vikings and Indianapolis Colts over a five-year NFL career, was blaming her for the end of his time on the gridiron. 

Hank was 'blaming me for cheating on me while I was pregnant,' with their four-year-old daughter Alijah in 2014, wrote Kendra, who also shares an eight-year-old son Hank IV with the NFL alum. (Hank denied the accusations.)

The former Playboy Mansion resident said Hank intentionally recorded her to push her buttons.

'I'm minding my business and after I tell him to leave me alone he disrespects me, I'm trying to get out my house fast,' she wrote. 'I'm beyond sad. But recording me is my trigger.'

The San Diego native tweeted that she 'tried so hard' to keep things cordial with Hank, but the two continue to have a rocky relationship.

'I did everything by the book and loved and I get s*** on. I'm so sorry for u all to feel awkward rt now. When I was being recorded I felt threatened. Have a good day.'

She later wrote: 'When u feel like u give the best of yourself 24/7 and someone trying to take the best of u... it's hard to breathe. Love you all.'

Hank's been 'taking big digs at Kendra to get under her skin,' an insider told E! News about the tension between the two, as he 'knows what bothers her most.'

Said the source: 'He sees that she is trying to move on and wants to date again, and it's something that triggers him. It has been an ongoing battle between the two.'

'A lot of animosity' has surfaced 'a lot throughout the divorce process,' according to the insider.

Kendra in April filed to end her eight-year marriage to the athlete.
item.dc:abstract: Kendra Wilkinson shared on Twitter Tuesday the details of a fight she had with ex Hank Baskett, but later deleted the anger-fueled tweets. The 32-year-old wrote, 'Why is Hank recording me right now. Please tell him to leave me alone and stop.' The Girls Next Door said that the 35-year-old Baskett, who played wide receiver for the Philadelphia Eagles, Minnesota Vikings and Indianapolis Colts over a five-year NFL career, was blaming her for the end of his time on the gridiron.

item.title: Gigi Hadid confirms Zayn Malik reunion with loved-up Instagram Story snapshot
item.description: They broke up in March, but were glimpsed kissing at the end of April. And this Tuesday evening, Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik went Instagram official with their reunion, cozying up to each other on her Story.
item.content:encoded:
They broke up in March, but were glimpsed kissing at the end of April.

And this Tuesday evening, Gigi Hadid and Zayn Malik went Instagram official with their reunion, cozying up to each other on her Story.

Gigi, 23, shot an enigmatic stare at her phone camera as the ex-One Direction bandmate leaned over and appeared to plant a kiss on her cheek.

Though Zayn's face was not visible to the camera, the Bradford-born 25-year-old could be identified by a chessboard tattoo on his left forearm.

He appeared to have gone shirtless for the snap, while Gigi was in a cleavage-baring black outfit for what she wrote was an 'after party.'

Earlier that evening, she had posed up a storm with fellow supermodel Lily Aldridge at the New York City premiere of the new film Ocean's 8.

Gigi dated Zayn for about two years before their breakup went public.

Shortly after Gigi and Zayn publicly revealed their split, he had multiple tattoos applied in the span of a week, including the number 25 - his age - on his neck.

As early as this January, Zayn could be spotted on Gigi's Instagram page sporting a chest tattoo of what uncannily appeared to be her eyes.

At the end of April, DailyMail.com exclusively obtained photos of Gigi and Zayn sharing a kiss on a New York City sidewalk - she holding a bag from her own line.

Zayn was bald at the time - this being before he adopted the platinum blonde cropped hairdo he sported in Monday evening's Instagram Stories photo.

Gigi is the elder sister of fellow supermodel Bella Hadid and lesser-known model Anwar Hadid - as well as the daughter of ex-Real Housewife Yolanda Hadid.

Anwar, 18, was glimpsed this week sharing a smooch with Gigi's pal Kendall Jenner, 22.

Gigi, 23, shot an enigmatic stare at her phone camera as the ex-One Direction bandmate leaned over and appeared to plant a kiss on her cheek.

item.title: Abby Lee Miller undergoes another MRI and emergency surgery amid cancer battle
item.description: 'After another 2 hour MRI this morning, the pros thought I needed one more quick little emergency surgery!' she wrote alongside a shot of her arm rigged with an intravenous line.
item.content:encoded:
Abby Lee Miller was forced to undergo another emergency surgery.

The 51-year-old, who is battling newly-diagnosed cancer, revealed on Instagram on Tuesday that she was back in hospital.

 'After another 2 hour MRI this morning, the pros thought I needed one more quick little emergency surgery!' she wrote alongside a shot of her arm rigged with an intravenous line.  

'Ugh! I’m in recovery now and texting so everything must be ok,just hiccups in my plans! 

She continued: 'I’m on a tight schedule; shooting two projects and I need to get out of here and on with my life!!! Please keep me in your prayers. I’m grateful for all the well wishes!'

The Dance Moms star was recently diagnosed with Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, shortly before her release from prison.

Last month a source told People that the reality star was 'losing it' and was in a 'really bad place'. 

'She has two more chemo sessions to go, but she's in a really bad place - mentally and emotionally. She's really losing it,' they said.  

In April Abby underwent a four-hour emergency operation shortly after her prison release, on what doctors first thought was a spinal infection. 

It's been a difficult few years for Miller, who had been in custody at Victorville Federal Correctional Institution from July until late last month in connection with her bankruptcy fraud conviction.

She lost 100 pounds while in custody while at the penitentiary.

In March, she began staying at a Long Beach, California halfway house, where she was slated to stay until May 25.

item.title: Jared Leto 'to reprise his role as the Joker in standalone film'... two years after Suicide Squad
item.description: His introduction in 2016's Suicide Squad fell a bit flat. But Jared Leto is hoping to deliver in his very own Joker movie.
item.content:encoded:
He played the character in 2016's Suicide Squad.

 And Jared Leto will be getting his own Joker movie.

Warner Bros has given the green light to a standalone movie, expanding on Leto interpretation's of him, Variety reported on Tuesday.

The studio announced last fall that it was developing a Joker origin tale with  Hangover director Todd Phillips.

Joaquin Phoenix was tapped to play the lead; however Warner insisted Leto's version was not being scrapped.

Instead, Phillips film would fall under a new 'origins' banner which would be completely separate from the established DC cinematic universe.

This in turn would allow different actors take the same roles, but different versions.

There is no production date, and no writer attached as of yet. 

The Oscar-winner had some big shoes to fill, following fan-adored interpretations from Heath Ledger, Jack Nicholson, Cesar Romero and even Mark Hamill's animated version.
item.dc:abstract: His introduction in 2016's Suicide Squad fell a bit flat. But Jared Leto is hoping to deliver in his very own Joker movie. Warner Bros has given the green light to a standalone movie, expanding on Leto interpretation's of him, Variety reported on Tuesday.

item.title: Hilaria Baldwin wears black lingerie and dotes on baby Romeo calling him a 'king' in Instagram video
item.description: The devoted mom shared more images of 19-day-old Romeo on Tuesday, bragging he is 'already accomplishing great thing' along with a gold trophy emoji and the banner 'king'.
item.content:encoded:
She gave birth to her fourth child and third son on May 17.

And Hilaria Baldwin can't stop showing him off on her Instagram.

The devoted mom shared more images of 19-day-old Romeo on Tuesday, bragging he is 'already accomplishing great thing' along with a gold trophy emoji and the banner 'king'.

The tot is seen wrapped up in a fluffy blanket.

Hilaria, 34, who wed actor Alec Baldwin, 60, in 2012, wears black lacy lingerie in the video she posted to Instagram.

The naked infant is pictured cuddling up to her and snuggling against her breast

The yoga instructor has snapped back into shape with seeming remarkable ease.

On Monday, she shared a selfie to her Instagram bragging that she's now back in her skinny jeans.

'Hello my old jean friends,' the Spanish-born brunette 34-year-old yogi wrote alongside the snap showing her in the tight denims paired with a fitted turtleneck.

Hilaria dressed things up with nude heels, diamond rings and a coat for the outdoors.

Later on, she shared a pre-running selfie where she was equipped with a fanny pack, wireless headphones and comfortable jogging clothes.

In addition to baby Romeo, Hilaria and Alec are parents to daughter Carmen, four, and sons Rafael, two, and Leonardo, one.

The 30 Rock and SNL star also has a daughter Ireland, 22, with his ex-wife Kim Basinger.

And Tuesday was a very sad day for Ireland, who is forging a career as a model.

She shared with her Instagram followers that her beloved Husky Balto had passed away.

She posted a video clip of the dog along with the message: 'heaven got a really incredible doggo today. thank you for bringing me all the joy you did and i’m glad i got a shot at being your momma. i love you Balto.'

item.title: How much Married At First Sight stars are REALLY paid: Nasser Sultan reveals the surprisingly low amount cast members received for 'living expenses' and admits they even had to buy their own FOOD
item.description: Married At First Sight contestants put their lives on hold for up to four months and risk destroying their reputations for TV ratings gold.
item.content:encoded:
Married At First Sight contestants put their lives on hold for up to four months and risk destroying their reputations for TV ratings gold.

But how much are cast members actually paid to take part in the show?

There is no salary, per se, however participants do receive daily 'living expenses' that are expected to cover food and bills.

Scroll down for video 

Nasser Sultan told Stav, Abby & Matt on Wednesday that he only received $150 per day in exchange for appearing on the show. 

'Out of that, we've got to buy our own food and we've got to pay our own bills, so it's really not much money,' he said.

'When [the Network is] making millions of dollars out of something, it's not much money.'

Nasser, 51, added: 'People think we got thousands of dollars, we really didn't. 

'Other contestants, I believe, negotiated and got a bit more. Like, they got $300 or $200 a day.

'But I was getting $150 a day. Mate, I have mortgage. We couldn't work for three or four months.'

Nasser said that he accepted the low living expenses, but feels annoyed because he's since been blacklisted by Channel Nine.

'I love the show and chose to be on it. But at least do something, ring up every now and then,' he said.

Nasser has claimed Nine's publicity department dropped him for taking part in unapproved media interviews.

He is also not invited to the upcoming Logie Awards, despite the fact Married At First Sight has been nominated.  

'We made the show, we made the ratings... and we get snubbed,' he said. 'I think it's an outrage.'

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel Nine for comment.
item.dc:abstract: Married At First Sight contestants put their lives on hold for up to four months and risk destroying their reputations for TV ratings gold. But how much are cast members actually paid to take part in the show? There is no salary, per se, however participants do receive daily 'living expenses' that are expected to cover food and bills.

item.title: Patton Oswalt with daughter Alice and wife Meredith Salenger at Incredibles 2 LA premiere
item.description: Oswalt, the narrator on The Goldbergs, had a busy day Tuesday, as he previously took to Twitter to show off an 'I Voted' sticker after casting in ballot in California's primary.
item.content:encoded:
Patton Oswalt was snapped Tuesday evening at the Los Angeles premiere of Incredibles 2 with his daughter Alice Rigney Oswalt and wife Meredith Salenger.

The comic, 49, wore a light blue three-piece suit with a white collared shirt, while Salenger, a 48-year-old actress, wore a black dress with gold jewelry, and her brown locks parted to the side.

Oswalt, the narrator on The Goldbergs, had a busy day Tuesday, as he previously took to Twitter to show off an 'I Voted' sticker after casting a ballot in California's primary.

Scroll below for video 

He had the sticker positioned over one of his eyes, writing, '#LAVotes Go and do likewise, please!'

Later in the show, the Those Who Can't star added his commentary in regards to a story about President Donald Trump flubbing the lyrics to God Bless America at an event earmarked to showcase his patriotism.

'Unbelievable. What a f***ing embarrassment this s***-pie of a human is,' said the entertainer, who is outspoken about politics on the social media site.

The A.P. Bio star chat with The Hollywood Reporter on Tuesday as part of an extensive piece about actors, and what scenes they're most proud of.

Oswalt replied, 'One of my favorite moments was an episode where I’m staying with Jack [Glenn Howerton] and I have this weird sleepwalking thing that I do, where I talk and scream in my sleep.

'We shot a much longer sequence where I had this whole story line going on - the show is so top-heavy with funny characters, it had to be sacrificed - where I imagine I’m an abolitionist helping out the Underground Railroad and I kind of tell this whole, long [story] and it was really, really funny and really, really fun to do.'

Oswalt, who plays Principal Durbin on the NBC series, said the juxtaposition of his character drew him to the role.

'He’s an authority figure with no authority, but unlike me - who’s much more anxious and has a lot more self-doubt and self-loathing about whatever lack of power I may or may not have,' Oswalt said. 'He’s reached this near-Zen level with it, which makes it more fun to play.'

item.title: Sophia Bush and Jaime King rock colorful dresses at Incredibles 2 premiere in Los Angeles
item.description: Sophia Bush and Jaime King showed off their beauty as the walked the red carpet for the premiere of the Incredibles 2. Both appeared donning colorful outfits featuring bold patterns.
item.content:encoded:
They're two of the most stunning women on the planet.

And both Sophia Bush, 35, and Jaime King, 39, showed off their beauty as the walked the red carpet for the premiere of the Incredibles 2 in Los Angeles.

Both appeared donning colorful outfits featuring bold patterns.

Sophia, who voices Voyd in the new Disney Pixar animated feature, wore a sparkling turquoise number featuring lines of black stars.

The shining garment stopped at the One Tree Hill star's knees, showcasing her enviable calves.

Open-toed black heels added a few more inches, and she carried a small black clutch.

Her long brown locks went from dark to light as the fell in loose waves over her shoulders.

Jaime opted opted for a pretty orange, foral-print number with billowy sleeves that reached down to her ankles.

White stilettos added a touch of elegance to the fun, summery ensemble.

Her long blonde tresses cascaded to her shoulders in broad curls, and she wore striking red lipstick, giving the outfit another classic touch. 

Samuel L. Jackson, 69, who plays Frozone in the flick, donned a deep blue ensemble featured a suit with red stripes and a- newsboy cap.

He was joined by his wife of 38 years LaTanya Richardson, who stars as the voice of Honey Best.

Patton Oswalt was also in attendance with his wife Meredith Salenger as well as his daughter Alice.

He looked snazzy in a steel blue suit with a white shirt and grey pocket square. 

Craig T. Nelson, the voice of Mr. Incredible, looked casual as he attended the premiere in an all lack ensemble that included a comfortable-looking zippered jacket.

Huck Milner, who stars as the voice of Dash, look sharped in a summer-y blue suit.

Holly Hunter, who stars as the voice of Elastigirl, donned a pretty pink, white, and red floral dress as she smiled for the cameras on the carpet. 

Jenna Ortega, 15, went with a racing-inspired look as she wore a matching skirt and top with retro white sunglasses on top of her head. 

Stephen Boss and his adorable family of Allison Holker, Maddox Laurel Boss, and Weslie Fowler were also in attendance. 

The carpet was certainly a family affair as Tiffani Thiessen appeared with her daughter.

Mario Lopez dressed in jeans and a button down shirt as he opted for a casual look while appearing with his wife, Courtney Mazza, and their two kids.

Jana Kramer was seen smiling from ear to ear as she arrived with her husband, Mike Caussin, and their child Jolie.

The 34-year-old country crooner donned a one piece army green ensemble that showed off her lithe legs. 

John Ratzenberger, who voices The Underminer in the movie, wore a black pinstripe suit along with a lavender suit, bring some old school flair to the affair.

Catherine Keener, who stars as the voice of Evelyn Deavor in the flick, arrived wearing a green and black dress with a black coat on top.

Bob Odenkirk, who plays the voice of Winston Deavor, arrived donning a sweater on top of grey jeans.
item.dc:abstract: They're two of the most stunning women on the planet. And both Sophia Bush, 35, and Jaime King, 39, showed off their beauty as the walked the red carpet for the premiere of the Incredibles 2 in Los Angeles. Both appeared donning colorful outfits featuring bold patterns.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Sotoodeh

item.title: John Travolta snaps a picture of his daughter Ella Bleu on the set of the upcoming movie Poison Rose
item.description: The Gotti star showed a camera view of his 18-year-old daughter with wife Kelly Preston as she appeared a scene in the forthcoming Noir thriller.
item.content:encoded:
A proud John Travolta took to Instagram on Wednesday to show his daughter Ella Bleu Travolta as she performed before the camera on the set of his upcoming movie, Poison Rose.

'First day of shooting with my daughter Ella Bleu for the film Poison Rose,' the A-list actor, 64, wrote, adding the hashtag, '#EllaTravolta.'

The Gotti star showed a camera view of his 18-year-old daughter with wife Kelly Preston as she appeared in a scene in the forthcoming Noir thriller.

Scroll below for video 

Production on the George Gallo-directed movie, which features a cast including Morgan Freeman, Brendan Fraser, Famke Janssen and Robert Patrick, has been ongoing in Savannah, Georgia amid the controversy surrounding Freeman, 81, stemming from a CNN report he sexually harassed or was inappropriate towards women.

In February, Travolta took spoke to Extra about Ella's role in the movie, coming on the heels of her performance in his latest release, Gotti.

'My daughter is stunning and we're planning to do a movie together,' the veteran actor told the program. 'Yes, called Poison Rose, and she plays my daughter, but I don't know she's my daughter.

'Although I look at her and she looks just like me, so it's going to be hard to play that, but that's next.'

Ella was at the side of her father and mother Kelly Preston, as well as her younger brother Ben, seven, at the Cannes Film Festival last month for the Gotti premiere. 

It was a sentimental occasion, marking the family's first red carpet walk in the nine years since the tragic death of Jett Travolta at 16 at the family's Bahamas vacation home in January of 2009.

The actor, in a 2014 interview in London, called Jett's death 'the worst thing that's ever happened in [his] life,' adding that he 'didn't know if [he] was going to make it' through the traumatic aftermath.

'Life was no longer interesting to me, so it took a lot to get me better,' said the family man, who credited the Church of Scientology for helping pave the road back.

'I will forever be grateful to Scientology for supporting me for two years solid, I mean Monday through Sunday,' Travolta said. 'They didn't take a day off, working through different angles of the techniques to get through grief and loss, and to make me feel that finally I could get through a day.'
item.dc:abstract: A proud John Travolta took to Instagram on Wednesday to show his daughter Ella Bleu Travolta as she performed before the camera on the set of his upcoming movie, Poison Rose. 'First day of shooting with my daughter Ella Bleu for the film Poison Rose,' the A-list actor, 64, wrote, adding the hashtag, '#EllaTravolta.' The Gotti star showed a camera view of his 18-year-old daughter with wife Kelly Preston as she appeared a scene in the forthcoming Noir thriller.

item.title: Claire Danes reveals growing baby bump in sleeveless gown as she arrives in style to Homeland event
item.description: She's expecting her second child with Hugh Dancy. And Claire Danes covered her growing baby bump as she was spotted at the Homeland FYC event in Los Angeles on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
She recently confirmed she was expecting her second child with Hugh Dancy.

And Claire Danes covered her growing baby bump as she was spotted at the Homeland FYC event in Los Angeles on Tuesday.

The gorgeous star, 39, swathed her figure in a sleeveless black and grey dress as she commanded attention for the red carpet event.

Daring to impress, the natural stunner looked healthy and happy as she rocked the fashion forward gown.

Her trademark strawberry blonde tresses were left long and loose allowing her youthful face to shine.

Throwing caution to the wind, the Brokedown Palace thespian went virtually makeup free with just a touch of berry lip.

She paused to pose with co star Mandy Patinkin. 

Claire has previously admitted she would be a 'lousy stay at home mom', and is glad she waited until later in life to have her children. 

'I’ve always wanted to have kids, but I’m glad I didn’t until now,' she told ELLE magazine in 2013.

'When I was thinking about [working and being a mother] originally, I was really nervous about it. 

'I think I would make a lousy stay-at-home mom. It just wouldn’t suit me. I feel so fortunate, in that I’ve had this arrow-straight focus that I wanted to act.' 

The New York native stopped by Howard Stern's morning program late last month to promote the seventh season of her hit show before a surprise announcement to reveal she was 'deep' in the second trimester of pregnancy.

She went on to tell Stern that she's keeping the baby's gender a secret until she gives birth later this year.

Claire has a five-year-old son, Cyrus, with her husband of nearly one decade, actor Hugh Dancy, 42.

After meeting Hugh on the set of Evening in 2006, the pair announced their engagement in February 2009.

They tied-the-knot in the same year in a secret ceremony in France.
item.dc:abstract: She recently confirmed she was expecting her second child with Hugh Dancy. And Claire Danes covered her growing baby bump as she was spotted at the Homeland FYC event in Los Angeles on Tuesday. The gorgeous star, 39, swathed her figure in a sleeveless black and grey dress as she commanded attention for the red carpet event.

item.title: Couples who dress together! Makeup free Solange Knowles and her husband Alan Ferguson wear matching casual tracksuits as they leave Sydney
item.description: The singer rocked a simple outfit comprising of a jumper and comfortable trousers as she headed to the airport for her departing flight on Wednesday.
item.content:encoded:
She's known for her eye-catching fashion choices whenever she's out and about.

But Solange Knowles swapped out her usual glitz for a low-key tracksuit as she bid Sydney farewell on Wednesday.

The singer rocked a simple outfit comprising of a jumper and comfortable trousers as she headed to the airport for her departing flight.

The songstress contrasted her ensemble with some chic white sunglasses and a pair of white sneakers.

Keeping with her low-key look, Solange appeared to be wearing no makeup and kept her long hair untied.

It wasn't just the talented singer who donned a tracksuit, as her husband Alan Ferguson also joined in on the look.

Matching his pop star wife, Alan donned track pants and a hooded jumper.

Walking hand in hand through Sydney airport, Solange and Alan looked like the definition of a matching couple in their near-identical outfits. 

Beyond her airport fashion choices, the singer's trip Down Under has been something to remember.

Solange performed at the Sydney Opera House last Friday for Vivid Live, where she wowed fans and critics. 

Having battled an autonomic disorder since October, the singer's performance was seen as a triumphant return to the stage. 

Despite some understandable nerves, the songstress quickly hit top form with a highly-produced showcase.

Partway through her performance, Solange notably praised her cousin and former Destiny's Child star Kelly Rowland, who was in the crowd supporting the singer's return.

item.title: From drab to fab! Take a look inside the INCREDIBLE home renovation on Channel Nine's Buying Blind that left the show's stars crying tears of joy
item.description: Channel Nine's Buying Blind tracks prospective homeowners as they hand over their own money to have three experts buy and renovate a property on their behalf.
item.content:encoded:
Channel Nine's Buying Blind tracks prospective homeowners as they hand over their own money and let three experts buy and renovate a property on their behalf.

And the first couple to partake in the radical real estate experiment are certainly thrilled with the result.

On Tuesday night's premiere episode of the program, Wollongong newlyweds Jess and Fotis Lambis shed tears of joy when designer Shayna Blaze, builder Marshall Keen and property buyer Rich Harvey showed them through their new home.

The trio of experts came in $130,000 under budget, purchasing a two-storey house in the Illawarra suburb of Kanahooka.

Marshall and Shayna then made structural and aesthetic changes to both the interior and exterior of the property. 

Prior to the makeover, the kitchen of the home featured a wooden bench top and a dated range hood set above the stove.

With Shayna and Marshall at the helm, the eating area was given a very modern update, with a white stone bench, a new range hood and trendy lighting all installed.

Chic black cupboards were also added for extra storage space, extending the kitchen and dining area outwards.   

Upstairs, the bedrooms of the home were also overhauled. 

At the time of purchase, one room was painted in a grey-blue colour, making it feel small and dark.

Shayna and Marshall decided to brighten up the sleeping space with coat of fresh white paint, also painting the windowsills and adding in new blinds.

A second bedroom also got a fresh new look, similarly going from drab to fab. 

Dated blue walls were coated over with a soothing dark green colour, with lavish furnishings - including a silk headboard - giving the room a tranquil feel.

Outside, the pool area was also given a sprucing up, and the exterior of the home was overhauled. 

The front of the home was bagged, with coastal white replacing the 1980s brickwork and daggby brown garage door.

item.title: Adriana Lima displays endless legs in beaded bodysuit dress at the Ocean's 8 premiere in New York
item.description: She is the epitome of the word, 'supermodel.' And on Tuesday, the ever-flawless, blue-eyed beauty stepped out for the film's premiere in New York.
item.content:encoded:
She is the epitome of the word supermodel.

And on Tuesday, the ever-flawless Adriana Lima stepped out for the premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York.

The stunner, 36, let her fit and toned legs take center stage with her evening attire. 

Scroll down for video 

The Victoria's Secret vet chose an interesting dress for the event.

Adriana wore a V-neck, black bodysuit dress decorated with beaded detailing. 

The stunner accessorized with dangle earrings, studs, rings and a dark clutch.  

For make-up, the Maybelline spokesmodel was the perfect brand ambassador. 

The blue-eyed stunner's face was done with the affordable brand's products.

For lips, make-up artist Grace Lee applied Super Stay Matte Ink in Poet. For eyes, Grace applied the brand's lip product, Python Lip Kit, in Venomous. 

Her look was complete with Total Temptation mascara.  

The evening was a mom's night out. 

From 2009 until 2016, Adriana was married to former pro basketball player, Marko Jarić.

The duo share two daughters; Valentina, eight, and Sienna, five.

item.title: Jennifer Lopez flashes her cleavage in clingy plaid dress as she heads to Jimmy Kimmel Live
item.description: She boasts a superbly taut dancer's body. And Jennifer Lopez played up her hourglass frame in a skintight tartan cocktail dress when she was glimpsed in Los Angeles.
item.content:encoded:
She boasts a superbly taut dancer's body.

And Jennifer Lopez played up her hourglass frame in a skintight plaid cocktail dress when she was glimpsed in Los Angeles as she headed toJimmy Kimmel Live for an appearance.

Cardboard coffee cup in hand, the 48-year-old pop diva beamed and waved, letting her hair tumble free over her shoulders.

Her sleeveless dress featured a sloping neckline that flashed a bit of her cleavage, and its hem was cleft with a thigh-slit.

J-Lo shielded her face from the California rays with a massive pair of pink-tinted sunglasses by Privé Revaux, adding a splash of glitz with hoop earrings.

The Las Vegas residency act balanced on a pair of elegantly simple stilettos and swung along a sleek black leather purse as she went on her way.

Jennifer documented the outfit on social media that day, pouting and flinging her hair behind her right shoulder for a mirror selfie.

A couple of nights previously, she was in the stands at Houston's Minute Maid park to watch that town's baseball team, the Astros, play the Boston Red Sox.

Her boyfriend Alex Rodriguez, who used to be a New York Yankee, was covering the game for ESPN, at at one point Jennifer popped up to the broadcast box to see him.

As seen in a tweet by the MLB, the 42-year-old ex-pro baseball player sauntered out of the broadcast box and played a bit of catch with Houston Astro J.D. Davis.

A-Rod and J-Lo - who are both from New York City and whose relationship has earned the nickname J-Rod - have been dating since at least last March.

Jennifer shares nine-year-old twins Max and Emme with her third ex-husband Marc Anthony, who since splitting from J-Lo has married and divorced again.

J-Lo has previously been married to actor Ojani Noa and backing dancer Cris Judd - with neither relationship producing any children.

Alex himself has two children - Natasha, 13, and Ella, nine - by his ex-wife Cynthia Scurtis, whom he was married to from 2002 to 2008. 

Jennifer has lately been releasing singles from her upcoming album Por Primera Vez - including El Anillo, which exhorts a man to pop the question.

item.title: Sarah Paulson stands out in neon yellow dress as she attends premiere of Ocean's 8 in NYC
item.description: On Tuesday, Sarah Paulson stunned as she headed into the premiere of her new film, Ocean's 8. Dressed in an electric chartreuse dress, she was a carpet standout as she joined the rest of the cast.
item.content:encoded:
She is an astonishing actress known for her versatility.

And on Tuesday, Sarah Paulson stunned as she headed into the premiere of her new film, Ocean's 8.

Dressed in an electric chartreuse dress, the 43-year-old Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip alum was a carpet standout as she joined the rest of the cast.

Scroll down for video 

The floor-length garment burst with energy, as thousands of confetti like frills reflected in the late afternoon sun.

A pastel green belt wrapped around the actress' waist, highlighting her slender figure.

Bright fuchsia lipstick added even more vibrancy to the attention-grabbing ensemble.

She carried a matching drawstring bag with her down the carpet, and her blonde locks were brushed back and to the side, eventually making their way into a bun. 

Ocean's 8 all-star female line-up sees Debbie Ocean (Bullock) - the estranged sister of Danny Ocean - attempt to pull of a $150 million heist at the Met Gala.

Cate Blanchett stars as Lou, Debbie's partner-in-crime, while Sarah Paulson plays Tammy, a suburban mom and Debbie's former partner-in-crime.

Mindy Kaling is along for the ride as Amita, a jewelry maker, while Awkwafina plays Constance, a thief, and Rihanna is Nine Ball, a tech genius. 

Helena Bonham Carter also appears in the summer female blockbuster as Rose Weil, a fashion designer.

On the otherside is Anne Hathaway playing Daphne Kluger, a celebrity and the target of the heist, whose assistant is James Corden (John Frazier).

It will also see cameos from Anna Wintour, Zayn Malik, Katie Homes, Serena Williams, Kim Kardashian, Kendall Jenner and Kylie Jenner.

The movie hits theaters June 8.

item.title: Charlize Theron and Oscar Isaac to voice Morticia and Gomez in new The Addams Family animated movie
item.description: The 42-year-old actress and Oscar Isaac, 39 will share their creepy and kooky sides in an upcoming The Addams Family animated movie.
item.content:encoded:
Charlize Theron and Oscar Isaac will share their creepy and kooky sides in an upcoming The Addams Family animated movie.

The 42-year-old Oscar-winning actress will voice Morticia Addams, while Oscar, 39, will provide the voice of her husband Gomez, according to an article on Tuesday by Variety.

Chloe Grace Moretz, 21, has been cast to voice their daughter Wednesday and Finn Wolfhard, 15, has joined the cast as brother Pugsley. 

Bette Midler will voice Grandmama, while Nick Kroll will voice Uncle Fester.

Allison Janney will provide the voice of the family's nemesis Margaux Needler. 

The MGM animated comedy will follow the Addams as their lives begin to unravel as they prepare for extended family to arrive for a huge celebration while also facing off against a reality TV host.

The Addams started as single-panel gag illustrations by Charles Addams that first appeared in 1938 in The New Yorker magazine.

The macabre, aristocratic clan has made a profound impact on American comics, movies and TV and has been credited as the inspiration for the goth subculture.

The cartoon was adapted to the popular 1960s television show The Addams Family starring John Astin, 88, as Gomez and the late Carolyn Jones as Morticia.

The family's popularity also spawned an animated series in the 1970s and two films in the 1990s starring the late Raul Julia as Gomez, Anjelica Huston as Morticia and Christina Ricci as Wednesday. 

The animated comedy The Addams Family is scheduled to open on October 11, 2019.

The film is being co-directed by Conrad Vernon and Greg Tiernan from a screenplay by Matt Lieberman based on the cartoon series by Charles Addams.  

Charlize can next be seen on the big screen in the comedy Flarsky also starring Seth Rogen in the title role.

The film due out in February 2019  follows unemployed journalist Fred Flarsky who pursues his childhood crush and babysitter who has since become one of the most powerful and unattainable women on the planet.

item.title: Gigi Hadid flaunts her stunning figure in chic corseted gown at Ocean's 8 premiere... after confirming reunion with ex Zayn Malik
item.description: They are both internationally renowned supermodels. And at the Tuesday premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City, Gigi Hadid and Lily Aldrige posed up a storm side by side.
item.content:encoded:
She is seldom seen looking anything less than perfect.

And at the Tuesday premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City, Gigi Hadid posed up a storm while smouldering in a chic black ensemble while preparing for the launch of the long-awaited movie.

Trooping across the black carpet in a split black gown, 23-year-old Gigi flashed her sculpted legs through the outfit's dangerously high thigh-slit as she attended the premiere shortly after confirming her reunion with ex Zayn Malik.

Hours before the premiere, Gigi shot an enigmatic stare at her phone camera as the Zayn leaned over and appeared to plant a kiss on her cheek. 

Though Zayn's face was not visible to the camera, the 25-year-old could be identified by a chessboard tattoo on his left forearm.

Later at the premiere, stunning Gigi showed just what her Bradford-born beau sees in her as she wowed in the all black ensemble with the sexy slashed leg.

Her dirty blonde hair had been teased into fine waves, and she let it tumble down over her shoulders, framing her elegantly made-up face. 

The sister of Bella Hadid and daughter of ex-Real Housewife Yolanda Hadid balanced on a pair of black ankle-strap stilettos while on the carpet.

This getup of hers was generally flowing and loose-fitted, but tightened into cinched-in corsetry around her midriff, playing up her svelte frame.

Her neckline fell far enough to offer a glimpse of cleavage, and the dress fell tantalizingly off the shoulder at the left side.

Gigi's sleeves were massively wide-set and featured oversize cuffs that looked fit for a dress shirt but spilled past her wrists to obscure her hands.

To ensure the breathtaking ensemble stole the show, Gigi shunned any accessories, instead opting for a totally minimalistic look.  

Before she popped by the premiere, Gigi had been pap-snapped grinning out and about in New York City, already dressed in her event attire.

Her dress fluttered back as she crossed the sidewalk, causing her thigh-slit to splay wide enough that both of her enviably taut gams were on display.

Gigi swung along a tiny sparkling black purse as she headed along on her way. 

Meanwhile, Victoria's Secret Angel Lily was in an elaborate and largely sheer dress that was accented by splashes of intricate lace-work.

The ensemble was a glittering silver and bronze over her bust, and a large black sequin flower sat right in her cleavage, complete with green cloth leaves.

For one snapshot, Lily and Gigi stood by a large lineup of letters spelling out the title of the movie and rested their arms on them.

The pair shot their best supermodel smoldering stares as they got themselves photographed to the hilt on the black carpet.

Ocean's 8, spun off from the Ocean's Trilogy starring George Clooney, is directed by The Hunger Games vet Gary Ross and stars Sandra Bullock in the title role.

Sandra assembles a group of fellow criminals - played by such names as Rihanna, Cate Blanchett and Mindy Kaling - for a jewel heist at the Met Gala.

Both Gigi and Lily have been attendees of the annual bash, including on the first Monday of this May, when the fête had a Catholic theme.

Gigi was clothed in Versace - a high honor considering Dontella Versace was co-chairing the Gala this year with Anna Wintour, who heads it ever year.

Meanwhile, Lily had slung her décolletage on display in a plunging canary yellow collared Ralph Lauren dress that featured an extravagant train.

Both their looks were fairly sedate in the general context of the Gala, where curios included Sarah Jessica Parker with a Nativity scene on her head and Ariana Grande with a print of Michelangelo's Last Judgment on her Vera Wang gown.
item.dc:abstract: They are both internationally renowned supermodels. And at the Tuesday premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City, Gigi Hadid and Lily Aldrige posed up a storm side by side, making kissy-faces. Trooping across the black carpet in a split black gown, 23-year-old Gigi flashed her sculpted legs through the outfit's dangerously high thigh-slit.

item.title: Kristen Stewart flashes tummy as she keeps it casual in cropped t-shirt and baggy sweats in LA
item.description: The actress, 27, wore her athletic pants rolled up at the bottoms and wore a gray baseball cap backwards over her hair.
item.content:encoded:
Kristen Stewart kept it casual as she stepped out in LA on Tuesday morning.

The actress, 27,  flashed her tummy in a cropped white top and gray sweats.

She wore her athletic pants rolled up at the bottoms and wore a gray baseball cap backwards over her hair. 

Kristen added black socks and white sneakers.

She accessorized with a chunky gold pendant chain and gold-framed sunglasses.

She was joined on the outing in the Loz Feliz neighborhood by a couple of female pals. 

She was seen carrying a green blended beverage as she strolled along and checking her smart phone. 

Just a few days ago, Kristen reunited with her former Twilight co-star Robert Pattinson at a party for Lily-Rose Depp.

She and the 32-year-old actor were seen keeping a low profile as they took a breather outside the Chateau Marmont on Hollywood's Sunset Strip.  

The sighting reunion comes after rumors in April that the pair had 'gotten together a few times over the past several weeks'.

'They're trying to keep it low-key, but there's still chemistry there,' revealed a source to OK! magazine. 'People in their circles are starting to wonder if they're considering a reconciliation.'  

The publication also reported that Kristen and her Victoria's Secret Angel girlfriend Stella Maxwell were having relationship troubles. 

Kristen's friendship with Robert had fallen apart after she was caught in 2012 having an affair with her Snow White and the Huntsman director Rupert Sanders. 

Until late last year, Robert was engaged to UK songstress FKA Twigs. It is unsure why the pair called it quits.
item.dc:abstract: Kristen Stewart kept it casual as she stepped out in LA on Tuesday morning. The actress, 27, flashed her tummy in a cropped white top and gray sweats. She wore her athletic pants rolled up at the bottoms and wore a gray baseball cap backwards over her hair.

item.title: Listen up! Former One Direction star Niall Horan reveals his winning advice for every budding singer hoping for their big break
item.description: He's emerged as one of the world's most popular singers after earning his big break on The X Factor UK.
item.content:encoded:
He's emerged as one of the world's most popular singers after earning his big break on The X Factor UK. 

And now former One Direction singer Niall Horan has some words of advice to all those budding singers also hoping to break out.

Speaking to The Daily Telegraph, the 24-year-old said his guest appearance alongside Delta Goodrem on The Voice Australia brought back memories of his tenure on The X Factor UK. 

When asked what advice he would give to all the budding singers hoping to earn their big break, Niall said every hopeful on The Voice Australia should give it 110% and not shy from the occasion.

'Just go out there and smash it, grab it by the scruff of the neck and take the opportunity for what it is,' he said. 

'If you hide, they will see it all over your face and hear it in your voice.' 

Having been in a 'similar position' to all the contestants on The Voice Australia, Niall said he is all too aware of the scrutiny.

He commented that feeling like being 'booted' from the show at any moment is stressful, even during times when audience support is high.

'To feel like you are going to be booted out at any second is not a great feeling, even though the whole public is behind you,' he explained.

Giving advice to The Voice Australia contestants is just one of many things Niall got up to during his trip Down Under for his latest solo tour. 

The former One Direction star has so far wowed crowds in Sydney, Brisbane, and Auckland.

There's still more to come as Niall is penciled in for a concert in Melbourne on Thursday.

In between concerts, the singer also managed to squeeze in an appearance on The Project where he attempted to imitate an Australian accent.
item.dc:abstract: He's emerged as one of the world's most popular singers after earning his big break on The X Factor UK. And now former One Direction singer Niall Horan has some words of advice to all those budding singers also hoping to break out. Speaking to The Daily Telegraph, the 24-year-old said his guest appearance alongside Delta Goodrem on The Voice Australia brought back memories of his tenure on The X Factor UK.

item.title: Mindy Kaling shimmers in black gown as she arrives for the Ocean's 8 world premiere in NYC
item.description: Mindy Kaling looked fabulous as she hit the red carpet at the Ocean's 8 world premiere on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
Mindy Kaling looked fabulous as she hit the red carpet at the Ocean's 8 world premiere on Tuesday.

The 38-year-old actress, who welcomed daughter Katherine five months ago, donned a shimmering black Prabal Gurung dress as she joined her castmates at Alice Tully Hall in New York.

Mindy's frock featured ruching on the bodice and cross-over straps flowing down her back into a long train. 

Scroll down for video 

Her brunette tresses fell glossy in a center parting and she accessorized with Cartier jewels. 

Joining her on the red carpet were co-stars Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway, Sandra Bullock, Sarah Paulson, Rihanna, Helena Bonham Carter and Akwafina.

Ocean's 8 all-star female line-up sees Debbie Ocean (Bullock) - the estranged sister of Danny Ocean - attempt to pull of a $150 million heist at the Met Gala.

Cate stars as Lou, Debbie's partner-in-crime, while Paulson plays Tammy, a suburban mom and Debbie's former partner-in-crime.

Mindy is along for the ride as Amita, a jewelry maker, while Awkwafina plays Constance, a thief, and Rihanna is Nine Ball, a tech genius.

Bonham Carter appears as Rose Weil, a fashion designer, in the summer female-driven blockbuster.

On the other side is Hathaway playing Daphne Kluger, a celebrity and the target of the heist, whose assistant is James Corden (John Frazier).

It will also see cameos from Anna Wintour, Zayn Malik, Katie Homes, Serena Williams, Kim Kardashian, Kendall Jenner, and Kylie Jenner.

Meanwhile, during an appearance on Ellen DeGeneres on Monday Mindy admitted she's struggled to shed her pregnant eating habits after giving birth to her daughter.

'Yea so it's not normal to NOT be pregnant and have a birthday cake on a Tuesday afternoon when its not your birthday,' she quipped.

Mindy also chatted about her A Wrinkle in Time co-star Oprah Winfrey inviting the cast of the film to her house for a screening and how she was nervous bringing her newborn to the fete.

'I was scared because I had to bring my baby with me and she was really fussy on the way there and I was like "OMG am I gonna be the one that brings the screaming baby to Oprah's cathedral of beauty and art,' she joked.

But Katherine surprised her mother and behaved like an angel.

'As soon as we walked in the door, her eyes got wide and she got really quiet like she knew she was in Oprah's house.... and she was like coyly smiling for the rest of the four hours,' she explained.
item.dc:abstract: Mindy Kaling looked fabulous as she hit the red carpet at the Ocean's 8 world premiere on Tuesday. The 38-year-old actress, who welcomed daughter Katherine five months ago, donned a shimmering black Prabal Gurung dress as she joined her castmates at Alice Tully Hall in New York. Mindy's frock featured ruching on the bodice and cross-over straps flowing down her back into a long train.

item.title: Chloe Lewis looks fabulous in floral two-piece... while Courtney Green shows off her assets in striped trouser suit as they attend TOWIE girls' night
item.description: Chloe Lewis and Courtney Green looked stunning as they arrived at the QUIZxTOWIE Girls Night Out at Sheesh Restaurant in Essex on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
They're known for making fashion statements.

And Chloe Lewis, 27, and Courtney Green, 22, didn't disappoint as they arrived at the QUIZxTOWIE Girls Night Out at Sheesh Restaurant in Essex on Tuesday.

Chloe, who hosted the event in celebration of her collaboration with Quiz, looked stunning in pink and red floral two piece, showing off her slender figure and flat tum.

The reality star accessorised with simple necklaces and an over the shoulder bag, letting her bright ensemble steal the show.

Going for a more relaxed vibe, she kept her makeup more simple with a smokey eye and nude lip, and wore her golden tresses in loose waves around her shoulders.

Courtney also opted for a matching two piece, donning a white striped number that showed off her ample assets with its more daring neckline.

The TOWIE castmate showed off her pearly naval ring with the cropped design of her top, showing off her tiny waist.

She also kept accessories to a minimum, draping a matching jacket around her shoulders and slipping on a pair of nude heeled sandals.

Courtney's long chocolate locks were worn in cascading curls past her shoulders as she posed for photographs.

Chloe went public with boyfriend Danny Flasher last February, and has hinted that things are moving quickly between them after revealing that she had moved in with him. 

Though the brunette has refused to let her man join TOWIE, following the demise of her relationship with former fellow co-star Jake Hall, who is now engaged with a newborn daughter.

She told The Sun on Sunday's Fabulous magazine in April: 'I'm gonna keep him separate! I'm going to keep him all to myself! I couldn't do a relationship on the show again.

'I would never say never, because I don't know what the future holds - but no, for now, definitely not.

'But, Danny is all for [Towie] for me, he's like 'I want you to do well, I want you to stay on it', he loves all the goss and everything, but for him he's got a good job up the city and he does really well so it's not something I think is for him!'
item.dc:abstract: They're known for making fashion statements. And Chloe Lewis and Courtney Green didn't disappoint as they arrived at the QUIZxTOWIE Girls Night Out at Sheesh Restaurant in Essex on Tuesday. Chloe, who hosted the event in celebration of her collaboration with Quiz, looked stunning in pink and red floral two piece, showing off her slender figure and flat tum.
item.dc:creator: Jason Chester

item.title: Jessica Alba suits up in classic look for guest panelist duties at women's summit
item.description: She is an A-list actress who has also found success in the corporate world. And on Tuesday, the 37-year-old stopped by, Women Rule: The L.A. Summit, held at NeueHouse Hollywood.
item.content:encoded:
She is an A-list actress who has also found success in the corporate world.

And on Tuesday, Jessica Alba stopped by, Women Rule: The L.A. Summit, held at NeueHouse Hollywood.

The mother-of-three was there on behalf of billion dollar company, The Honest Company.

Jessica looked sharp in a black suit, complete with a yellow-and-white striped pant. 

The actress layered a simple white T-shirt underneath her blazer, and matched her shoes to her top.

The Pomona, California native accessorized with large silver hoops and her wedding ring.  

Jessica took to Instagram to share a group shot of the women speaking at the event. 

'We had a great chat #womenrulesummit @politico talking all the @honest @baby2baby #entrepreneurlife #thehonestlife #thehonestcompany #baby2baby, she wrote. 

Among the women pictured were Baby2Baby co-founders, Kelly Sawyer Patricof and  Norah Weinstein. The non-profit is one favored among celebrities, including Blake Lively, Kate Hudson, Nicole Richie and Drew Barrymore. 

In addition to her successful acting and entrepreneurial career, the star is also a loving wife and mother. 

Jessica married husband Cash Warren 10 years ago in 2008. 

The duo share three children together; Honor, nine, Haven, six, and Hayes, five months.
item.dc:abstract: She is an A-list actress who has also found success in the corporate world. And on Tuesday, Jessica Alba stopped by, Women Rule: The L.A. Summit, held at NeueHouse Hollywood. The mother-of-two was there on behalf of billion dollar company, The Honest Co.

item.title: Nikki Reed and Ian Somerhalder smooch on the beach as they strike an extravagant yoga pose
item.description: They rang in their third wedding anniversary in April. And Nikki Reed and Ian Somerhalder looked as loved-up as ever when they were glimpsed enjoying a beach day in Mexico over the weekend.
item.content:encoded:
They rang in their third wedding anniversary in April.

And Nikki Reed and Ian Somerhalder looked as loved-up as ever when they were glimpsed enjoying a beach day in Mexico over the weekend. 

Nikki, 30, and Ian, 39, did what looked like a joint yoga pose as they kissed on the sand on the Mexican Island Of Loreto in the Gulf Of California.

This pose entailed Ian lying on his back with his feet planted on the mat beneath him and his legs arced upward.

Nikki was elevated above him, gripping his thighs as he held her shoulders and lifted her up.

The Twilight franchise actress flung her legs up into the air while planting a smooch on her scrumptious second husband.

Even while not doing yoga, the couple sizzled with sex appeal, cuddling up to one another in kissing in front of a dazzling ocean view.

Nikki showed off her taut figure in a barely-there white bikini that offered a generous view of her upper thigh.  

Tucking her luxurious hair back behind her ears, she wore a glimmering pair of earrings and a nose ring and clasped a straw hat with a wide brim and nude ribbon.

Gleaming with happiness as she ambled beside her husband, she pulled a see-through nude asymmetric poncho over the whole look.

Meanwhile, Ian draped his musclebound torso in a skimpy black tank top and clashed it elegantly against fitted denim shorts.

He popped a straw black-ribboned fedora on his head, holding his wife's hand as they walked beside each other on the beach.

The couple, who tied the knot in Malibu in 2015, have an infant daughter called Bodhi who was not seen with them at the seaside when they were spotted there this weekend.

At one point, Ian was seen standing behind Nikki and draping his arms about her as they surveyed the dazzling ocean view stretching out in front of them.

Not content with just looking at the ocean, they hopped onto the sun-dappled waves as well, venturing out on paddle-boards.

Before she took up with Ian, Nikki married singer Paul McDonald in 2011 but filed in 2014 for a divorce that was finalized the following year.

She had begun dating Ian before the legal finish was applied to her divorce.

On his end, Ian used to be in a relationship with his The Vampire Diaries co-star Nina Dobrev - resulting rumors of a feud between her and Nikki.

Nikki vehemently denied such speculation last year in the caption of an Instagram photo that showed her grinning alongside Nina and Ian.
item.dc:abstract: They rang in their third wedding anniversary in April. And Nikki Reed and Ian Somerhalder looked as loved-up as ever when they were glimpsed enjoying a beach day in Mexico over the weekend. Nikki, 30, and Ian, 39, did what looked like a joint yoga pose as they kissed on the sand on the Mexican Island Of Loreto in the Gulf Of California.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Sotoodeh

item.title: Tyrese 'sued by American Express for unpaid balance of $61k' amid custody battle over daughter Shayla, 10
item.description: Back in November the 39-year-old Fast And Furious star claimed he was having money problems amid his ongoing feud with his ex-wife, Norma Gibson.
item.content:encoded:
Tyrese Gibson has been hit with a lawsuit from credit card company American Express.

According to a new report by TMZ, the 39-year-old actor has an unpaid balance of $61,071.35.

Back in November the Fast And Furious star claimed he was having money problems amid his ongoing feud with his ex-wife, Norma Gibson.

Tyrese said he earns $105,686 per month but his monthly expenses amount to $107,576.

According to documents he filed at the time, Tyrese said he had nearly $900,000 in cash and had property worth close to $2 million.

Meanwhile, the action star is back in court seeking primary custody of his 10-year-old Shayla.

In November 2017, a judge ruled that Tyrese and ex-wife Norma should share custody of their daughter following an acrimonious legal battle. 

The actor argues in new legal documents, seen by TMZ, that Shayla will have a better life if she moves to live with him in his new Atlanta mansion rather than remaining with her mother in Los Angeles.

The actor accuses his ex of restricting his time with his daughter and argues that he will provide a 'stable and loving' environment for her in his seven-bedroom, nine-and-a-half bath Georgia home.

The Transformers star says he will send her to a top private school and she will be less bothered by paparazzi if she's away from Tinseltown.

Tyrese and Norma were married from 2007 to 2009. 

Last year, the LA native tied the knot with New Jersey-born Samantha and they announced in April that they are expecting a baby together.

The child is due in September.

Speaking to People last year, Tyrese said of his court battle with his ex: 'Unfortunately as entertainers and public figures, you have to go through very private matters publicly sometimes.'

Samantha said earlier this year that she believes her pregnancy has come at the 'right time.'   

'There was a lot that happened last year - everyone is aware of that - and so to have the opportunity to … really start a new chapter in the way that has happened, I just look to God and I'm like, 'Wow, I can't believe that you would plan it this way and you do it so perfectly,' she explained to People.
item.dc:abstract: Tyrese Gibson has been hit with a lawsuit from credit card company American Express. According to a new report by TMZ, the 39-year-old actor has an unpaid balance of $61,071.35. Back in November the Fast And Furious star claimed he was having money problems amid his ongoing feud with his ex-wife, Norma Gibson.
item.dc:creator: Heather Waugh
item.mi:shortTitle: Tyrese sued by American Express for $61k amid custody battle

item.title: Liam Payne faces Cheryl's wrath after calling buxom Latina star Anitta 'hot' and 'sexy' during interview on Mexican TV... days after they met backstage
item.description: Liam, 23, called the Brazilian star, 25, real name Larissa de Macedo Machado, ‘hot’ after recounting a chance meeting with her the MTV MIAW show.
item.content:encoded:
A whirlwind promotional tour took Liam Payne to Brazil on Tuesday afternoon.

But the One Direction star’s appearance in South America comes after he openly praised buxom Latina star Anitta on Mexican TV, potentially facing a tongue-lashing from long-term girlfriend Cheryl in the process.

Liam, 23, called the Brazilian star, 25, real name Larissa de Macedo Machado, ‘hot’ after recounting a chance meeting with her at the Latin American MTV MIAW show. 

'I was hanging out with Anitta, she’s really cool as well,' he recalled. 'She’s amazing. She’s in London at the moment, I think, which is funny because I’m going to Brazil so we’re like swapping.'  

He added: 'We’re going to swap lives but I’m not anywhere near as hot as she is, so...' 

The singer, who is currently promoting new single Familiar in Latin America, also complimented Anitta's voice, describing it as 'sexy.'

Liam had previously raved about the sultry singer in an Instagram post shared with followers on Tuesday. 

Sharing a shot of himself and Anitta backstage, he took the time to promote her forthcoming trip to the UK, where she commands a smaller fanbase.   

'Hey everybody. I am backstage with Anitta and we just wanted to let you know that this young lady is in London on the 28th playing the Royal Albert Hall so make sure you check it out,' he captioned the image. 

Liam's comments may well land him in Cheryl's bad books after previously embarrassed his girlfriend by telling Radio 1 listeners she was on the toilet during a recent interview. 

His new single Familiar focuses on pursuing a potential love interest in a night club, while teaming Latin-inspired sounds with his signature R&B music.

Liam - who is 10 years younger than Cheryl - recently revealed he sat at the kid's table at their son Bear's first birthday party.

The singer dished the details of the celebrations on the Graham Norton Show, which aired on Friday.

During the surprising confession, the Strip That Down hitmaker told the host: 'I sat at the kids' table and had a great time!'

Liam, 23, called the Brazilian star, 25, real name Larissa de Macedo Machado, ‘hot’ aftr recounting a chance meeting with her the MTV MIAW show.

item.title: Rafferty Law looks dashing in denim jacket as he poses with girlfriend Clementine Linieres at tavern launch
item.description: The 21-year-old model showcased his signature style in a nineties-inspired denim jacket, while his other half wrapped her arm around him and posed for photos at the new drinking tavern.
item.content:encoded:
They have been dating for a year and a half and recently revealed they are set to move in together. 

And Rafferty Law and girlfriend Clementine Linieres were a picture of love's young dream as they attended the star-studded JKS Restaurants launch of Brigadiers on Tuesday.   

The 21-year-old model showcased his signature style in a nineties-inspired denim jacket, while his other half wrapped her arm around him at the new drinking tavern. 

The son of Jude Law and Sadie Frost complemented his jean jacket with a pair of plaid suit trousers and Doc Martins as he enjoyed a glamorous date night with his gorgeous squeeze.

He continued his sartorial display with a vivid print tee and also gave his ensemble some added bling with a chunky gold chain and myriad of rings.

Clementine looked equally fashion-forward in an oversized green corduroy bomber jacket which she teamed with a black skinny jean and leather military boot.

Showcasing her natural beauty, she left her glossy brunette locks loose in a tousled style and sported a radiant make-up look.

The couple - who have been dating since the winter of 2016 - looked smitten with one another as they posed for photos together.

Rafferty and Clementine have been dating for more than a year, with Rafferty often sharing cute photos of the pair via his Instagram. 

Meanwhile, Rafferty is the eldest son of socialite Sadie Frost and actor Jude Law who were married between 1997 and 2003.

He has become a regular on the front row during fashion week season and signed to modelling agency Select Model Management back in 2014.

He has modeled for Timberland and Dolce & Gabbana, as well as Dior.  The rising star  - who plays the guitar, piano, bass, drums and keyboard - is a big fan of clubbing and DJs in his spare time.

He was formerly in the band The Dirty Harrys along with his best friend Marley, son of Pulp’s bassist Steve Mackey. 

Other famous faces at the event included Jack Guinness, Sonny Hall and Tigerlily Taylor.
item.dc:abstract: They have been dating for a year and a half and recently revealed they are set to move in together. And Rafferty Law and girlfriend Clementine Linieres were a picture of love's young dream as they attended the star-studded JKS Restaurants launch of Brigadiers on Tuesday.

item.title: Orlando Bloom cuts a casually cool figure in TWO denim jackets and cap as he steps out after performing in his new West End play Killer Joe
item.description: Last month, he caused quite the stir, when he was seen baring all on stage as he made his debut in his new West End play Killer Joe.
item.content:encoded:
Last month, he caused quite the stir, when he was seen baring all on stage as he made his debut in his new West End play Killer Joe.

But Orlando Bloom kept his toned frame covered up as he exited Trafalgar Studios after another show on Tuesday, flashing his sartorial sharpness instead of his flesh.

Tjhe 41-year-old actor cut a casually cool figure in an eye-catching ensemble that includes a dark-rinse denim jacket over a stonewashed denim jacket.

He teamed his double jacket look with a black-and-white chequered top and dark rinse denim jeans, while a red baseball cap rested atop his raven locks.

Teaming his outfit with a pair of red boots, the actor appeared to be in an upbeat mood as he headed home after another performance of his show, making his way to a chauffeur-driven car in which his beloved pet pooch was seen waiting for him. 

In Killer Joe, Orlando, who plays a detective in the show, strips off to reveal his very peachy posterior in amusing scenes.

In the act, the actor takes off his white pyjamas and pink dressing gown to reveal his ripped physique and pert posterior.

When snapshots were recently unveiled of the moment, the Lord Of The Rings star looked remarkably unabashed as he animatedly chatted to the other characters, with his back to the audience - offering theatre-goers a full view of his bare bottom. 

Just a day earlier, Katy Perry, 33, was thought to be in the audience after flying into London to see her beau.

The black comedy follows The Smith family who plot to murder a wealthy matriarch and claim her insurance money. 

They hire Joe Cooper, played by Orlando, who is detective who doubles up as a part-time hitman, to go through with the job, but the plan takes a turn when Killer Joe meets the family’s innocent daughter.  

The Pirates of The Caribbean star seems to be getting into the swing of his role, with him celebrating his theatre success with Katy in the English capital late last month.

They were seen jumping aboard the same motorbike following a romantic dinner date in London's Mayfair.

The couple - who recently rekindled their on-off relationship - were seen exiting the C restaurant in the capital before zooming off into the night, with onlookers saying that the Teenage Dream singer scream with delight as they enjoyed the ride.

Both Orlando and the singer were seen popping on their helmets as members of security made sure they got onto the bike safely, with the American singer still managing to look glamorous in a black suit with green striped finish.
item.dc:abstract: Last month, he caused quite the stir, when he was seen baring all on stage as he made his debut in his new West End play Killer Joe. But Orlando Bloom kept his toned frame covered up as he exited Trafalgar Studios after another show on Tuesday, flashing his sartorial sharpness instead of his flesh. Tjhe 41-year-old actor cut a casually cool figure in an eye-catching ensemble that includes a dark-rinse denim jacket over a stonewashed denim jacket.

item.title: Claire Danes looks weary as she arrives at LAX hiding baby bump under black maxi dress and cardigan
item.description: The actress, 39, who is expecting her second child with actor husband Hugh Dancy, appeared focused on her phone as she exited the airport terminal.
item.content:encoded:
She may be heavily pregnant but it's not slowing her down.

Just hours after she walked the red carpet at the CFDA Fashion Awards in New York, Claire Danes was spotted touching down at LAX airport in Los Angeles. 

The actress, 39, who is expecting her second child with actor husband Hugh Dancy, appeared focused on her phone as she exited the arrivals terminal. 

Danes had dressed for comfort for her flight, wearing a black maxi dress with short slits at the side and a pair of black flat slip-on shoes.

She added a gray woolen cardigan and wore her blonde hair in a top knot.

Danes carried a large tan tote over one shoulder and also had a black shoulder purse slung across her body. 

On Monday night, she was accompanied to the CFDA event at the Brooklyn Museum by her dashing hubby.

She and Dancy, 42, met on the set of Evening in 2006 and announced their engagement in February 2009. They tied-the-knot in the same year in a secret ceremony in France.

In 2012, Danes and Dancy welcomed their son Cyrus.

They announced in April they were expecting a second child. 

The Homeland star recently told ABC late night host Jimmy Kimmel that flying is something she finds difficult during her pregnancy.

'Everything’s just a little more complicated when you’re knocked up,' she said.

She went on to explain that she needs to wear compression stockings on flights to help with blood circulation but it's not a simple feat.   

'Anyway, so I hate these things and so I refuse to wear them until it’s entirely essential. I’m trying to negotiate putting them on in the teeny, tiny bathroom of the plane. It’s the last second until we take off and I’m in there for like 20 freakin’ minutes,' she said during an appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live last week. 

'It turns out compression stockings are rather tight. You’re supposed to put them with... you need talcum powder. I didn’t have any of that stuff, so all the limbs were in every direction. I don’t know what they thought I was doing in there, but it was not erotic,' she said.

item.title: The Walking Dead's Norman Reedus poses with ex Helena Christensen as their son Mingus graduates... amid claims actor's girlfriend Diane Kruger is 'pregnant'
item.description: The 49-year-old actor and motorcycle enthusiast took to Instagram on Tuesday to celebrate the big event, and give credit to the 90s supermodel for her role in raising the young adult.
item.content:encoded:
The Walking Dead's Norman Reedus shared a proud photo on social media on Tuesday as he posed with ex Helena Christensen and their son Mingus.

It was a proud occasion as their 18-year-old son graduated from high school, with Norman, who plays Daryl Dixon on the AMC series, heaping praise on Helena, 49, for raising Mingus so well.  

His current girlfriend, Diane Kruger, 41, who is believed to be pregnant with their first child together, was not present on the day.  

Scroll below for video 

'Props to this lovely lady,' said Reedus as Christensen rested her head on her shoulder in the sepia-toned shot, writing in parenthesis, 'He graduated!!'

On her page, the Copenhagen, Denmark native - who was with Reedus from 1998 until 2003 - shared a shot of herself posed with Reedus and Mingus, writing, 'We’re so proud of you ... LOVE YOU SO MUCH!!,' also writing it in Danish.

Mingus made headlines last fall when he made his debut modeling for Calvin Klein on the runway at New York Fashion Week, where Christensen told Metro UK that her son was 'so not' following in her footsteps down the catwalk on a permanent basis.

'He’s like, "This is definitely not for me, but I love [designer] Raf Simons, so I’m going to do these Calvin Klein shows," and then he realized there are a lot of opportunities in there, that will be very beneficial.'

Christensen said that she was glad Mingus - who has already taken some college courses - was not looking into modeling on a permanent basis, adding, 'I’ve got to say, whatever he does, I’ll support him in it.'

She said that her son's plan was to 'work a little' and 'save up some money' with the intention of pursuing a career in film making. 

She added, 'Whatever comes his way, and he feels like doing it, I’ll be right there behind him and supporting him.' 

Reedus is currently expecting his second child with girlfriend Diane Kruger, People reported last week.

item.title: Chicago's Look Away at the heart of plagiarism suit against songwriter Diane Warren
item.description: In court docs, Greaves claims that he wrote a song titled Look Away in 1987 and subsequently entered it into the National Schools Make Music Competition.
item.content:encoded:
Grammy-winning songwriter Diane Warren is accused of stealing lyrics penned by an England native named Brendan Greaves in a new $20 million-plus lawsuit based on the 1988 Chicago hit Look Away.

In court docs, Greaves claims that he wrote a song titled Look Away in 1987, TMZ reported, and subsequently entered it into the National Schools Make Music Competition, which was indirectly sponsored by EMI Records.

He said that eight months after his submission, Warren, 61, copyrighted her lyrics for the Chicago single, which spent two weeks atop the charts in late 1988.

Scroll below for video 

In legal docs, Greaves accuses the label EMI of giving Warren an advance look at his work. 

He compared lyrics he wrote - 'If you see me walking by with a tear in my eye, look away, baby look away' to lyrics in Warren's song: 'If you see me walking by and the tears are in my eyes, look away, baby, look away.'

Greaves said he was 'blissfully unaware' of the Chicago song and its resultant success as his explanation for why it took more than three decades to file the suit.

Warren's penned dozens of famous songs, including Starship's Nothing's Gonna Stop Us Now, LeAnn Rimes' How Do I Live and Aerosmith's I Don't Want to Miss a Thing.

Other notable tunes she's written include Milli Vanilli's Blame It on the Rain, Cher's If I Could Turn Back Time and the Bad English ballad When I See You Smile. 

She won the Grammy in for Best Song Written for Visual Media in 1997 for Celine Dion's Because You Loved Me. Her more recent collaborations include work with artists such as Lady Gaga, Jennifer Hudson and Ciara. 

She told the outlet Music Week on Friday that she's not one for co-writing songs, saying that doing it by oneself is 'like this weird lost art or something.'
item.dc:abstract: Grammy-winning songwriter Diane Warren is accused of stealing lyrics penned by an England native named Brendan Greaves in a new $20 million-plus lawsuit based on the 1988 Chicago hit Look Away. In court docs, Greaves claims that he wrote a song titled Look Away in 1987, TMZ reported, and subsequently entered it into the National Schools Make Music Competition, which was indirectly sponsored by EMI Records. He said that eight months after his submission, Warren, 61, copyrighted her lyrics for the Chicago single, which spent two weeks atop the charts in late 1988.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Sotoodeh

item.title: Sofia Richie steps out in black cut-off shorts after quashing rumors of split with beau Scott Disick
item.description: The 19-year-old fashionista showed her model looks on Tuesday in black cut-off shorts while heading to a hotel in Beverly Hills, California.
item.content:encoded:
Sofia Richie showed her model looks on Tuesday in black cut-off shorts while heading to a hotel in Beverly Hills, California.

The 19-year-old fashionista stepped out after quashing rumors of a split with boyfriend Scott Disick, 35.

Sofia looked runway ready in tiny black shorts that put her long, lean legs on display. 

The daughter of singing legend Lionel Richie, 68, also donned a white tank-top and clunky black boots.

Sofia accessorized with a large tan beanie, sunglasses, necklace and bracelet. 

She accentuated her natural beauty with pink lipstick.

Sofia shared a candid photo on her Instagram Stories on Tuesday showing her and Scott kissing. 

She captioned the image with a simple: 'Whole [heart emoji].'

Sofia later shared another post captioned with the pointed message: 'never believe the internet'.

Their rumored split came after some revealed that Sofia's father had ''threatened to cut her off and remove her from his will if she continues her relationship with Scott,' according to Us Weekly.

 

Rumors about a breakup between Sofia and Scott began after Disick was seen touching and flirting with a mystery woman during Kanye West's Ye listening party in Wyoming last Thursday.

Scott chimed in on his social media as well, writing a message on top of a TMZ headline about the relationship.

It read: 'We had no idea we even broke up but thanks for thinking of us.'

The couple seemed to confirm any breakup stories were fan fiction after being spotted out around Calabasas together on Monday.

Scott reposted a photo of the pair outside of Nobu in Malibu from that same day on Instagram as further evidence the relationship was still going strong.

The Keeping Up With The Kardashians figure is a father-of-three from his nine-year relationship with ex Kourtney Kardashian. They have children Mason, eight, Penelope, five, and Reign, three, together.

item.title: Love Island 2018: Fans blast 'gold digger' Laura Anderson, 29, for liking Wes Nelson, 20, AFTER learning he splashed out £1,000 on a date
item.description: The air hostess, 29, come under fire once again when fans branded her a 'desperate gold digger' after the fall-out of Tuesday's Love Island.
item.content:encoded:
She is quickly becoming the Love Island villain after fans accused her of lying about her age and Olivia Attwood voiced her concern over her copying her looks.

And Laura Anderson, 29, come under fire once again when fans branded her a 'desperate gold digger' after the fall-out of Tuesday's Love Island.

Fuming fans remarked upon the reality star's change of heart after she found out her summer soulmate Wes Nelson, 20, spent £1,000 on a date.

'Laura liked Adam yesterday and now she hears about Wes has got money she's got fanny flutters the gold digger slosh pot #loveisland,' one fan wrote, leading the troops on social media. 

The air hostess was flighty with her affections on Monday, having stepped forward for smoldering Wes after being paired with unlucky-in-the-villa Dr. Alex George.

In unbelievable scenes, Laura then decided she wasn't all that into her current partner when she fixed her eyes on the muscle-bound Adonis Adam Collard.

Yet on Tuesday, the Olivia lookalike angered fans when she declared her interest in the Electrical and Nuclear Systems Design Engineer after finding out he had money.

Love Island viewers branded the blonde bombshell as 'money grabbing' and 'shallow' in a slew of scathing tweets.

Others remarked: 'Funny how that Laura now suddenly cares about Wes now that she knows he's got money #golddigger #LoveIsland.'

'Laura's only in it for Wes' money,' and 'Absolute shock that Laura is money grabbing.' (sic)

'Laura is such a money grabbing shallow girl isn't loyal to anyone just calling it right now #loveisland.'

'Laura is only interested in West for he money & Alex just got slagged off for having a professional job... oh girls, you're making us look bad #loveisland.'

'Funny how Laura is suddenly 'attached' to Wes now she's found out about his money.' 

'Imagine living in the 21st Century and still having females like Laura who's eyes light up and values a man with a lot of money. How desperate and degrading #LoveIsland.' (sic)

'Lol the way Laura realised she had a connection with Wes when she found out he had money.' (sic)
