item.title: Love Island 2018: Dejected Dr. Alex George declares he's 'had enough' of show just two days in... as ALL girls in the villa shun him like a 'leper'
item.description: He endured something of a bumpy start to his stint on Love Island on Monday night, when the ladies in the villa failed to show him any romantic interest.
item.content:encoded:
He endured something of a bumpy start to his stint on Love Island on Monday night, when the ladies in the villa failed to show him any romantic interest.

And on Tuesday's episode of the hit ITV2 reality show, Dr. Alex George confessed to fellow Islanders Adam Collard and Niall Aslam that he'd 'had enough', after the constant shunning from the girls made him feel like a 'leper'.

Speaking with his fellow contestants in the communal bedroom, Alex — who is currently in a forced pairing with a reluctant Samira Mighty — was visibly downcast as he shared: 'I'm just sick of it all, to be honest. I'm fed up. I've kind of had enough.

Scroll down for video 

'I feel like I'm a leper, or something. That's what I feel like... You just feel like, "What is wrong with me?" Like I've got a black mark on me, or something.'

'Mate, you're a f***ing doctor,' boomed Niall, who earlier in the episode was left single after 'wild card' contestant Adam stole his girl Kendall Rae-Knight.

'Yeah, but it's not all about that,' shot back a visibly exasperated Alex. I don't want to be viewed as [just that].'

'It's not just about the fact that you're a doctor,' Niall countered. 'Obviously, that shows how smart you are, and you're good-looking and you've got a great personality, because you're deep.' 

'I don't know, I hate being like this,' said Alex, his cheeks reddening as he expressed his feelings. 'I've pretty much had enough. I'm at that point now. I've had enough.'

Flying high following his romantic date with Kendall, personal trainer and model Adam suggested: 'You haven't clicked with someone, that's the only thing. It's just someone in here hasn't been right for you right now.'

'Each day I'm like, "Today's going to be a good day," and then something happens,' Alex added, as his eyes darted from his fellow contestants to the ground.

'Mate, you're a f***ing catch,' muscle-bound Adam insisted. 'Confidence, man. Keep it up. Don't worry about that.' 

Earlier in the episode, viewers watched as tension grew between Alex and Samira, who has openly expressed that she's not romantically interested in the A&E doctor.

While the show kicked off with the pairings of Laura Anderson with Wes Nelson, Dani Dyer with Jack Fincham, Kendall Rae-Knight with Niall Aslam and Hayley Hughes with Ayal Booker, Alex and Samira were pushed together after failing to attract anyone.

And while 'wild card' Adam swooped in on Kendall, Alex appeared to be the most upset in the villa, as it became increasingly clear that he wasn't favoured.

Having been pushed together, Samira was quick to tell everyone who would listen that she did not fancy the medical professional — shortly before he insisted she was being cold-hearted towards him ever since they paired-up. 

Speaking to Jack, he said: 'I feel frustrated because I'm making a lot of effort and trying to chat to her and trying to be normal and she is basically quite dismissive...

'Part of it is that we were put together in quite an awkward scenario and because it's awkward, it's difficult but she's not just letting the barriers down and saying 'actually let's get to know each other, maybe he's got something to him that I do connect with.' I haven't been given any chance.'

Jack comforted his pal, saying: 'I agree with you, if she's not going to give you a chance to see if it's something that she likes then it's pointless.'

Alex continued: 'We are different people but different people can be friends and stuff, she doesn't give me the time of day so I think I need to move on now and get to know some of the other girls.'

Taking to the Beach Hut later on, he continued his rant, saying: 'I have made a lot of effort to chat to her and make some civil conversation and I just think she's just not really interested in making any effort. 

'In fact she made that quite clear so I'm just going to move on and stop making any effort in that way. I'll be civil and polite and things but I'm not going to go out of my way.'

Samira turned to Laura for advice, as she said: 'I don't want to flirt with him, it's not like I'm not trying to be his friend, I am trying to avoid the conversations'.

She continued in the Beach Hut: 'With Alex I just feel so awkward. We just don't have a connection, we don't really have much to say and I don't know what Alex is thinking about me, I've not really spoken to him at all today.' 

Things were made all the more awkward for Alex later when, during a challenge which required contestants to kiss the person they believed a true statement pertained to, Hayley initially backed out of locking lips with the doctor.

Love Island airs nightly on ITV2 at 9pm

item.title: Is this her most daring bikini snap yet? Iggy Azalea flaunts her jaw dropping hourglass physique and curvy derrière in an underboob-baring swimsuit
item.description: She may be a chart-topping rapper, but Iggy Azalea could also easily be the hottest woman on Instagram.
item.content:encoded:
She may be a chart-topping rapper, but Iggy Azalea could also easily be the hottest woman on Instagram. 

The 27-year-old took her bikini-clad holiday snaps to a whole new level on Tuesday, posing poolside in a very daring ensemble.

Iggy flaunted her perfectly hourglass figure in a skimpy two-piece while soaking up the sun in a tropical destination.

Scroll down for video 

Flashing plenty of sideboob, the Black Widow star looked sexy and confident against the backdrop of a private beach.

Her impossibly curvy hips and tiny waist stole the spotlight as she raised her arms above her head and stared into the camera.

Posing for another risqué snap, she turned her back to the mystery photographer while casting a sultry gaze over her shoulder.

Iggy made sure her most famous asset, her bootylicious derrière, took centre stage  in the Brazilian-cut bottoms.

Meanwhile, she sizzled in a pair of stylish sunglasses and wore her long, blonde hair in Kim Kardashian-inspired boxer braids.

The third photo of the series was perhaps the most suggestive: a close-up snap of her stomach and underboob taken from a low angle. 

Sporting a glowing, golden tan, the Fancy rapper appeared to be dripping wet following a dip in the ocean.

In an accompanying video posted to her Instagram Story, Iggy offered an up-close-and-personal glimpse of her figure.

Filming herself with a mobile phone, she highlighted her curvy thighs while sitting by the pool in her barely-there bikini.

item.title: Rihanna dazzles in shimmering purple couture as she leads star-studded world premiere of Ocean's 8
item.description: She is considered one of the most beautiful women in the world. And Rihanna proved worthy of the title as she commanded attention at the world premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
She is considered one of the most beautiful women in the world.

And Rihanna proved worthy of the title as she commanded attention at the premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City on Tuesday.

The 30-year-old pop sensation oozed glamour in a dazzling purple couture number as she lead the star-studded red carpet affair. 

Scroll down for video 

Daring to impress, the Umbrella songstress turned all the heads in the glamourous dress that featured bell shaped fringe.

Her gorgeous gams were on full display as the fabulous dress cut just around the knee and draped asymmetrically.  

Allowing the fashion forward sartorial choice to speak for itself, Rihanna opted for minimal accessories with only a set of floral shaped earrings and small clutch.

The sensational deep purple color of the fabric highlighted her perfect skin tone.

Throwing caution to the wind, the darling diva went virtually makeup free with only a slight smokey eye and deep berry lip.  

Her trademark raven tresses were left long and slicked straight as they cascaded over her back.

Meanwhile, the Barbadian beauty has broken up with her billionaire boyfriend, Hassan Jameel.

According to reports the pop star ended her romance with the Saudi businessman, after supposedly 'tiring' of him,

A friend of the musician told MediaTakeOut.com: 'It's over... Rihanna broke his heart. That's what she does, break men's hearts. Rihanna just got tired of him. She gets tired of men sometimes.'

Rihanna had never confirmed the romance, thought to have started last year, but had spoken of being in a serious relationship in interviews.

Indeed in the June edition of Vogue she said her unnamed partner had given her a new outlook on life.

The Stay hitmaker explained: 'I used to feel guilty about taking personal time, but I also think I never met someone who was worth it before.'

Meanwhile, Rihanna led the Ocean's 8 all-star cast that includes the likes of Sandra Bullock, Mindy Kaling, Cate Blanchett, Sarah Paulson and Anne Hathaway.

The movie centers on Bullock as Debbie Ocean - the sister of George Clooney's alter ego Danny Ocean from the previous movies in the franchise - who assembles a team of jewel thieves to pull off a daring heist at the annual star-studded Met Gala in New York City. 

And Rihanna had a role in creating her movie's character Nine Ball - a street-smart hacker with dreadlocks.

In a recent Vogue article, the movie's director Gary Ross remembers brainstorming ideas for her character after one of her concerts in 2016 and coming up with the idea to make Nine Ball a Barbadian native.

'Rihanna is so bravely authentic. She doesn’t care what people think of her; she’s fully invested in being herself,' said Ross. 

'She also has a seriousness of purpose and focus that not a lot of people have. It’s all about the work, and it doesn’t come with any excess personal baggage.'

Ocean's 8 opens nationwide on June 8.

item.title: Mick Jagger, 74, puts on an animated display alongside his Rolling Stones bandmates during Manchester gig
item.description: The Angie hitmaker proved that he wasn't slowing down anytime soon as he was front and centre commanding the crowd.
item.content:encoded:
He is said to cover over 12 miles on stage during a three hour performance.

And Mick Jagger, 74, continued his energetic dance moves as he vigorously performed some of his band's greatest hits on Tuesday night during The Rolling Stones No Filter tour in Old Trafford stadium in Manchester.

The Angie hitmaker proved that he wasn't slowing down anytime soon as he was front and centre commanding the crowd while Keith Richards, 74, Ronnie Wood, 70, and Charlie Watts, 76, worked their musical magic.

Continuing the high-impact show, Mick was loving life as he took to the mic and looked sprightly as he pranced around stage, pulling some of his signature moves.

The Gimme Shelter singer was dressed to impress in a stylish blue printed shirt, tucked into a pair of skinny jeans and secured in place with a matching belt.

Wanting to make an impact on stage, father-of-eight Mick donned a colourful bomber jacket which allowed him to enthusiastically wave his arms in the air and impress the excited audience. 

The rocker's eye-catching appearance was complemented by Ronnie, who donned a velvet red jacket over his aqua-coloured T-shirt. 

While Keith sported a leather jacket and trademark headband alongside drummer Charlie in a red zip top. 

It was previously reported that Mick's works out with Norwegian trainer Torje Eike for around 24 years, five or six times a week.

According to Quora, the rocker specialises in stamina and balance, taking ballet lessons and performing yoga and Pilates.

 In 2016, the 5ft 10in son of a PE teacher, took up antigravity aerial yoga in a bid to maintain his famous 28-inch waist. 

The demanding practice sees devotees strung up in a hammock suspended six feet in the air, using their own bodyweight to perform demanding gymnastic exercises 

Fans claim it increases strength, boosts levels of the feel-good hormones serotonin and dopamine and, incredibly, can even make you taller.

Mick also runs around eight miles a day, he swims, cycles, kick-boxes and does resistance training and has an organic diet. The rocker likes superjuice smoothies — heavy-duty green ones with wheatgrass — for breakfast and takes vitamins daily.

Meals tend to be based around small portions of protein, but when touring he will have a plate of plain pasta to give him energy before a gig.

He regularly undergoes medicals, and has his blood, oxygen and sugar levels measured, to ensure he stays on track and takes a physio and his personal masseuse — Dr Dot — on tour with him. 

But ahead of the show, Mick admitted it isn't 'getting any easier' as they get older.

He told Daily Star: ' I still really enjoy it, you know. As you get older, it doesn’t get any easier playing two hours plus or whatever. 

'But, I don’t think we’d do it if it wasn’t fun... we just keep going doing it. As first-generation rock stars, the band have had to contend with ageism.

'When you’re like 21, you do things much more quickly than when you’re like whatever age I am. But I still do things. I’m doing some writing right now. I still do it the same way as I did before.' 

After Manchester, the group will storm the stage imminently at Murrayfield Stadium in Edinburgh, the Principality Stadium in Cardiff and London's Twickenham Stadium.

They will then fly to Berlin, Marseille, Stuttgart, Prague and Warsaw to finish off their European tour in style.

Ahead of the tour, Mick said: 'This part of the No Filter tour is really special for the Stones. We are looking forward to getting back on stage and playing to fans in the UK and Ireland.

'It's always exhilarating going to cities we haven’t played for quite a while — and also some new venues for us like Old Trafford and The London Stadium.'

Although the band haven't toured in the UK since 2006, they headlined at Glastonbury and the BST Festival five years ago.

There is nothing stopping the four-piece, who have a combined age of 293 and embarked on their first British tour in 1963.

The band's manager Joyce Smyth told Music Week: 'When you want to keep going, you keep going. There is no reverse gear for this band, it’s onwards and upwards and pushing forwards the whole time.'
item.dc:abstract: He is said to cover over 12 miles on stage during a three hour performance. And Mick Jagger, 74, continued his energetic dance moves as he vigorously performed some of his band's greatest hits on Tuesday night during The Rolling Stones No Filter tour in Old Trafford stadium in Manchester.

item.title: Screen queen! Toni Collette looks a dream in a chic cream dress while out and about in New York promoting her new thriller Hereditary
item.description: The last week has seen Toni earn critical acclaim for her performance in the upcoming movie.
item.content:encoded:
She's currently on a busy press tour for her new critically-acclaimed thriller, Hereditary.

But Toni Collette is handling her hectic work schedule with aplomb and looked relaxed as she stepped on in New York on Wednesday.

The Australian actress was effortlessly chic in a cream-coloured dress as she flashed a smile to photographers.

Wearing minimal makeup, the star pulled her hair back in a simple ponytail to reveal her natural beauty. 

The actress complemented her demure dress with a wide selection of jewellery, rocking a pair of gold hoop earrings, a gold necklace, a selection of bangles, and a number of rings. 

Keeping things casual, she paired her look with some comfortable white sneakers.

The last week has seen Toni earn critical acclaim for her performance in the upcoming movie.

Starring alongside Gabriel Byrne and The Handmaid's Tale star Ann Dowd, Toni plays Annie, a celebrated miniaturist who lives with her husband and two children in a rambling pile in Utah.

After the passing of her estranged mother, the family is plagued by creepy occurrences.

As the supernatural menace becomes worse, Annie fears she's losing her mind as she struggles to keep her family together.

The Australian actress' performance is already earning her buzz as an early Oscar front-runner.

item.title: 'The whole tooth went straight through my hand and my arm': Dr Chris Brown reveals he was bitten by a LION in Africa while filming his new TV series Vet Gone Wild
item.description: Australian celebrity vet Dr Chris Brown came close to losing his hand while filming his new television series, Vet Gone Wild.
item.content:encoded:
Australian celebrity vet Dr Chris Brown came close to losing his hand while filming his new television series, Vet Gone Wild.

Speaking on Nova 96.9's Fitzy and Wippa breakfast radio show on Wednesday, Chris revealed he was savagely bitten by a lion in Africa.

After anaesthetising the animal, Dr Chris said he was clearing half-eaten meat from its throat with his fist when the lion 'clenched down and its whole incisor tooth went straight through my hand and my arm', spraying blood everywhere. 

He continued: 'You've got to keep on carrying on - you've only got half an hour with the animal anaesthetic before it starts to wake up.

'You could become the patient if you're not careful!'

Vet Gone Wild is being filmed around the world and will air on US cable and satellite channel Animal Planet in July.

The series may also be shown on Network Ten in Australia. 

Speaking on Fitzy and Wippa, Chris, 39, described the show as as 'extreme house calls where there is no house. A little bit MacGyver, a little bit adventure.' 

Chris recently said that filming for six months in exotic locations, treating everything from rhinos to seals, has been the 'craziest' thing he's done yet.

'They were big, small, ferocious, calm,' he told The Daily Telegraph on Saturday. 'It's the craziest work I've ever done.'

'I've been off all over the world - Namibia, South Africa, Vietnam, Costa Rica, Thailand - with my little vet bag doing my best to help these animals.'

He added: 'The adventure in treating the animal is nothing compared with actually getting there. We took light planes, helicopters, boats, trains, hitched rides, anything to get to these animals. It was a hell of a challenge!'

item.title: Poldark star Eleanor Tomlinson looks astonishing in ivory sheer dress at glitzy event in Cornwall
item.description: The redhead actress, 26, was every inch the leading lady when she led the glamour at the Poldark photocall at Regal Cinema Redruth, in Cape Cornwall on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
She plays the fiery flame-haired beauty Demelza in Poldark.

And Eleanor Tomlinson was every inch the leading lady when she led the glamour at the Poldark photocall at Regal Cinema Redruth, in Cape Cornwall on Tuesday. 

The redhead actress, 26, was a vision in her summery white dress which had a figure-hugging bodice to accentuate her slender waist and a billowing sheer skirt.

Eleanor was the picture of elegance in the demure high-neck number which also had delicate pleats sewn into the skirt of the garment.

The Poldark star added a splash of colour to her ensemble with her olive green clutch bag, which stood out against her all-white ensemble. 

Sweeping her enviable red mane into a ponytail, the starlet displayed her youthful beauty enhanced with soft make-up. 

Eleanor looked well and truly at ease as she returned to Poldark's native Cornwall, where the four series have been filmed. 

Eleanor didn't let her romance woes dampen her spirits following her split from Poldark co-star Harry Richardson, who plays Demelza's brother Drake Carne.

The Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging star mingled with her Poldark co-stars on the red carpet as she twirled around in her sky-scraper high sparkling stilettos.

Although Poldark's heartthrob Aidan Turner was no where to be seen, co-star Christian Brassington was happy to step in and put on a cosy display with Eleanor.

It is no surprise Eleanor was left feeling emotional after watching the first episode of season four following on from both Ross and Demelza betraying each other, leaving their marriage on the rocks.

Heartbroken fans watched as Demelza stole a smooch from Hugh Armitage (Josh Whitehouse) before learning her husband Poldark had kissed his childhood sweetheart Elizabeth (Heida Reed). 

Eleanor told Cornwall Live of season four: 'Probably like myself Demelza is a strong independent woman and obviously periodically if you are going with period correctness, everything belonged to the man so she was also the property of the man.

'I had a few questions for Debbie about that actually while we were filming just because it’s not something I understood but now what is lovely about Demelza is that she’s incredibly modern.

'She does change the way that things happen and the way that she runs her life and the way that people respect and talk to her as much as she can within her time.'

Eleanor's triumph of her 'strong independent' character comes after she confessed she would be 'upset' if Aidan was paid more than her now because they have 'equal leading roles' in the show.

Production firm Mammoth Screen, the team which makes the show, confirmed Aidan is paid more than Eleanor.

A spokesman for Mammoth said in a statement: 'Whilst we can’t and won’t disclose the details, we do pay Aidan Turner more for playing Ross Poldark as throughout all the series Ross has significantly more screen time than any other character.'

Salary disparity has been widely discussed in the industry recently, after Claire Foy publicly addressed her pay difference with co-star Matt Smith for The Crown.

Giving her own view, Eleanor admitted she would be hurt if she found out Aidan was paid more, as she feels they have an equal presence onscreen.

When asked if she and the Irish actor were paid the same, she simply told Red magazine: 'My guess is no. 

'And while at the beginning that might have been OK – he was a bigger star than me – now I don't think so. We're equal leads of the show, so I'd be pretty upset if the gap hadn't closed.'

Despite their potential disagreement on salary, Eleanor added that she and Aidan were really good friends, and often tease each other about their roles.

She went on: 'We're great mates, although we do row. We row about everything - usually our characters. We're both ridiculously protective of them and squabble like an old married couple.'

item.title: 'He changes his number every five minutes': Niall Horan reveals former One Direction band mate Zayn Malik is notoriously hard to track down
item.description: Zayn Malik split from One Direction in 2015. And Niall Horan has claimed the Pillowtalk hitmaker has been notoriously hard to get a hold of since he began pursuing his solo career.
item.content:encoded:
Zayn Malik's departure from One Direction in 2015 inspired anger from his former bandmates at the time.

And Niall Horan has claimed the Pillowtalk hitmaker has been notoriously hard to get a hold of since pursuing his solo career.

The 24-year-old said he tries his best to stay in contact with his former band mates, but 'everyone's off doing their own thing' - including himself.

Scroll down for video 

One Direction was formed on X Factor in 2010, with Zayn announcing his split from the band five years later.

Today's entertainment reporter Richard Wilkins asked Niall if he was in still in contact with the handsome stars, to which he replied: 'Yeah, all the time.'

However, when the Slow Hands singer rattled off what his former band mates were up to, he failed to mention Zayn: 'Harry is doing his tour. Louis is making more music. Liam is down in Mexico at the minute. We are all like to keep in touch.'

Richard promoted Niall about Zayn, to which he admitted: 'Don't know where he's at.'

The hunky Brit added: 'Actually, I spoke to Zayn about three weeks ago. We had a big conversation and on text and stuff.'

'But Zayn is the kind of fella that changes his number every five minutes. Don't know where he's at,' he confessed. 

In 2016, Zayn claimed to Billboard magazine that he 'reached out' to some of the band, but didn't receive a response.   

'I’ve reached out to a few of them and not got a reply... Certain people have pride issues, but it’s stuff you overcome in time,' he said at the time. 

In July last year, former band mate Louis Tomlinson also said: 'There’s no politics or anything. Inevitably in a band, you’re going to get some people who get on really well and some people who get on quite well.'

Niall is currently touring Australia on his Flicker World tour.

item.title: Cate Blanchett and Sarah Paulson reduce Hoda Kotb to giggles during Ocean's 8 appearance on Today
item.description: They're two of the top actresses in the industry. And Blanchett and Paulson put on quite a show during an appearance on NBC's flagship morning show Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
They're two of the top actresses in the industry.

And Cate Blanchett and Sarah Paulson put on quite a show during an appearance on NBC's Today Tuesday.

The two stars, who were there to promote their movie Ocean's 8, reduced host Hoda Kotb to giggles and then tears of laughter as they playfully sparred with each other.

Blanchett and Paulson were both sipping on mugs of coffee as the interview started and said they were 'parched', having been up since 4 a.m. for the visit to the breakfast show.

And then they were off, riffing on who was the more famous actress of the two of them, listing awards they'd won and teasing that they would never have made the movie if they'd known the other one was going to be in it.

Hoda struggled to get a word in edgeways, instead creasing up and wiping tears from her eyes until Blanchett helpfully pointed out that her mascara was running.

'Oh, it's fine!' Blanchett told her. 'Someone will come and touch you up before you speak to some 'real actors'.' 

The ribbing had started almost immediately when Paulson joked she'd never met Blanchett before.

The Australian Oscar winner, who wore a lavender suit with pink blouse, retorted that Paulson, who was wearing a floral-themed dress, should 'get a stylist.'

'I borrowed it from your mother,' Paulson snapped back. 'I got it from your mom.'

Hoda went on to ask if the pair had worked together before and it turned out they had - on the film Carol.  

'She was nominated for an Academy Award -- which she did not win,' said Paulson. 'She did not win that one, OK, you guys? She didn't win it. It doesn't happen every time out of the gate. She tried, she wore dresses, it was a whole thing -- and she did not win.' 

'Who signed onto this movie first?' Hoda asked.

'Me,' Blanchett replied, before adding: 'I tried to get out of it when I heard what the rest of the cast was gonna be, and they wouldn't let me. I was contracted.' 

Ocean's 8 arrives in theatres on Friday and also stars Sandra Bullock, Anne Hathaway, Helena Bonham Carter, Rihanna, Mindy Kaling and Awkwafina.

It's a female spin-off of Ocean's Eleven that starred George Clooney as conman Danny Ocean.

Bullock plays Debbie Ocean, Danny's estranged sister, who puts together a team of female thieves to pull off a stunning jewelry heist during the Met Gala in New York.

item.title: Sandra Bullock and Anne Hathaway ooze glamour as cast arrives in style for Ocean's 8 premiere
item.description: They are considered two of the most beautiful women in the world. Sandra Bullock and Anne Hathaway proved worthy of the title for the premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
They are considered two of the most beautiful women in the world.

And Sandra Bullock and Anne Hathaway proved worthy of the title as they commanded attention for the premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City on Tuesday.

The Gravity alum, 53, looked every inch the movie star in a gold fringe dress as the Devil Wears Prada star, 35, turned heads in a unique geometric gown.

Scroll down for video 

Sandra's fabulous sartorial choice featured an ethereal sheer gold fabric with intricate bedazzled designs. 

She showcased her delicate decolletage and ample cleavage as the showstopping number boasted a plunging neckline.

Allowing a few whisps of her dark chocolate tresses to frame her face, she pulled the rest into a delicate bun.

Throngs of fevered fans lined the red carpet, and the actress made sure to stop for numerous photos and even signed autographs.

She opted for long, delicate earrings and she painted her lips with pretty pink lipstick.

Glowing with elegance, Hathaway showed off her trademark smile while stopping for snaps along the carpet.

She wore a floor-length white, black, and gold gown that showed off her shoulders and featured various patterns that cascaded down from above the waist.

The Oscar winner glistened, wearing her chestnut locks straight and tucked behind her ears.

And large circular, gold earrings sparkled in the reflection of the setting sun, adding to the ensemble's overall feel.  

Ocean's 8 all-star female line-up sees Debbie Ocean (Bullock) - the estranged sister of Danny Ocean - attempt to pull of a $150 million heist at the Met Gala.

Cate Blanchett stars as Lou, Debbie's partner-in-crime, while Sarah Paulson plays Tammy, a suburban mom and Debbie's former partner-in-crime.

Mindy Kaling is along for the ride as Amita, a jewelry maker, while Awkwafina plays Constance, a thief, and Rihanna is Nine Ball, a tech genius.

Helena Bonham Carter appears as Rose Weil, a fashion designer, in the summer female-driven blockbuster.

On the other side is Anne Hathaway playing Daphne Kluger, a celebrity and the target of the heist, whose assistant is James Corden (John Frazier).

It will also see cameos from Anna Wintour, Zayn Malik, Katie Homes, Serena Williams, Kim Kardashian, Kendall Jenner, and Kylie Jenner.
item.dc:abstract: They are considered two of the most beautiful women in the world. And Sandra Bullock and Anne Hathaway proved worthy of the title as they commanded attention for the premiere of Ocean's 8 in New York City on Tuesday. The Gravity alum, 53, looked every inch the movie star in a gold fringe dress as the Devil Wears Prada star, 35, turned heads in a unique geometric gown.

item.title: Natalie Imbruglia catches the eye in thigh-skimming red dress as she attends gallery opening with boyfriend Matt Field
item.description: Natalie Imbruglia, 43, looked the picture of happiness with her boyfriend Matt Field at the Grand Opening of the JD Malat Gallery in Mayfair, London, on Tuesday.
item.content:encoded:
She's the songstress known for her heartbreak anthem 'Torn'.

But Natalie Imbruglia, 43, looked the picture of happiness with her boyfriend Matt Field at the Grand Opening of the JD Malat Gallery in Mayfair, London, on Tuesday.

The Aussie songstress wore a berry dress cinched in at the waist to show off her slender figure.

Natalie showed off her long toned pins as she posed for pictures at the event, and boosted her frame in a pair of black stilettos.

Keeping things relaxed, the star wore her dark tresses loose around her shoulders in a tousled style.

She showcased her eternally youthful looks with minimal makeup, adding a rose lip to add a splash of colour to her dewy complexion.

In February, the beauty discussed on Lorraine how she fell into the music industry in London after 'struggling' to get a work permit and how Mr Blobby pipped Torn to the number one spot in 1997.

Despite her candid conversation, viewers were blinded by the former soap stars natural beauty and couldn't help but comment on how incredible she looks.

Aside from fans going wild over her age-defying appearance, Natalie revealed she fell into music after struggling to get work in the UK following her Australian soap success.

'I couldn't get a work permit and was struggling to work as an actress [in the UK],' she shared. '…Then I met my then manager Anne Barrett and she put me in touch with songwriters.

'I was so scared and really nervous about failing but with my financial situation, I didn’t want to go home with my tail between my legs.'

And her foray into music ended up being the right choice as she picked up a MTV VMA and EMA for Torn in 1998 as well as two BRIT awards for Best International Female Solo Artist and Best Breakthrough Act in 1999.

Natalie's personal life is also flourishing as she's happily loved-up with photographer Matt Field.

Back in March 2017, Natalie appeared to confirm the romance with Matt with a selfie from the romantic destination of Panarea, a small volcanic island north of Sicily.
item.dc:abstract: She's the songstress known for her emotional lovesong 'Torn'. But Natalie Imbruglia, 43, looked the picture of happiness with her boyfriend Matt Field at the Grand Opening of the JD Malat Gallery in Mayfair, London, on Tuesday. The Aussie songstress wore a berry dress cinched in at the waist to show off her slender figure.

item.title: 'You really need to get to emergency ASAP': Radio host Kyle Sandilands, 46, is told to immediately seek medical attention after revealing troubling symptom on-air
item.description: Kyle Sandilands has had a health emergency scare on-air.
item.content:encoded:
Kyle Sandilands has suffered a health scare on-air.

The radio shock jock was told to go to the hospital immediately after he revealed a troubling symptom during his radio show on Wednesday.

After the 46-year-old-year complained about a strange vibrating sensation in his right leg, a listener recommended he seek medical help right away.

'You really need to get to emergency ASAP... It's a blood clot,' the female caller said.

She continued: 'The vibrating leg is a symptom of a blood clot, you need to get that checked out as soon,' but Kyle cut her off, saying: 'I'll worry about it later.'

The caller urged him to follow up with a medical professional, telling him: 'You don't want to loose your leg or have a blood clot travel to your lung.'

Instead of taking her advice, Kyle lamented over potentially wasting his day waiting at a hospital. 

Newsreader Brooklyn chimed concerned for the radio shock jock's health, saying: 'blood clots can actually kill you,' with Jackie concurring, calling it 'incredibly serious'.

The woman pressed Kyle on seeing a doctor, explaining she has a medical background and a friend who had the same symptoms. 

As the radio ratings king arranged for a medical professional to come by the studio, Jackie offered the idea that maybe it was not a health problem called 'phantom vibration syndrome.'

She explained it was getting hallucinations that the phone in your pocket was vibrating, when it's.

While Kyle appreciated the least concerning of the options offered, Jackie and the rest of the studio still urged him to get it checked.
item.dc:abstract: Kyle Sandilands has had a health emergency scare on-air. But the radio shock jock has been told to go to the hospital immediately after he revealed a troubling symptom on-air, on Wednesday. The 46-year-old-year complained about a strange vibrating sensation in his right leg on The Kyle And Jackie O Show, which a listener followed up on recommending he seek medical help right away.
item.dc:creator: Jade Watkins
item.mi:shortTitle: Terrifying health problem that could kill Kyle Sandilands uncovered

item.title: Teddi Mellencamp Arroyave will return to The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills for season 9
item.description: Joining the daughter of John Mellencamp will be her husband and children, who also appeared on the show during her inaugural season; season eight.
item.content:encoded:
She first appeared on the show during its eighth season. 

And it's been revealed that Teddi Mellencamp Arroyave will return for season nine of the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.

Joining the daughter of John Mellencamp will be her husband and children, who also appeared on the show during her inaugural season. 

Us Weekly shared the news of the pretty blonde's return. 

Over the weekend, the accountability coach, along with husband Edwin Arroyave, daughter Slate and stepdaughter Bella, attended Wango Tango in LA. 

Not seen with the group was her youngest child, son Cruz. 

Teddi spoke of how reality television affected her family of five. 

'I mean, it's really made us even more of a team, because you really support one another and you want to be there for somebody,' she began, to Us.

'You want, you know, you want to take care of each other. We're going through a lot and our family is the most important thing and, you know, we came out stronger for it.'

Teddi also reflected on her season eight appearance. 

'You know, I trusted my gut always,' she began. 'And maybe this past season there were moments like, 'Maybe I shouldn't have!' But then watching it back I'm like, 'No, you know what? Your gut was right.' Just follow it.'

This comes after tension brewed between Teddi and castmates Dorit Kemsley and Erika Girardi.
item.dc:abstract: She first appeared on the show during its eighth season. And it's been revealed that Teddi Mellencamp Arroyave will return for season nine of the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills.Joining the daughter of John Mellencamp will be her husband and children, who also appeared on the show during her inaugural season.
item.dc:creator: Sarah Sotoodeh
item.mi:shortTitle: Teddi Mellencamp will return to The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills

item.title: Demi Rose displays her hourglass curves in figure-hugging semi-sheer dress as she attends Skinny Dip fashion launch
item.description: The brunette Instagram model, 23, caught the eye in a figure hugging black dress as she mingled with guests at the celebratory event.
item.content:encoded:
The hourglass curves were once again on display as Demi Rose made an appearance at the Skinny Dip fashion launch in London’s Shoreditch on Tuesday evening.

The brunette Instagram model, 23, caught the eye in a figure hugging black dress as she mingled with guests at the celebratory event. 

With a distinctive semi-sheer detail the outfit ensured she was centre of attention, while its plunging front provided a pacy flourish by exposing her cleavage.   

Conventional strappy heels completed her ensemble, and Demi ensured it was not overshadowed by opting for limited accessories. 

Smoky make-up drew further attention to her naturally pretty features, while her brunette locks were styled with a simple centre parting. 

The model was joined by guests including Georgia Toffolo and Montana Brown as fashion brand Skinny Dip through their party in the trendy East End neighbourhood. 

While she is a regular on London's party scene, Demi recently revealed that a move to LA could be in the works due to her acting desires.

Speaking to The Sun, she revealed: 'Movies have always been a passion of mine since I went to stage school. But another ambition is to become a Bond Girl, as I love the style and glamour of those films'.

Back in September, Demi divulged the secrets to her envy-inducing figure with MailOnline.

She said of her fitness regime: 'I try to keep as healthy as I can. With travelling, it's hard to work out, I travel across the world but try to keep my routine.'

Admitting she follows a very strict diet however, she added: 'Everyone says I'm the healthiest person they know. The fattiest thing I will ever eat is nuts and peanut butter.'

'My figure just gains weight so fast. Any bad thing I eat my body isn't used to it and just puts on the weight. That means no birthday cake!'

item.title: James Corden denies being the 'drunkest person' at 2018 Met Gala after Andy Cohen called him out
item.description: James Corden denied being the 'drunkest' person at the 2018 Met Gala. The TV host visited Stern's studio on Tuesday and explained it wasn't intoxication but 'just my natural exuberance of life'.
item.content:encoded:
James Corden denied being the 'drunkest' person at the 2018 Met Gala.

In an interview last month on The Howard Stern Show, Andy Cohen - who attended the annual fashion event in early May - claimed Corden was the 'drunken guest'.

But the 39-year-old TV host visited Stern's studio on Tuesday and explained it wasn't intoxication but 'just my natural exuberance of life'.

He explained he rarely drinks because of his schedule adding: 'I think people often think I'm drunk just because I'm just having such a nice time.' 

Corden attended the New York fete with his wife Julia Carey as they enjoyed a rare night out together.

'The reason I was having such a nice time is that my wife and I were away together for the first time in like a year and a half.

'We had a baby six months ago. We have three kids now and we had never left them before,' he explained.

Corden and Carey share son Max, 7, and daughters Carey, 3, and Charlotte, whom they welcomed in December 2017. 

'I didn't have to wake up the next day until like 10 a.m. and that was inconceivable to me,' he added. 

Cohen did clarify in his initial interview by adding: 'But by the way, he wasn't like blotto blotto. He was having a good time. He's great.' 

The interview comes after reports James reportedly stole the limelight from Prince Harry and Meghan Markle at their wedding reception by dressing as Henry VIII.

The actor and US talk show host, who attended the reception with his wife Julia, acted as compere for the evening, apparently turning up dressed in full Tudor regalia according to one guest.

While many guests were left wiping away their tears after Meghan read an emotional poem about her new husband, James provided light relief with his hilarious turn as the erstwhile monarch.

'Your royal highnesses, ladies and gentlemen, I had no idea what to wear to a royal wedding so I looked it up in the royal etiquette manual and found this outfit. I hope I've come in the right gear,' the Sunday Times reported.

item.title: Transformers Bumblebee movie trailer, cast and plot revealed
item.description: After Transformers: The Last Knight’s disappointing performance at the box office, it is down to the franchise prequel Bumblebee to set a new tone for a post Michael Bay Transformers series.
item.content:encoded:
After Transformers: The Last Knight’s disappointing performance at the box office, it is down to the franchise prequel Bumblebee to set a new tone for a post-Michael Bay Transformers series.

This is more true than ever after May 2018, when Paramount Pictures officially axed its June 28, 2019 scheduled release of Transformers 6.

Here is all you need to know about the upcoming Transformers Bumblebee movie including its release date, trailer, cast and plot.

Bumblebee trailer

Paramount Pictures released the Bumblebee movie trailer on Tuesday, June 5 2018 and it has been viewed nearly one-and-a-half million times on YouTube.

The trailer shows Hailee Steinfeld’s Charlie Watson discovering a disguised Bumblebee, the US government descending onto the scene, and a Cybertronian Decepticon that looks a lot like fan-favourite villain Starscream.

Bumblebee release date

Bumblebee is scheduled to be released in the UK and the US on December 21, 2018.

Bumblebee cast

Pitch Perfect and True Grit star Hailee Steinfeld plays the teen Charlie Watson who discovers a banged up Bumblebee that’s disguised as a rusty old VW Beetle.

WWE champ and Blockers actor John Cena appears as a sinister G-man, Agent Burns, who works for Sector 7, the US agency that deals with extra-terrestrial technological threats. Cena described his role as being a bit ‘different’.

‘It's a bit of a different role. I don't wanna confirm a Cena heel-turn, because it's not a full-blown deal like that, but it's damn sure close!,’ he told Digital Spy in 2017. 

The adventure is about to begin. Don’t miss @JohnCena in the new trailer for Bumblebee, debuting TOMORROW! #BumblebeeMovie

A post shared by Bumblebee (@bumblebeemovie) on Jun 4, 2018 at 11:59am PDT

Comedian and actor Martin Short has also been named in the cast, providing voice work that has yet to be revealed.

Peter Cullen, the voice actor who voiced Optimus Prime in the 1980s cartoon series as well as the Transformer films, will reprise the role in the Bumblebee movie.

The film is directed by Travis Knight, whose directorial debut Kubo and the Two Strings was released in 2016.

Bumblebee plot

The film is set in the 1980s and follows what looks like a pretty banged-up Bumblebee, already missing his voice, being discovered by Hailee Steinfeld’s teenager, Charlie Watson.

Director Travis Knight brings a new adventure to life in Bumblebee, in theatres this Christmas. Don’t miss the brand new trailer tomorrow! #BumblebeeMovie

A post shared by Bumblebee (@bumblebeemovie) on Jun 4, 2018 at 2:59pm PDT

Paramount’s official plot synopsis is: 'On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town. 

'Charlie (Hailee Steinfeld), on the cusp of turning 18 and trying to find her place in the world, discovers Bumblebee, battle-scarred and broken. When Charlie revives him, she quickly learns this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.'
item.dc:abstract: After Transformers: The Last Knight’s disappointing performance at the box office, it is down to the franchise prequel Bumblebee to set a new tone for a post Michael Bay Transformers series. Here is all you need to know about the upcoming Transformers Bumblebee movie including its release date, trailer, cast and plot.
item.dc:creator: Harrison Sharp
item.mi:shortTitle: Transformers Bumblebee movie trailer, cast and plot revealed

item.title: Jenna Dewan looks pretty in pink off-the-shoulder top as she leaves office in Los Angeles
item.description: On Tuesday, Jenna Dewan was snapped while leaving an office building in Los Angeles after completing a solo errand. She looked pretty in a pink floral, off-shoulder top as she returned to her car.
item.content:encoded:
She announced her split from husband Channing Tatum, 38, after nine years of marriage in April.

And on Tuesday, Jenna Dewan was snapped while leaving an office building in Los Angeles after completing a solo errand.

The 37-year-old actress looked pretty in a pink floral, off-shoulder top as she returned to her car.

The Step Up star showed off her slender legs in ripped jeans that were cropped above the ankle.

She added a couple inches with a pair of rustic, open-toe heels, and was seen making her way across the concrete garage.

Hiding a golden necklace beneath her billowy top, she carried a large grey-brown purse while making her way to the ticket counter.

Her medium-length dark locks were in a choppy bob and bounced wildly as they framed her face.

Currently keeping busy as a judge on World of Dance, it's been a whirlwind couple of weeks for the actress who just a few days ago put together a unicorn-themed party for her daughter's fifth birthday.

On Thursday, Everly Elizabeth Maiselle Tatum turned five years old.

And Jenna celebrated by throwing her a party complete with balloons and dogs wearing party hats.

The proud mother took to Instagram and shared some of the visuals from her daughters upcoming party, writing 'Happy birthday Evie!!!!!' across one image.

Pink, purple, and white were the main colors featured throughout Dewan's home, and the dogs' looked ready for what was sure to be an energy packed afternoon.
item.dc:abstract: She announced her split from husband Channing Tatum, 38, after nine years of marriage in April. And on Tuesday, Jenna Dewan was snapped while leaving an office building in Los Angeles after completing a solo errand. The 37-year-old actress looked pretty in a pink floral, off-shoulder top as she returned to her car.

item.title: Nancy Dell'Olio, 56, displays a VERY smooth complexion as she slips into saucy leather mini dress for gallery opening in London
item.description: The 56-year-old displayed her very smooth complexion as she posed for cameras at the arty soiree in Mayfair.
item.content:encoded:
She is known for her glamorous appearance, and never fails to dress up to the nines for a night out.

And Nancy Dell'Olio looked as youthful as ever as she arrived to the the Grand Opening of JD Malat Gallery in London on Tuesday night. 

The 56-year-old displayed her very smooth complexion as she posed for cameras at the arty soiree in Mayfair.

Upping the fashion ante, the Italian-British beauty donned a gladiator-inspired leather mini dress for the classy affair which accentuated her ample cleavage.  

Showcasing her remarkably radiant complexion, the lawyer proved to be as youthful and glowing as ever in her pleated number which highlighted her slender pins and sky-high wedges.

Nancy countered her rather racy display by draping a matching chiffon and leather trimmed coat over her shoulders and accessorised her look with a thick gold cuff.

Ever the glamourpuss, she worked her glossy coif into a voluminous curl which framed her flawless features. 

The reality star accessorised with gold drop earrings, and added a slick of shimmering lipstick in a classically glamorous finishing touch as she posed at the event.

Nancy appeared to fly solo at the bash, having left her 32-year-old Italian aristocrat boyfriend Flavio Nappi at home.

The pair have been dating for close to one year, but have set tongues wagging with their prominent age gap.

However, the star recently revealed their difference in age does not bother her, and that she hates being called a 'cougar'. 

Writing in the Daily Mail, she said: 'At 32, he is 23 years younger than me, and I joke that I am schooling him in the art of love. Flavio and I are enjoying what I call an encounter, a special moment between two people. 

'We were thrown together under the Ibizan sun and, with his toned, bronzed physique and happy-go-lucky charm, we began a sensual relationship.' 

Nancy soared to fame when she found love with Swedish football manager Sven-Göran Eriksson, who was signed as England captain in 2001.

The relationship found tricky ground when he had an affair with Ulrika Jonsson although they later united, before ultimately splitting in 2007 after his reported affair with secretary Faria Alam.
item.dc:abstract: She is known for her glamorous appearance, and never fails to dress up to the nines for a night out. And Nancy Dell'Olio looked as youthful as ever as she arrived to the the Grand Opening of JD Malat Gallery in London on Tuesday night.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Mcloughlin
item.mi:shortTitle: Nancy Dell'Olio, 56, displays a VERY smooth complexion

item.title: Shadowhunters cancelled: The best social media reactions
item.description: American TV drama Shadowhunters is cancelled and fans aren’t happy about it. The series has run for three seasons, with the final half of the third season set to air at the beginning of 2019.
item.content:encoded:
American TV drama Shadowhunters is cancelled and fans aren’t happy about it.

The series, based on the Mortal Instruments series of books about a group of human-angel hybrids who hunt demons, has run for three seasons, with the final half of the third set to air at the beginning of 2019.

American network Freeform decided not to pick up the supernatural drama for a fourth season, but in order to provide fans with a sufficient-enough ending, expanded the final series by two episodes.

‘We are very proud of Shadowhunters, a series that broke new ground in the genre world and became a fan favorite,’ the network said in a statement.

‘However, along with our partners at Constantin, we reached the very difficult decision not to renew the show for a fourth season.

‘But as big supporters and fans ourselves, Freeform insisted on and championed the filming of a special two-part finale that would give devoted fans a proper ending.

‘The twelve episodes will air in spring of 2019. We want to thank our talented creators, producers, cast and crew along with our colleagues at Constantin for their hard work and dedication and to Cassie Clare for her incredible book series. We look forward to the final chapter of this breakthrough drama.’

According to The Hollywood Reporter, the cancellation came after Freeform lost its output deal with Netflix, which helped fund the series.

The show’s production company Constantin was looking to get a cash infusion from Freeform, but sources told THR that it was unable to afford to keep the show going.

The news came as a shock not only to fans, but also to the show’s cast members. Show lead Katherine McNamara, who plays Clary Fay, wrote on Twitter: ‘We just found out too — and beleive me we are as shocked as you. Truly, this show has been a treasure. I fell in love with this story and its mythology instantly.’

So passionate are the fans that very quickly #saveShadowhunters began trending on Twitter, with many hoping for a Brooklyn-99 miracle.

Here are the best social media reactions to the Shadowhunters cancellation.

Shadowhunters cancellation social media reactions 

Shadowhunters actors including Katherine McNamara, Matthew Daddario, Harry Shum Jr, and Dominic Sherwood all took to Twitter to pay tribute to the show and thank the fans.

Hail and farewell, Angels... 🖤 #Shadowhuntersthefinalhunt @shadowhunterstv pic.twitter.com/ak8XLUxju4

— Katherine McNamara (@Kat_McNamara) June 5, 2018

It has been an absolutely wonderful experience getting to be part of Shadowhunters for the past three years. After all of it, I hope I have fulfilled my promise of being the best Alec Lightwood you could ask for. Look out for the great work this crew will be doing out of

— Matthew Daddario (@MatthewDaddario) June 5, 2018

We still have 12 episodes left to finish what we started on @freeform & @netflix. You all have been so supportive and it’s been inspiring to read your tweets, comments and letters pouring your hearts out on how much the show means to you. I am honored to be part that.

— Harry Shum Jr (@HarryShumJr) June 5, 2018

All good things come to an end. It has been my privelidge to be a part of this world. @ShadowhuntersTV team have been so close to my heart for 3 years. You. The fans. Make us happy and strong and proud. Thank you. For everything. We say goodbye with a heavy heart but our heads...

— Dominic Sherwood (@DomSherwood1) June 5, 2018

Shocked and saddened. So proud of this show #shadowhunters

— Todd Slavkin (@toddzer1) June 5, 2018

Many fans quickly posted messages praising the show and venting their frustrations at the fact that it was cancelled.  

I would apologize for my spam of #Shadowhunters retweets but I love that show and #Malec is amazing representation of a healthy LGBT relationship and we need more of that so #SaveShadowhunters #Pride @netflix @FreeformTV

— Becca (@Beccaw726) June 5, 2018

Should Shadowhunters be cancelled (see GIF) #SaveShadowhunters pic.twitter.com/Zjo5eEJjjT

— Noodle (@noodedoodle) June 5, 2018

freeform: *cancels shadowhunters their best and most popular show that they didn't promote properly and with one of the biggest representations and diversity in years*
fandom: #SaveShadowhunters pic.twitter.com/qCYjglI9OV

— seni #SaveShadowhunters (@frayswarrior) June 5, 2018

#SaveShadowhunters#Shadowhunters
You want a war, you don't know what you're asking for pic.twitter.com/EBXgFaUNo9

— bella (@platinumxheart) June 5, 2018

Please tell me you don't think getting 1 million tweets for a show in 15 hours is an easy task @FreeformTV @netflix. Just renew shadowhunters for a fourth season, it makes zero sense to cancel a show with so much online popularity #saveshadowhunters

— Suhasini (@PatronusMalec) June 5, 2018

#SaveShadowhunters
Freeform: we're canceling Shadowhunters

The sh fam: pic.twitter.com/HBUaQfSqsE

— 🅱️ #SaveShadowhunters (@BiancaD90) June 5, 2018

TV networks nowadays are rebooting old shows because they can’t think of original ones. Shadowhunters was THAT show. Diverse cast, amazing LGBTQ+ rep, great storytelling, well-developed characters... do not let this show go you cowards 😡#saveshadowhunters #shadowhunters

— Adam ➰ (@abnormallyadam) June 5, 2018

Some even threatened to cancel their Netflix subscriptions. 

I literally only got @netflix for shadowhunters so guess I’ll be cancelling my subscription after these 12 episodes #SaveShadowhunters

— Laurie//#SaveShadowhunters (@5sosHemmotron) June 5, 2018

I WILL DELETE MY @NETFLIX ACCOUNT IF #SHADOWHUNTERS ISNT RENEWED #SaveShadowhunters I wasn’t going to use it for anything else anyway

— #SaveShadowhunters (@thefairfolk) June 5, 2018

Netflix HQ after hearing the thousands of requests from the #shadowhunters fans #saveshadowhunters pic.twitter.com/Hc7lQbbUjI

— Adam ➰ (@abnormallyadam) June 5, 2018

Very quickly the #saveShadowhunters hashtag began trending.

1 Milliontweets under 24 hours now that’s amazing!! #SaveShadowhunters

— Molliexo|||||#SaveShadowhunters➰ (@MollieO14) June 5, 2018

So are we! We are going to fight for a new season #saveshadowhunters

— SAVE SHADOWHUNTERS leonie (@leoniefairchild) June 5, 2018

in case anyone is wondering, we are not giving up. NOT THIS FANDOM!!!#SaveShadowhunters #shadowhunters@netflix @ConstantinFilm @FreeformTV

— Anica 🦋 (@magnusandalec_) June 5, 2018

#SaveShadowhunters #Shadowhunters @netflix @FreeformTV @TheCW LET'S FIGHT FOR THIS SHOW, FOR OUR SHOW pic.twitter.com/v178qvQBBR

— Elea ➰ | #SaveShadowhunters (@shadowsdefence) June 5, 2018

Complex queer characters, many amazing POC to look up to, badass women being badass. There’s a reason this is the most popular show on @FreeformTV. Don’t take it away @netflix. #saveshadowhunters #Shadowhunters

— Save Shadowhunters (@jsantos7401) June 5, 2018

item.title: Reese Witherspoon is ready for summer in cute snap with son Tennessee... as she enjoys break from filming Big Little Lies
item.description: Reese Witherspoon posted a picture on Instagram showing her spending some down with time with five year old son Tennessee with the caption, . 'This boy I tell ya...' #SweetSummertime
item.content:encoded:
Reese Witherspoon is proving you can work hard and play hard at the same time.

During a break from filming her hit HBO show Big Little Lies on Tuesday, the actress posted a super cute picture on Instagram showing her spending some down time with her adorable five year old son Tennessee.

'This boy I tell ya...' #SweetSummertime, the mother of three wrote in the caption.  

Standing in front of some palm trees, Reese seemed to be very relaxed as she flashed that radiant smile while holding a tropical drink. Tennessee can be seen standing in front of mom as he busted out his best dance moves.

The 42-year old looks forever young in a floral sun dress, stylishly tied at the waist with cool framed sunglasses and her bare feet.

She also showed she knows how to dress her boys.  Tennessee looked super casual in his bare feet, wearing some fashionable burgundy shorts with a classic stripped short sleeve shirt.

Reese and Tennessee's father, Jim Toth, have been married for over seven years.

Toth is talent agent and the co-head of motion picture talent at Creative Artists Agency, where Witherspoon is a client. 

She also has a daughter Ava, 18, and another son Deacon, 14, with ex-husband Ryan Phillippe.

The Oscar-winning actress has also been boasting on social media about all the fun she has been having off the set with her Big Little Lies cast mates.

On Sunday she posted a photo of her bowling with Nicole Kidman, Meryl Streep and Shailene Woodley, with the caption, 'We work and we play! Bowl-a-Rama party with the ladies of #BigLittleLies!' @nicolekidman #MerylStreep @shailenewoodley

Reese also joined Shailene Woodley, Laura Dern and Zoe Kravitz for some girl time and see Woodley's new movie Adrift last weekend.

All four of them shared a photo on Instagram of them posing outside the movie theater, flashing big beaming smiles while holding up their ticket stubs. 

Big Little Lies is currently filming its second season which will air on HBO in 2019.
item.dc:abstract: Reese Witherspoon is proving you can work hard and play hard at the same time. During a break from filming her hit HBO show Big Little Lies on Tuesday, the actress posted a super cute picture on Instagram showing her spending some down time with her five year old son Tennessee.'This boy I tell ya...' #SweetSummertime, the mother of three wrote in the caption. Sweet summer is the best way to describe the photo. Standing in front of some palm trees, Reese seemed to be very relaxed as she flashed that radiant smile while holding a tropical drink. Tennessee can be seen standing in front of mom as he busted out his best dance moves.

item.mi:shortTitle: Reese Witherspoon shares cute snap with son Tennessee

item.title: Cate Blanchett is a vision in blue as she steps out in New York ahead of Ocean's 8 release
item.description: She's gearing up for the premiere of her latest film, the female driven Ocean's 8. And there was no slowing down Cate Blanchett on Tuesday when she stepped out in New York
item.content:encoded:
She's gearing up for the premiere of her latest film, the female driven Ocean's 8. 

And there was no slowing down Cate Blanchett on Tuesday when she stepped out in New York City. 

A vision of blue, the 49-year-old actress showcased her impeccable style while flaunting her trim physique.  

Cate opted for a fashionable baby blue look for the outing. 

She wore a polka dot shirt with neck tie underneath a power suit.

The beauty's high-waisted trousers fell to just above her ankles and was complemented with white pumps. 

Cate accessorised with a large bag of the same color and peach tinted shades. 

Her short blonde locks were styled out into an effortless wave and was parted over to one side. 

The Thor: Ragnarock star appeared to be wearing light makeup coverage that featured a healthy sweep of blush and nude lip. 

Cate's stroll around the Big Apple comes after she was seen at Monday night's CFDA Fashion Awards. 

The mom-of-two's Monse garment featured silver embellished cuffs and an edgy asymmetrical hemline.

The latest film from the Australian native is the female driven Ocean's 8.

Also staring Sandra Bullock, Anne Hathaway, Sarah Paulson, Mindy Kaling, Aquafina, Helena Bonham Carter, Dakota Fanning and Rihanna along others, it's predicted to be a hit.

According to Deadline, the star-studded female heist flick - which is a spin-off of the George Clooney led Oceans 11 trilogy - is tracking for an opening weekend between $30 million and $45 million.  

Ocean's 8 will be in all cinemas from Friday June 8.
